CBP Platform  Version 1
Campus-based Publishing Platform

SimplePie.inc.php
00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * SimplePie
00004  *
00005  * A PHP-Based RSS and Atom Feed Framework.
00006  * Takes the hard work out of managing a complete RSS/Atom solution.
00007  *
00008  * Copyright (c) 2004-2009, Ryan Parman and Geoffrey Sneddon
00009  * All rights reserved.
00010  *
00011  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are
00012  * permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
00013  *
00014  *    * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list of
00015  *      conditions and the following disclaimer.
00016  *
00017  *    * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list
00018  *      of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials
00019  *      provided with the distribution.
00020  *
00021  *    * Neither the name of the SimplePie Team nor the names of its contributors may be used
00022  *      to endorse or promote products derived from this software without specific prior
00023  *      written permission.
00024  *
00025  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS
00026  * OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY
00027  * AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS
00028  * AND CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR
00029  * CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR
00030  * SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY
00031  * THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR
00032  * OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE
00033  * POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
00034  *
00035  * @package SimplePie
00036  * @version 1.2
00037  * @copyright 2004-2009 Ryan Parman, Geoffrey Sneddon
00038  * @author Ryan Parman
00039  * @author Geoffrey Sneddon
00040  * @link http://simplepie.org/ SimplePie
00041  * @link http://simplepie.org/support/ Please submit all bug reports and feature requests to the SimplePie forums
00042  * @license http://www.opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php BSD License
00043  * @todo phpDoc comments
00044  */
00045 
00046 /**
00047  * SimplePie Name
00048  */
00049 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAME', 'SimplePie');
00050 
00051 /**
00052  * SimplePie Version
00053  */
00054 define('SIMPLEPIE_VERSION', '1.2');
00055 
00056 /**
00057  * SimplePie Build
00058  */
00059 define('SIMPLEPIE_BUILD', '20090627192103');
00060 
00061 /**
00062  * SimplePie Website URL
00063  */
00064 define('SIMPLEPIE_URL', 'http://simplepie.org');
00065 
00066 /**
00067  * SimplePie Useragent
00068  * @see SimplePie::set_useragent()
00069  */
00070 define('SIMPLEPIE_USERAGENT', SIMPLEPIE_NAME . '/' . SIMPLEPIE_VERSION . ' (Feed Parser; ' . SIMPLEPIE_URL . '; Allow like Gecko) Build/' . SIMPLEPIE_BUILD);
00071 
00072 /**
00073  * SimplePie Linkback
00074  */
00075 define('SIMPLEPIE_LINKBACK', '<a href="' . SIMPLEPIE_URL . '" title="' . SIMPLEPIE_NAME . ' ' . SIMPLEPIE_VERSION . '">' . SIMPLEPIE_NAME . '</a>');
00076 
00077 /**
00078  * No Autodiscovery
00079  * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00080  */
00081 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_NONE', 0);
00082 
00083 /**
00084  * Feed Link Element Autodiscovery
00085  * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00086  */
00087 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_AUTODISCOVERY', 1);
00088 
00089 /**
00090  * Local Feed Extension Autodiscovery
00091  * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00092  */
00093 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_EXTENSION', 2);
00094 
00095 /**
00096  * Local Feed Body Autodiscovery
00097  * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00098  */
00099 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_BODY', 4);
00100 
00101 /**
00102  * Remote Feed Extension Autodiscovery
00103  * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00104  */
00105 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_EXTENSION', 8);
00106 
00107 /**
00108  * Remote Feed Body Autodiscovery
00109  * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00110  */
00111 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_BODY', 16);
00112 
00113 /**
00114  * All Feed Autodiscovery
00115  * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00116  */
00117 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL', 31);
00118 
00119 /**
00120  * No known feed type
00121  */
00122 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_NONE', 0);
00123 
00124 /**
00125  * RSS 0.90
00126  */
00127 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090', 1);
00128 
00129 /**
00130  * RSS 0.91 (Netscape)
00131  */
00132 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_NETSCAPE', 2);
00133 
00134 /**
00135  * RSS 0.91 (Userland)
00136  */
00137 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_USERLAND', 4);
00138 
00139 /**
00140  * RSS 0.91 (both Netscape and Userland)
00141  */
00142 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091', 6);
00143 
00144 /**
00145  * RSS 0.92
00146  */
00147 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_092', 8);
00148 
00149 /**
00150  * RSS 0.93
00151  */
00152 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_093', 16);
00153 
00154 /**
00155  * RSS 0.94
00156  */
00157 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_094', 32);
00158 
00159 /**
00160  * RSS 1.0
00161  */
00162 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10', 64);
00163 
00164 /**
00165  * RSS 2.0
00166  */
00167 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_20', 128);
00168 
00169 /**
00170  * RDF-based RSS
00171  */
00172 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_RDF', 65);
00173 
00174 /**
00175  * Non-RDF-based RSS (truly intended as syndication format)
00176  */
00177 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION', 190);
00178 
00179 /**
00180  * All RSS
00181  */
00182 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_ALL', 255);
00183 
00184 /**
00185  * Atom 0.3
00186  */
00187 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_03', 256);
00188 
00189 /**
00190  * Atom 1.0
00191  */
00192 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_10', 512);
00193 
00194 /**
00195  * All Atom
00196  */
00197 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_ALL', 768);
00198 
00199 /**
00200  * All feed types
00201  */
00202 define('SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ALL', 1023);
00203 
00204 /**
00205  * No construct
00206  */
00207 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_NONE', 0);
00208 
00209 /**
00210  * Text construct
00211  */
00212 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT', 1);
00213 
00214 /**
00215  * HTML construct
00216  */
00217 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML', 2);
00218 
00219 /**
00220  * XHTML construct
00221  */
00222 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML', 4);
00223 
00224 /**
00225  * base64-encoded construct
00226  */
00227 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_BASE64', 8);
00228 
00229 /**
00230  * IRI construct
00231  */
00232 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI', 16);
00233 
00234 /**
00235  * A construct that might be HTML
00236  */
00237 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML', 32);
00238 
00239 /**
00240  * All constructs
00241  */
00242 define('SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_ALL', 63);
00243 
00244 /**
00245  * Don't change case
00246  */
00247 define('SIMPLEPIE_SAME_CASE', 1);
00248 
00249 /**
00250  * Change to lowercase
00251  */
00252 define('SIMPLEPIE_LOWERCASE', 2);
00253 
00254 /**
00255  * Change to uppercase
00256  */
00257 define('SIMPLEPIE_UPPERCASE', 4);
00258 
00259 /**
00260  * PCRE for HTML attributes
00261  */
00262 define('SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_HTML_ATTRIBUTE', '((?:[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]+[^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3D\x3E]*(?:[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*=[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*(?:"(?:[^"]*)"|\'(?:[^\']*)\'|(?:[^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x22\x27\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x3E]*)?))?)*)[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*');
00263 
00264 /**
00265  * PCRE for XML attributes
00266  */
00267 define('SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_XML_ATTRIBUTE', '((?:\s+(?:(?:[^\s:]+:)?[^\s:]+)\s*=\s*(?:"(?:[^"]*)"|\'(?:[^\']*)\'))*)\s*');
00268 
00269 /**
00270  * XML Namespace
00271  */
00272 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XML', 'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace');
00273 
00274 /**
00275  * Atom 1.0 Namespace
00276  */
00277 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10', 'http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom');
00278 
00279 /**
00280  * Atom 0.3 Namespace
00281  */
00282 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03', 'http://purl.org/atom/ns#');
00283 
00284 /**
00285  * RDF Namespace
00286  */
00287 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF', 'http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#');
00288 
00289 /**
00290  * RSS 0.90 Namespace
00291  */
00292 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090', 'http://my.netscape.com/rdf/simple/0.9/');
00293 
00294 /**
00295  * RSS 1.0 Namespace
00296  */
00297 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10', 'http://purl.org/rss/1.0/');
00298 
00299 /**
00300  * RSS 1.0 Content Module Namespace
00301  */
00302 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10_MODULES_CONTENT', 'http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/');
00303 
00304 /**
00305  * RSS 2.0 Namespace
00306  * (Stupid, I know, but I'm certain it will confuse people less with support.)
00307  */
00308 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20', '');
00309 
00310 /**
00311  * DC 1.0 Namespace
00312  */
00313 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10', 'http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.0/');
00314 
00315 /**
00316  * DC 1.1 Namespace
00317  */
00318 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11', 'http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/');
00319 
00320 /**
00321  * W3C Basic Geo (WGS84 lat/long) Vocabulary Namespace
00322  */
00323 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO', 'http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#');
00324 
00325 /**
00326  * GeoRSS Namespace
00327  */
00328 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS', 'http://www.georss.org/georss');
00329 
00330 /**
00331  * Media RSS Namespace
00332  */
00333 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS', 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/');
00334 
00335 /**
00336  * Wrong Media RSS Namespace
00337  */
00338 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG', 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss');
00339 
00340 /**
00341  * iTunes RSS Namespace
00342  */
00343 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES', 'http://www.itunes.com/dtds/podcast-1.0.dtd');
00344 
00345 /**
00346  * XHTML Namespace
00347  */
00348 define('SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XHTML', 'http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml');
00349 
00350 /**
00351  * IANA Link Relations Registry
00352  */
00353 define('SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY', 'http://www.iana.org/assignments/relation/');
00354 
00355 /**
00356  * Whether we're running on PHP5
00357  */
00358 define('SIMPLEPIE_PHP5', version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.0.0', '>='));
00359 
00360 /**
00361  * No file source
00362  */
00363 define('SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_NONE', 0);
00364 
00365 /**
00366  * Remote file source
00367  */
00368 define('SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE', 1);
00369 
00370 /**
00371  * Local file source
00372  */
00373 define('SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_LOCAL', 2);
00374 
00375 /**
00376  * fsockopen() file source
00377  */
00378 define('SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FSOCKOPEN', 4);
00379 
00380 /**
00381  * cURL file source
00382  */
00383 define('SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_CURL', 8);
00384 
00385 /**
00386  * file_get_contents() file source
00387  */
00388 define('SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FILE_GET_CONTENTS', 16);
00389 
00390 /**
00391  * SimplePie
00392  *
00393  * @package SimplePie
00394  */
00395 class SimplePie
00396 {
00397    /**
00398     * @var array Raw data
00399     * @access private
00400     */
00401    var $data = array();
00402 
00403    /**
00404     * @var mixed Error string
00405     * @access private
00406     */
00407    var $error;
00408 
00409    /**
00410     * @var object Instance of SimplePie_Sanitize (or other class)
00411     * @see SimplePie::set_sanitize_class()
00412     * @access private
00413     */
00414    var $sanitize;
00415 
00416    /**
00417     * @var string SimplePie Useragent
00418     * @see SimplePie::set_useragent()
00419     * @access private
00420     */
00421    var $useragent = SIMPLEPIE_USERAGENT;
00422 
00423    /**
00424     * @var string Feed URL
00425     * @see SimplePie::set_feed_url()
00426     * @access private
00427     */
00428    var $feed_url;
00429 
00430    /**
00431     * @var object Instance of SimplePie_File to use as a feed
00432     * @see SimplePie::set_file()
00433     * @access private
00434     */
00435    var $file;
00436 
00437    /**
00438     * @var string Raw feed data
00439     * @see SimplePie::set_raw_data()
00440     * @access private
00441     */
00442    var $raw_data;
00443 
00444    /**
00445     * @var int Timeout for fetching remote files
00446     * @see SimplePie::set_timeout()
00447     * @access private
00448     */
00449    var $timeout = 10;
00450 
00451    /**
00452     * @var bool Forces fsockopen() to be used for remote files instead
00453     * of cURL, even if a new enough version is installed
00454     * @see SimplePie::force_fsockopen()
00455     * @access private
00456     */
00457    var $force_fsockopen = false;
00458 
00459    /**
00460     * @var bool Force the given data/URL to be treated as a feed no matter what
00461     * it appears like
00462     * @see SimplePie::force_feed()
00463     * @access private
00464     */
00465    var $force_feed = false;
00466 
00467    /**
00468     * @var bool Enable/Disable XML dump
00469     * @see SimplePie::enable_xml_dump()
00470     * @access private
00471     */
00472    var $xml_dump = false;
00473 
00474    /**
00475     * @var bool Enable/Disable Caching
00476     * @see SimplePie::enable_cache()
00477     * @access private
00478     */
00479    var $cache = true;
00480 
00481    /**
00482     * @var int Cache duration (in seconds)
00483     * @see SimplePie::set_cache_duration()
00484     * @access private
00485     */
00486    var $cache_duration = 3600;
00487 
00488    /**
00489     * @var int Auto-discovery cache duration (in seconds)
00490     * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_cache_duration()
00491     * @access private
00492     */
00493    var $autodiscovery_cache_duration = 604800; // 7 Days.
00494 
00495    /**
00496     * @var string Cache location (relative to executing script)
00497     * @see SimplePie::set_cache_location()
00498     * @access private
00499     */
00500    var $cache_location = './cache';
00501 
00502    /**
00503     * @var string Function that creates the cache filename
00504     * @see SimplePie::set_cache_name_function()
00505     * @access private
00506     */
00507    var $cache_name_function = 'md5';
00508 
00509    /**
00510     * @var bool Reorder feed by date descending
00511     * @see SimplePie::enable_order_by_date()
00512     * @access private
00513     */
00514    var $order_by_date = true;
00515 
00516    /**
00517     * @var mixed Force input encoding to be set to the follow value
00518     * (false, or anything type-cast to false, disables this feature)
00519     * @see SimplePie::set_input_encoding()
00520     * @access private
00521     */
00522    var $input_encoding = false;
00523 
00524    /**
00525     * @var int Feed Autodiscovery Level
00526     * @see SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()
00527     * @access private
00528     */
00529    var $autodiscovery = SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL;
00530 
00531    /**
00532     * @var string Class used for caching feeds
00533     * @see SimplePie::set_cache_class()
00534     * @access private
00535     */
00536    var $cache_class = 'SimplePie_Cache';
00537 
00538    /**
00539     * @var string Class used for locating feeds
00540     * @see SimplePie::set_locator_class()
00541     * @access private
00542     */
00543    var $locator_class = 'SimplePie_Locator';
00544 
00545    /**
00546     * @var string Class used for parsing feeds
00547     * @see SimplePie::set_parser_class()
00548     * @access private
00549     */
00550    var $parser_class = 'SimplePie_Parser';
00551 
00552    /**
00553     * @var string Class used for fetching feeds
00554     * @see SimplePie::set_file_class()
00555     * @access private
00556     */
00557    var $file_class = 'SimplePie_File';
00558 
00559    /**
00560     * @var string Class used for items
00561     * @see SimplePie::set_item_class()
00562     * @access private
00563     */
00564    var $item_class = 'SimplePie_Item';
00565 
00566    /**
00567     * @var string Class used for authors
00568     * @see SimplePie::set_author_class()
00569     * @access private
00570     */
00571    var $author_class = 'SimplePie_Author';
00572 
00573    /**
00574     * @var string Class used for categories
00575     * @see SimplePie::set_category_class()
00576     * @access private
00577     */
00578    var $category_class = 'SimplePie_Category';
00579 
00580    /**
00581     * @var string Class used for enclosures
00582     * @see SimplePie::set_enclosures_class()
00583     * @access private
00584     */
00585    var $enclosure_class = 'SimplePie_Enclosure';
00586 
00587    /**
00588     * @var string Class used for Media RSS <media:text> captions
00589     * @see SimplePie::set_caption_class()
00590     * @access private
00591     */
00592    var $caption_class = 'SimplePie_Caption';
00593 
00594    /**
00595     * @var string Class used for Media RSS <media:copyright>
00596     * @see SimplePie::set_copyright_class()
00597     * @access private
00598     */
00599    var $copyright_class = 'SimplePie_Copyright';
00600 
00601    /**
00602     * @var string Class used for Media RSS <media:credit>
00603     * @see SimplePie::set_credit_class()
00604     * @access private
00605     */
00606    var $credit_class = 'SimplePie_Credit';
00607 
00608    /**
00609     * @var string Class used for Media RSS <media:rating>
00610     * @see SimplePie::set_rating_class()
00611     * @access private
00612     */
00613    var $rating_class = 'SimplePie_Rating';
00614 
00615    /**
00616     * @var string Class used for Media RSS <media:restriction>
00617     * @see SimplePie::set_restriction_class()
00618     * @access private
00619     */
00620    var $restriction_class = 'SimplePie_Restriction';
00621 
00622    /**
00623     * @var string Class used for content-type sniffing
00624     * @see SimplePie::set_content_type_sniffer_class()
00625     * @access private
00626     */
00627    var $content_type_sniffer_class = 'SimplePie_Content_Type_Sniffer';
00628 
00629    /**
00630     * @var string Class used for item sources.
00631     * @see SimplePie::set_source_class()
00632     * @access private
00633     */
00634    var $source_class = 'SimplePie_Source';
00635 
00636    /**
00637     * @var mixed Set javascript query string parameter (false, or
00638     * anything type-cast to false, disables this feature)
00639     * @see SimplePie::set_javascript()
00640     * @access private
00641     */
00642    var $javascript = 'js';
00643 
00644    /**
00645     * @var int Maximum number of feeds to check with autodiscovery
00646     * @see SimplePie::set_max_checked_feeds()
00647     * @access private
00648     */
00649    var $max_checked_feeds = 10;
00650 
00651    /**
00652     * @var array All the feeds found during the autodiscovery process
00653     * @see SimplePie::get_all_discovered_feeds()
00654     * @access private
00655     */
00656    var $all_discovered_feeds = array();
00657 
00658    /**
00659     * @var string Web-accessible path to the handler_favicon.php file.
00660     * @see SimplePie::set_favicon_handler()
00661     * @access private
00662     */
00663    var $favicon_handler = '';
00664 
00665    /**
00666     * @var string Web-accessible path to the handler_image.php file.
00667     * @see SimplePie::set_image_handler()
00668     * @access private
00669     */
00670    var $image_handler = '';
00671 
00672    /**
00673     * @var array Stores the URLs when multiple feeds are being initialized.
00674     * @see SimplePie::set_feed_url()
00675     * @access private
00676     */
00677    var $multifeed_url = array();
00678 
00679    /**
00680     * @var array Stores SimplePie objects when multiple feeds initialized.
00681     * @access private
00682     */
00683    var $multifeed_objects = array();
00684 
00685    /**
00686     * @var array Stores the get_object_vars() array for use with multifeeds.
00687     * @see SimplePie::set_feed_url()
00688     * @access private
00689     */
00690    var $config_settings = null;
00691 
00692    /**
00693     * @var integer Stores the number of items to return per-feed with multifeeds.
00694     * @see SimplePie::set_item_limit()
00695     * @access private
00696     */
00697    var $item_limit = 0;
00698 
00699    /**
00700     * @var array Stores the default attributes to be stripped by strip_attributes().
00701     * @see SimplePie::strip_attributes()
00702     * @access private
00703     */
00704    var $strip_attributes = array('bgsound', 'class', 'expr', 'id', 'style', 'onclick', 'onerror', 'onfinish', 'onmouseover', 'onmouseout', 'onfocus', 'onblur', 'lowsrc', 'dynsrc');
00705 
00706    /**
00707     * @var array Stores the default tags to be stripped by strip_htmltags().
00708     * @see SimplePie::strip_htmltags()
00709     * @access private
00710     */
00711    var $strip_htmltags = array('base', 'blink', 'body', 'doctype', 'embed', 'font', 'form', 'frame', 'frameset', 'html', 'iframe', 'input', 'marquee', 'meta', 'noscript', 'object', 'param', 'script', 'style');
00712 
00713    /**
00714     * The SimplePie class contains feed level data and options
00715     *
00716     * There are two ways that you can create a new SimplePie object. The first
00717     * is by passing a feed URL as a parameter to the SimplePie constructor
00718     * (as well as optionally setting the cache location and cache expiry). This
00719     * will initialise the whole feed with all of the default settings, and you
00720     * can begin accessing methods and properties immediately.
00721     *
00722     * The second way is to create the SimplePie object with no parameters
00723     * at all. This will enable you to set configuration options. After setting
00724     * them, you must initialise the feed using $feed->init(). At that point the
00725     * object's methods and properties will be available to you. This format is
00726     * what is used throughout this documentation.
00727     *
00728     * @access public
00729     * @since 1.0 Preview Release
00730     * @param string $feed_url This is the URL you want to parse.
00731     * @param string $cache_location This is where you want the cache to be stored.
00732     * @param int $cache_duration This is the number of seconds that you want to store the cache file for.
00733     */
00734    function SimplePie($feed_url = null, $cache_location = null, $cache_duration = null)
00735    {
00736       // Other objects, instances created here so we can set options on them
00737       $this->sanitize =& new SimplePie_Sanitize;
00738 
00739       // Set options if they're passed to the constructor
00740       if ($cache_location !== null)
00741       {
00742          $this->set_cache_location($cache_location);
00743       }
00744 
00745       if ($cache_duration !== null)
00746       {
00747          $this->set_cache_duration($cache_duration);
00748       }
00749 
00750       // Only init the script if we're passed a feed URL
00751       if ($feed_url !== null)
00752       {
00753          $this->set_feed_url($feed_url);
00754          $this->init();
00755       }
00756    }
00757 
00758    /**
00759     * Used for converting object to a string
00760     */
00761    function __toString()
00762    {
00763       return md5(serialize($this->data));
00764    }
00765 
00766    /**
00767     * Remove items that link back to this before destroying this object
00768     */
00769    function __destruct()
00770    {
00771       if ((version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.3', '<') || !gc_enabled()) && !ini_get('zend.ze1_compatibility_mode'))
00772       {
00773          if (!empty($this->data['items']))
00774          {
00775             foreach ($this->data['items'] as $item)
00776             {
00777                $item->__destruct();
00778             }
00779             unset($item, $this->data['items']);
00780          }
00781          if (!empty($this->data['ordered_items']))
00782          {
00783             foreach ($this->data['ordered_items'] as $item)
00784             {
00785                $item->__destruct();
00786             }
00787             unset($item, $this->data['ordered_items']);
00788          }
00789       }
00790    }
00791 
00792    /**
00793     * Force the given data/URL to be treated as a feed no matter what it
00794     * appears like
00795     *
00796     * @access public
00797     * @since 1.1
00798     * @param bool $enable Force the given data/URL to be treated as a feed
00799     */
00800    function force_feed($enable = false)
00801    {
00802       $this->force_feed = (bool) $enable;
00803    }
00804 
00805    /**
00806     * This is the URL of the feed you want to parse.
00807     *
00808     * This allows you to enter the URL of the feed you want to parse, or the
00809     * website you want to try to use auto-discovery on. This takes priority
00810     * over any set raw data.
00811     *
00812     * You can set multiple feeds to mash together by passing an array instead
00813     * of a string for the $url. Remember that with each additional feed comes
00814     * additional processing and resources.
00815     *
00816     * @access public
00817     * @since 1.0 Preview Release
00818     * @param mixed $url This is the URL (or array of URLs) that you want to parse.
00819     * @see SimplePie::set_raw_data()
00820     */
00821    function set_feed_url($url)
00822    {
00823       if (is_array($url))
00824       {
00825          $this->multifeed_url = array();
00826          foreach ($url as $value)
00827          {
00828             $this->multifeed_url[] = SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($value, 1);
00829          }
00830       }
00831       else
00832       {
00833          $this->feed_url = SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($url, 1);
00834       }
00835    }
00836 
00837    /**
00838     * Provides an instance of SimplePie_File to use as a feed
00839     *
00840     * @access public
00841     * @param object &$file Instance of SimplePie_File (or subclass)
00842     * @return bool True on success, false on failure
00843     */
00844    function set_file(&$file)
00845    {
00846       if (is_a($file, 'SimplePie_File'))
00847       {
00848          $this->feed_url = $file->url;
00849          $this->file =& $file;
00850          return true;
00851       }
00852       return false;
00853    }
00854 
00855    /**
00856     * Allows you to use a string of RSS/Atom data instead of a remote feed.
00857     *
00858     * If you have a feed available as a string in PHP, you can tell SimplePie
00859     * to parse that data string instead of a remote feed. Any set feed URL
00860     * takes precedence.
00861     *
00862     * @access public
00863     * @since 1.0 Beta 3
00864     * @param string $data RSS or Atom data as a string.
00865     * @see SimplePie::set_feed_url()
00866     */
00867    function set_raw_data($data)
00868    {
00869       $this->raw_data = $data;
00870    }
00871 
00872    /**
00873     * Allows you to override the default timeout for fetching remote feeds.
00874     *
00875     * This allows you to change the maximum time the feed's server to respond
00876     * and send the feed back.
00877     *
00878     * @access public
00879     * @since 1.0 Beta 3
00880     * @param int $timeout The maximum number of seconds to spend waiting to retrieve a feed.
00881     */
00882    function set_timeout($timeout = 10)
00883    {
00884       $this->timeout = (int) $timeout;
00885    }
00886 
00887    /**
00888     * Forces SimplePie to use fsockopen() instead of the preferred cURL
00889     * functions.
00890     *
00891     * @access public
00892     * @since 1.0 Beta 3
00893     * @param bool $enable Force fsockopen() to be used
00894     */
00895    function force_fsockopen($enable = false)
00896    {
00897       $this->force_fsockopen = (bool) $enable;
00898    }
00899 
00900    /**
00901     * Outputs the raw XML content of the feed, after it has gone through
00902     * SimplePie's filters.
00903     *
00904     * Used only for debugging, this function will output the XML content as
00905     * text/xml. When SimplePie reads in a feed, it does a bit of cleaning up
00906     * before trying to parse it. Many parts of the feed are re-written in
00907     * memory, and in the end, you have a parsable feed. XML dump shows you the
00908     * actual XML that SimplePie tries to parse, which may or may not be very
00909     * different from the original feed.
00910     *
00911     * @access public
00912     * @since 1.0 Preview Release
00913     * @param bool $enable Enable XML dump
00914     */
00915    function enable_xml_dump($enable = false)
00916    {
00917       $this->xml_dump = (bool) $enable;
00918    }
00919 
00920    /**
00921     * Enables/disables caching in SimplePie.
00922     *
00923     * This option allows you to disable caching all-together in SimplePie.
00924     * However, disabling the cache can lead to longer load times.
00925     *
00926     * @access public
00927     * @since 1.0 Preview Release
00928     * @param bool $enable Enable caching
00929     */
00930    function enable_cache($enable = true)
00931    {
00932       $this->cache = (bool) $enable;
00933    }
00934 
00935    /**
00936     * Set the length of time (in seconds) that the contents of a feed
00937     * will be cached.
00938     *
00939     * @access public
00940     * @param int $seconds The feed content cache duration.
00941     */
00942    function set_cache_duration($seconds = 3600)
00943    {
00944       $this->cache_duration = (int) $seconds;
00945    }
00946 
00947    /**
00948     * Set the length of time (in seconds) that the autodiscovered feed
00949     * URL will be cached.
00950     *
00951     * @access public
00952     * @param int $seconds The autodiscovered feed URL cache duration.
00953     */
00954    function set_autodiscovery_cache_duration($seconds = 604800)
00955    {
00956       $this->autodiscovery_cache_duration = (int) $seconds;
00957    }
00958 
00959    /**
00960     * Set the file system location where the cached files should be stored.
00961     *
00962     * @access public
00963     * @param string $location The file system location.
00964     */
00965    function set_cache_location($location = './cache')
00966    {
00967       $this->cache_location = (string) $location;
00968    }
00969 
00970    /**
00971     * Determines whether feed items should be sorted into reverse chronological order.
00972     *
00973     * @access public
00974     * @param bool $enable Sort as reverse chronological order.
00975     */
00976    function enable_order_by_date($enable = true)
00977    {
00978       $this->order_by_date = (bool) $enable;
00979    }
00980 
00981    /**
00982     * Allows you to override the character encoding reported by the feed.
00983     *
00984     * @access public
00985     * @param string $encoding Character encoding.
00986     */
00987    function set_input_encoding($encoding = false)
00988    {
00989       if ($encoding)
00990       {
00991          $this->input_encoding = (string) $encoding;
00992       }
00993       else
00994       {
00995          $this->input_encoding = false;
00996       }
00997    }
00998 
00999    /**
01000     * Set how much feed autodiscovery to do
01001     *
01002     * @access public
01003     * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_NONE
01004     * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_AUTODISCOVERY
01005     * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_EXTENSION
01006     * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_BODY
01007     * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_EXTENSION
01008     * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_BODY
01009     * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL
01010     * @param int $level Feed Autodiscovery Level (level can be a
01011     * combination of the above constants, see bitwise OR operator)
01012     */
01013    function set_autodiscovery_level($level = SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL)
01014    {
01015       $this->autodiscovery = (int) $level;
01016    }
01017 
01018    /**
01019     * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for caching.
01020     * Useful when you are overloading or extending SimplePie's default classes.
01021     *
01022     * @access public
01023     * @param string $class Name of custom class.
01024     * @link http://php.net/manual/en/keyword.extends.php PHP4 extends documentation
01025     * @link http://php.net/manual/en/language.oop5.basic.php#language.oop5.basic.extends PHP5 extends documentation
01026     */
01027    function set_cache_class($class = 'SimplePie_Cache')
01028    {
01029       if (SimplePie_Misc::is_subclass_of($class, 'SimplePie_Cache'))
01030       {
01031          $this->cache_class = $class;
01032          return true;
01033       }
01034       return false;
01035    }
01036 
01037    /**
01038     * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for auto-discovery.
01039     * Useful when you are overloading or extending SimplePie's default classes.
01040     *
01041     * @access public
01042     * @param string $class Name of custom class.
01043     * @link http://php.net/manual/en/keyword.extends.php PHP4 extends documentation
01044     * @link http://php.net/manual/en/language.oop5.basic.php#language.oop5.basic.extends PHP5 extends documentation
01045     */
01046    function set_locator_class($class = 'SimplePie_Locator')
01047    {
01048       if (SimplePie_Misc::is_subclass_of($class, 'SimplePie_Locator'))
01049       {
01050          $this->locator_class = $class;
01051          return true;
01052       }
01053       return false;
01054    }
01055

01067       if (SimplePie_Misc::is_subclass_of($class, 'SimplePie_Parser'))

01070          return true;

01100     * @link http://php.net/manual/en/keyword.extends.php PHP4 extends documentation

01104    {
01105       if (SimplePie_Misc::is_subclass_of($class, 'SimplePie_Sanitize'))
01106       {
01107          $this->sanitize =& new $class;
01108          return true;
01109       }
01110       return false;

01298          return true;

01300       return false;

01303    /**
01304     * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses item sources.
01305     * Useful when you are overloading or extending SimplePie's default classes.
01306     *
01307     * @access public
01308     * @param string $class Name of custom class.
01309     * @link http://php.net/manual/en/keyword.extends.php PHP4 extends documentation
01310     * @link http://php.net/manual/en/language.oop5.basic.php#language.oop5.basic.extends PHP5 extends documentation
01311     */
01312    function set_source_class($class = 'SimplePie_Source')
01313    {
01314       if (SimplePie_Misc::is_subclass_of($class, 'SimplePie_Source'))
01315       {
01316          $this->source_class = $class;
01317          return true;
01318       }
01319       return false;
01320    }
01321 
01322    /**
01323     * Allows you to override the default user agent string.
01324     *
01325     * @access public
01326     * @param string $ua New user agent string.
01327     */
01328    function set_useragent($ua = SIMPLEPIE_USERAGENT)
01329    {
01330       $this->useragent = (string) $ua;
01331    }
01332 
01333    /**
01334     * Set callback function to create cache filename with
01335     *
01336     * @access public
01337     * @param mixed $function Callback function
01338     */
01339    function set_cache_name_function($function = 'md5')
01340    {
01341       if (is_callable($function))
01342       {
01343          $this->cache_name_function = $function;
01344       }
01345    }
01346 
01347    /**
01348     * Set javascript query string parameter
01349     *
01350     * @access public
01351     * @param mixed $get Javascript query string parameter
01352     */
01353    function set_javascript($get = 'js')
01354    {
01355       if ($get)
01356       {
01357          $this->javascript = (string) $get;
01358       }
01359       else
01360       {
01361          $this->javascript = false;
01362       }
01363    }
01364 
01365    /**
01366     * Set options to make SP as fast as possible.  Forgoes a
01367     * substantial amount of data sanitization in favor of speed.
01368     *
01369     * @access public
01370     * @param bool $set Whether to set them or not
01371     */
01372    function set_stupidly_fast($set = false)
01373    {
01374       if ($set)
01375       {
01376          $this->enable_order_by_date(false);
01377          $this->remove_div(false);
01378          $this->strip_comments(false);
01379          $this->strip_htmltags(false);
01380          $this->strip_attributes(false);
01381          $this->set_image_handler(false);
01382       }
01383    }
01384 
01385    /**
01386     * Set maximum number of feeds to check with autodiscovery
01387     *
01388     * @access public
01389     * @param int $max Maximum number of feeds to check
01390     */
01391    function set_max_checked_feeds($max = 10)
01392    {
01393       $this->max_checked_feeds = (int) $max;
01394    }
01395 
01396    function remove_div($enable = true)
01397    {
01398       $this->sanitize->remove_div($enable);
01399    }
01400 
01401    function strip_htmltags($tags = '', $encode = null)
01402    {
01403       if ($tags === '')
01404       {
01405          $tags = $this->strip_htmltags;
01406       }
01407       $this->sanitize->strip_htmltags($tags);
01408       if ($encode !== null)
01409       {
01410          $this->sanitize->encode_instead_of_strip($tags);
01411       }
01412    }
01413 
01414    function encode_instead_of_strip($enable = true)
01415    {
01416       $this->sanitize->encode_instead_of_strip($enable);
01417    }
01418 
01419    function strip_attributes($attribs = '')
01420    {
01421       if ($attribs === '')
01422       {
01423          $attribs = $this->strip_attributes;
01424       }
01425       $this->sanitize->strip_attributes($attribs);
01426    }
01427 
01428    function set_output_encoding($encoding = 'UTF-8')
01429    {
01430       $this->sanitize->set_output_encoding($encoding);
01431    }
01432 
01433    function strip_comments($strip = false)
01434    {
01435       $this->sanitize->strip_comments($strip);
01436    }
01437 
01438    /**
01439     * Set element/attribute key/value pairs of HTML attributes
01440     * containing URLs that need to be resolved relative to the feed
01441     *
01442     * @access public
01443     * @since 1.0
01444     * @param array $element_attribute Element/attribute key/value pairs
01445     */
01446    function set_url_replacements($element_attribute = array('a' => 'href', 'area' => 'href', 'blockquote' => 'cite', 'del' => 'cite', 'form' => 'action', 'img' => array('longdesc', 'src'), 'input' => 'src', 'ins' => 'cite', 'q' => 'cite'))
01447    {
01448       $this->sanitize->set_url_replacements($element_attribute);
01449    }
01450 
01451    /**
01452     * Set the handler to enable the display of cached favicons.
01453     *
01454     * @access public
01455     * @param str $page Web-accessible path to the handler_favicon.php file.
01456     * @param str $qs The query string that the value should be passed to.
01457     */
01458    function set_favicon_handler($page = false, $qs = 'i')
01459    {
01460       if ($page !== false)
01461       {
01462          $this->favicon_handler = $page . '?' . $qs . '=';
01463       }
01464       else
01465       {
01466          $this->favicon_handler = '';
01467       }
01468    }
01469 
01470    /**
01471     * Set the handler to enable the display of cached images.
01472     *
01473     * @access public
01474     * @param str $page Web-accessible path to the handler_image.php file.
01475     * @param str $qs The query string that the value should be passed to.
01476     */
01477    function set_image_handler($page = false, $qs = 'i')
01478    {
01479       if ($page !== false)
01480       {
01481          $this->sanitize->set_image_handler($page . '?' . $qs . '=');
01482       }
01483       else
01484       {
01485          $this->image_handler = '';
01486       }
01487    }
01488 
01489    /**
01490     * Set the limit for items returned per-feed with multifeeds.
01491     *
01492     * @access public
01493     * @param integer $limit The maximum number of items to return.
01494     */
01495    function set_item_limit($limit = 0)
01496    {
01497       $this->item_limit = (int) $limit;
01498    }
01499 
01500    function init()
01501    {
01502       // Check absolute bare minimum requirements.
01503       if ((function_exists('version_compare') && version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '4.3.0', '<')) || !extension_loaded('xml') || !extension_loaded('pcre'))
01504       {
01505          return false;
01506       }
01507       // Then check the xml extension is sane (i.e., libxml 2.7.x issue on PHP < 5.2.9 and libxml 2.7.0 to 2.7.2 on any version) if we don't have xmlreader.
01508       elseif (!extension_loaded('xmlreader'))
01509       {
01510          static $xml_is_sane = null;
01511          if ($xml_is_sane === null)
01512          {
01513             $parser_check = xml_parser_create();
01514             xml_parse_into_struct($parser_check, '<foo>&amp;</foo>', $values);
01515             xml_parser_free($parser_check);
01516             $xml_is_sane = isset($values[0]['value']);
01517          }
01518          if (!$xml_is_sane)
01519          {
01520             return false;
01521          }
01522       }
01523 
01524       if (isset($_GET[$this->javascript]))
01525       {
01526          SimplePie_Misc::output_javascript();
01527          exit;
01528       }
01529 
01530       // Pass whatever was set with config options over to the sanitizer.
01531       $this->sanitize->pass_cache_data($this->cache, $this->cache_location, $this->cache_name_function, $this->cache_class);
01532       $this->sanitize->pass_file_data($this->file_class, $this->timeout, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01533 
01534       if ($this->feed_url !== null || $this->raw_data !== null)
01535       {
01536          $this->data = array();
01537          $this->multifeed_objects = array();
01538          $cache = false;
01539 
01540          if ($this->feed_url !== null)
01541          {
01542             $parsed_feed_url = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($this->feed_url);
01543             // Decide whether to enable caching
01544             if ($this->cache && $parsed_feed_url['scheme'] !== '')
01545             {
01546                $cache = call_user_func(array($this->cache_class, 'create'), $this->cache_location, call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $this->feed_url), 'spc');
01547             }
01548             // If it's enabled and we don't want an XML dump, use the cache
01549             if ($cache && !$this->xml_dump)
01550             {
01551                // Load the Cache
01552                $this->data = $cache->load();
01553                if (!empty($this->data))
01554                {
01555                   // If the cache is for an outdated build of SimplePie
01556                   if (!isset($this->data['build']) || $this->data['build'] !== SIMPLEPIE_BUILD)
01557                   {
01558                      $cache->unlink();
01559                      $this->data = array();
01560                   }
01561                   // If we've hit a collision just rerun it with caching disabled
01562                   elseif (isset($this->data['url']) && $this->data['url'] !== $this->feed_url)
01563                   {
01564                      $cache = false;
01565                      $this->data = array();
01566                   }
01567                   // If we've got a non feed_url stored (if the page isn't actually a feed, or is a redirect) use that URL.
01568                   elseif (isset($this->data['feed_url']))
01569                   {
01570                      // If the autodiscovery cache is still valid use it.
01571                      if ($cache->mtime() + $this->autodiscovery_cache_duration > time())
01572                      {
01573                         // Do not need to do feed autodiscovery yet.
01574                         if ($this->data['feed_url'] === $this->data['url'])
01575                         {
01576                            $cache->unlink();
01577                            $this->data = array();
01578                         }
01579                         else
01580                         {
01581                            $this->set_feed_url($this->data['feed_url']);
01582                            return $this->init();
01583                         }
01584                      }
01585                   }
01586                   // Check if the cache has been updated
01587                   elseif ($cache->mtime() + $this->cache_duration < time())
01588                   {
01589                      // If we have last-modified and/or etag set
01590                      if (isset($this->data['headers']['last-modified']) || isset($this->data['headers']['etag']))
01591                      {
01592                         $headers = array();
01593                         if (isset($this->data['headers']['last-modified']))
01594                         {
01595                            $headers['if-modified-since'] = $this->data['headers']['last-modified'];
01596                         }
01597                         if (isset($this->data['headers']['etag']))
01598                         {
01599                            $headers['if-none-match'] = '"' . $this->data['headers']['etag'] . '"';
01600                         }
01601                         $file =& new $this->file_class($this->feed_url, $this->timeout/10, 5, $headers, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01602                         if ($file->success)
01603                         {
01604                            if ($file->status_code === 304)
01605                            {
01606                               $cache->touch();
01607                               return true;
01608                            }
01609                            else
01610                            {
01611                               $headers = $file->headers;
01612                            }
01613                         }
01614                         else
01615                         {
01616                            unset($file);
01617                         }
01618                      }
01619                   }
01620                   // If the cache is still valid, just return true
01621                   else
01622                   {
01623                      return true;
01624                   }
01625                }
01626                // If the cache is empty, delete it
01627                else
01628                {
01629                   $cache->unlink();
01630                   $this->data = array();
01631                }
01632             }
01633             // If we don't already have the file (it'll only exist if we've opened it to check if the cache has been modified), open it.
01634             if (!isset($file))
01635             {
01636                if (is_a($this->file, 'SimplePie_File') && $this->file->url === $this->feed_url)
01637                {
01638                   $file =& $this->file;
01639                }
01640                else
01641                {
01642                   $file =& new $this->file_class($this->feed_url, $this->timeout, 5, null, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01643                }
01644             }
01645             // If the file connection has an error, set SimplePie::error to that and quit
01646             if (!$file->success && !($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($file->status_code === 200 || $file->status_code > 206 && $file->status_code < 300)))
01647             {
01648                $this->error = $file->error;
01649                if (!empty($this->data))
01650                {
01651                   return true;
01652                }
01653                else
01654                {
01655                   return false;
01656                }
01657             }
01658 
01659             if (!$this->force_feed)
01660             {
01661                // Check if the supplied URL is a feed, if it isn't, look for it.
01662                $locate =& new $this->locator_class($file, $this->timeout, $this->useragent, $this->file_class, $this->max_checked_feeds, $this->content_type_sniffer_class);
01663                if (!$locate->is_feed($file))
01664                {
01665                   // We need to unset this so that if SimplePie::set_file() has been called that object is untouched
01666                   unset($file);
01667                   if ($file = $locate->find($this->autodiscovery, $this->all_discovered_feeds))
01668                   {
01669                      if ($cache)
01670                      {
01671                         $this->data = array('url' => $this->feed_url, 'feed_url' => $file->url, 'build' => SIMPLEPIE_BUILD);
01672                         if (!$cache->save($this))
01673                         {
01674                            trigger_error("$this->cache_location is not writeable", E_USER_WARNING);
01675                         }
01676                         $cache = call_user_func(array($this->cache_class, 'create'), $this->cache_location, call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $file->url), 'spc');
01677                      }
01678                      $this->feed_url = $file->url;
01679                   }
01680                   else
01681                   {
01682                      $this->error = "A feed could not be found at $this->feed_url";
01683                      SimplePie_Misc::error($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__);
01684                      return false;
01685                   }
01686                }
01687                $locate = null;
01688             }
01689 
01690             $headers = $file->headers;
01691             $data = $file->body;
01692             $sniffer =& new $this->content_type_sniffer_class($file);
01693             $sniffed = $sniffer->get_type();
01694          }
01695          else
01696          {
01697             $data = $this->raw_data;
01698          }
01699 
01700          // Set up array of possible encodings
01701          $encodings = array();
01702 
01703          // First check to see if input has been overridden.
01704          if ($this->input_encoding !== false)
01705          {
01706             $encodings[] = $this->input_encoding;
01707          }
01708 
01709          $application_types = array('application/xml', 'application/xml-dtd', 'application/xml-external-parsed-entity');
01710          $text_types = array('text/xml', 'text/xml-external-parsed-entity');
01711 
01712          // RFC 3023 (only applies to sniffed content)
01713          if (isset($sniffed))
01714          {
01715             if (in_array($sniffed, $application_types) || substr($sniffed, 0, 12) === 'application/' && substr($sniffed, -4) === '+xml')
01716             {
01717                if (isset($headers['content-type']) && preg_match('/;\x20?charset=([^;]*)/i', $headers['content-type'], $charset))
01718                {
01719                   $encodings[] = strtoupper($charset[1]);
01720                }
01721                $encodings = array_merge($encodings, SimplePie_Misc::xml_encoding($data));
01722                $encodings[] = 'UTF-8';
01723             }
01724             elseif (in_array($sniffed, $text_types) || substr($sniffed, 0, 5) === 'text/' && substr($sniffed, -4) === '+xml')
01725             {
01726                if (isset($headers['content-type']) && preg_match('/;\x20?charset=([^;]*)/i', $headers['content-type'], $charset))
01727                {
01728                   $encodings[] = $charset[1];
01729                }
01730                $encodings[] = 'US-ASCII';
01731             }
01732             // Text MIME-type default
01733             elseif (substr($sniffed, 0, 5) === 'text/')
01734             {
01735                $encodings[] = 'US-ASCII';
01736             }
01737          }
01738 
01739          // Fallback to XML 1.0 Appendix F.1/UTF-8/ISO-8859-1
01740          $encodings = array_merge($encodings, SimplePie_Misc::xml_encoding($data));
01741          $encodings[] = 'UTF-8';
01742          $encodings[] = 'ISO-8859-1';
01743 
01744          // There's no point in trying an encoding twice
01745          $encodings = array_unique($encodings);
01746 
01747          // If we want the XML, just output that with the most likely encoding and quit
01748          if ($this->xml_dump)
01749          {
01750             header('Content-type: text/xml; charset=' . $encodings[0]);
01751             echo $data;
01752             exit;
01753          }
01754 
01755          // Loop through each possible encoding, till we return something, or run out of possibilities
01756          foreach ($encodings as $encoding)
01757          {
01758             // Change the encoding to UTF-8 (as we always use UTF-8 internally)
01759             if ($utf8_data = SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding($data, $encoding, 'UTF-8'))
01760             {
01761                // Create new parser
01762                $parser =& new $this->parser_class();
01763 
01764                // If it's parsed fine
01765                if ($parser->parse($utf8_data, 'UTF-8'))
01766                {
01767                   $this->data = $parser->get_data();
01768                   if ($this->get_type() & ~SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_NONE)
01769                   {
01770                      if (isset($headers))
01771                      {
01772                         $this->data['headers'] = $headers;
01773                      }
01774                      $this->data['build'] = SIMPLEPIE_BUILD;
01775 
01776                      // Cache the file if caching is enabled
01777                      if ($cache && !$cache->save($this))
01778                      {
01779                         trigger_error("$cache->name is not writeable", E_USER_WARNING);
01780                      }
01781                      return true;
01782                   }
01783                   else
01784                   {
01785                      $this->error = "A feed could not be found at $this->feed_url";
01786                      SimplePie_Misc::error($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__);
01787                      return false;
01788                   }
01789                }
01790             }
01791          }
01792          if(isset($parser))
01793          {
01794             // We have an error, just set SimplePie_Misc::error to it and quit
01795             $this->error = sprintf('XML error: %s at line %d, column %d', $parser->get_error_string(), $parser->get_current_line(), $parser->get_current_column());
01796          }
01797          else
01798          {
01799             $this->error = 'The data could not be converted to UTF-8';
01800          }
01801          SimplePie_Misc::error($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__);
01802          return false;
01803       }
01804       elseif (!empty($this->multifeed_url))
01805       {
01806          $i = 0;
01807          $success = 0;
01808          $this->multifeed_objects = array();
01809          foreach ($this->multifeed_url as $url)
01810          {
01811             if (SIMPLEPIE_PHP5)
01812             {
01813                // This keyword needs to defy coding standards for PHP4 compatibility
01814                $this->multifeed_objects[$i] = clone($this);
01815             }
01816             else
01817             {
01818                $this->multifeed_objects[$i] = $this;
01819             }
01820             $this->multifeed_objects[$i]->set_feed_url($url);
01821             $success |= $this->multifeed_objects[$i]->init();
01822             $i++;
01823          }
01824          return (bool) $success;
01825       }
01826       else
01827       {
01828          return false;
01829       }
01830    }
01831 
01832    /**
01833     * Return the error message for the occured error
01834     *
01835     * @access public
01836     * @return string Error message
01837     */
01838    function error()
01839    {
01840       return $this->error;
01841    }
01842 
01843    function get_encoding()
01844    {
01845       return $this->sanitize->output_encoding;
01846    }
01847 
01848    function handle_content_type($mime = 'text/html')
01849    {
01850       if (!headers_sent())
01851       {
01852          $header = "Content-type: $mime;";
01853          if ($this->get_encoding())
01854          {
01855             $header .= ' charset=' . $this->get_encoding();
01856          }
01857          else
01858          {
01859             $header .= ' charset=UTF-8';
01860          }
01861          header($header);
01862       }
01863    }
01864 
01865    function get_type()
01866    {
01867       if (!isset($this->data['type']))
01868       {
01869          $this->data['type'] = SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ALL;
01870          if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed']))
01871          {
01872             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_10;
01873          }
01874          elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed']))
01875          {
01876             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_03;
01877          }
01878          elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF']))
01879          {
01880             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['channel'])
01881             || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['image'])
01882             || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['item'])
01883             || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['textinput']))
01884             {
01885                $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10;
01886             }
01887             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['channel'])
01888             || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['image'])
01889             || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['item'])
01890             || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['textinput']))
01891             {
01892                $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090;
01893             }
01894          }
01895          elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss']))
01896          {
01897             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_ALL;
01898             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['attribs']['']['version']))
01899             {
01900                switch (trim($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['attribs']['']['version']))
01901                {
01902                   case '0.91':
01903                      $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091;
01904                      if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['skiphours']['hour'][0]['data']))
01905                      {
01906                         switch (trim($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['skiphours']['hour'][0]['data']))
01907                         {
01908                            case '0':
01909                               $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_NETSCAPE;
01910                               break;
01911 
01912                            case '24':
01913                               $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_USERLAND;
01914                               break;
01915                         }
01916                      }
01917                      break;
01918 
01919                   case '0.92':
01920                      $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_092;
01921                      break;
01922 
01923                   case '0.93':
01924                      $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_093;
01925                      break;
01926 
01927                   case '0.94':
01928                      $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_094;
01929                      break;
01930 
01931                   case '2.0':
01932                      $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_20;
01933                      break;
01934                }
01935             }
01936          }
01937          else
01938          {
01939             $this->data['type'] = SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_NONE;
01940          }
01941       }
01942       return $this->data['type'];
01943    }
01944 
01945    /**
01946     * Returns the URL for the favicon of the feed's website.
01947     *
01948     * @todo Cache atom:icon
01949     * @access public
01950     * @since 1.0
01951     */
01952    function get_favicon()
01953    {
01954       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
01955       {
01956          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
01957       }
01958       elseif (($url = $this->get_link()) !== null && preg_match('/^http(s)?:\/\//i', $url))
01959       {
01960          $favicon = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url('/favicon.ico', $url);
01961 
01962          if ($this->cache && $this->favicon_handler)
01963          {
01964             $favicon_filename = call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $favicon);
01965             $cache = call_user_func(array($this->cache_class, 'create'), $this->cache_location, $favicon_filename, 'spi');
01966 
01967             if ($cache->load())
01968             {
01969                return $this->sanitize($this->favicon_handler . $favicon_filename, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
01970             }
01971             else
01972             {
01973                $file =& new $this->file_class($favicon, $this->timeout / 10, 5, array('X-FORWARDED-FOR' => $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']), $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
01974 
01975                if ($file->success && ($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($file->status_code === 200 || $file->status_code > 206 && $file->status_code < 300)) && strlen($file->body) > 0)
01976                {
01977                   $sniffer =& new $this->content_type_sniffer_class($file);
01978                   if (substr($sniffer->get_type(), 0, 6) === 'image/')
01979                   {
01980                      if ($cache->save(array('headers' => $file->headers, 'body' => $file->body)))
01981                      {
01982                         return $this->sanitize($this->favicon_handler . $favicon_filename, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
01983                      }
01984                      else
01985                      {
01986                         trigger_error("$cache->name is not writeable", E_USER_WARNING);
01987                         return $this->sanitize($favicon, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
01988                      }
01989                   }
01990                   // not an image
01991                   else
01992                   {
01993                      return false;
01994                   }
01995                }
01996             }
01997          }
01998          else
01999          {
02000             return $this->sanitize($favicon, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02001          }
02002       }
02003       return false;
02004    }
02005 
02006    /**
02007     * @todo If we have a perm redirect we should return the new URL
02008     * @todo When we make the above change, let's support <itunes:new-feed-url> as well
02009     * @todo Also, |atom:link|@rel=self
02010     */
02011    function subscribe_url()
02012    {
02013       if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02014       {
02015          return $this->sanitize($this->feed_url, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02016       }
02017       else
02018       {
02019          return null;
02020       }
02021    }
02022 
02023    function subscribe_feed()
02024    {
02025       if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02026       {
02027          return $this->sanitize(SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 2), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02028       }
02029       else
02030       {
02031          return null;
02032       }
02033    }
02034 
02035    function subscribe_outlook()
02036    {
02037       if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02038       {
02039          return $this->sanitize('outlook' . SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 2), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02040       }
02041       else
02042       {
02043          return null;
02044       }
02045    }
02046 
02047    function subscribe_podcast()
02048    {
02049       if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02050       {
02051          return $this->sanitize(SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 3), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02052       }
02053       else
02054       {
02055          return null;
02056       }
02057    }
02058 
02059    function subscribe_itunes()
02060    {
02061       if ($this->feed_url !== null)
02062       {
02063          return $this->sanitize(SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol($this->feed_url, 4), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02064       }
02065       else
02066       {
02067          return null;
02068       }
02069    }
02070 
02071    /**
02072     * Creates the subscribe_* methods' return data
02073     *
02074     * @access private
02075     * @param string $feed_url String to prefix to the feed URL
02076     * @param string $site_url String to prefix to the site URL (and
02077     * suffix to the feed URL)
02078     * @return mixed URL if feed exists, false otherwise
02079     */
02080    function subscribe_service($feed_url, $site_url = null)
02081    {
02082       if ($this->subscribe_url())
02083       {
02084          $return = $feed_url . rawurlencode($this->feed_url);
02085          if ($site_url !== null && $this->get_link() !== null)
02086          {
02087             $return .= $site_url . rawurlencode($this->get_link());
02088          }
02089          return $this->sanitize($return, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02090       }
02091       else
02092       {
02093          return null;
02094       }
02095    }
02096 
02097    function subscribe_aol()
02098    {
02099       return $this->subscribe_service('http://feeds.my.aol.com/add.jsp?url=');
02100    }
02101 
02102    function subscribe_bloglines()
02103    {
02104       return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.bloglines.com/sub/');
02105    }
02106 
02107    function subscribe_eskobo()
02108    {
02109       return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.eskobo.com/?AddToMyPage=');
02110    }
02111 
02112    function subscribe_feedfeeds()
02113    {
02114       return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.feedfeeds.com/add?feed=');
02115    }
02116 
02117    function subscribe_feedster()
02118    {
02119       return $this->subscribe_service('http://www.feedster.com/myfeedster.php?action=addrss&confirm=no&rssurl=');
02120    }
02121 
02122    function subscribe_google()
02123    {
02124       return $this->subscribe_service('http://fusion.google.com/add?feedurl=');
02125    }

02128    {
02129       return $this->subscribe_service('http://my.gritwire.com/feeds/addExternalFeed.aspx?FeedUrl=');
02130    }

02135    }

02168    {
02169       return $this->subscribe_service('http://add.my.yahoo.com/rss?url=');
02170    }
02171 
02172    function get_feed_tags($namespace, $tag)
02173    {
02174       $type = $this->get_type();
02175       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_10)
02176       {
02177          if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02178          {
02179             return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02180          }
02181       }
02182       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_03)
02183       {
02184          if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02185          {
02186             return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02187          }
02188       }
02189       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_RDF)
02190       {
02191          if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02192          {
02193             return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02194          }
02195       }
02196       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
02197       {
02198          if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02199          {
02200             return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02201          }
02202       }
02203       return null;
02204    }
02205 
02206    function get_channel_tags($namespace, $tag)
02207    {
02208       $type = $this->get_type();
02209       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_ALL)
02210       {
02211          if ($return = $this->get_feed_tags($namespace, $tag))
02212          {
02213             return $return;
02214          }
02215       }
02216       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10)
02217       {
02218          if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'channel'))
02219          {
02220             if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02221             {
02222                return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02223             }
02224          }
02225       }
02226       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090)
02227       {
02228          if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'channel'))
02229          {
02230             if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02231             {
02232                return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02233             }
02234          }
02235       }
02236       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
02237       {
02238          if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'channel'))
02239          {
02240             if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02241             {
02242                return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02243             }
02244          }
02245       }
02246       return null;
02247    }
02248 
02249    function get_image_tags($namespace, $tag)
02250    {
02251       $type = $this->get_type();
02252       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10)
02253       {
02254          if ($image = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'image'))
02255          {
02256             if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02257             {
02258                return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02259             }
02260          }
02261       }
02262       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090)
02263       {
02264          if ($image = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'image'))
02265          {
02266             if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02267             {
02268                return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02269             }
02270          }
02271       }
02272       if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
02273       {
02274          if ($image = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'image'))
02275          {
02276             if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
02277             {
02278                return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
02279             }
02280          }
02281       }
02282       return null;
02283    }
02284 
02285    function get_base($element = array())
02286    {
02287       if (!($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION) && !empty($element['xml_base_explicit']) && isset($element['xml_base']))
02288       {
02289          return $element['xml_base'];
02290       }
02291       elseif ($this->get_link() !== null)
02292       {
02293          return $this->get_link();
02294       }
02295       else
02296       {
02297          return $this->subscribe_url();
02298       }
02299    }
02300 
02301    function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
02302    {
02303       return $this->sanitize->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
02304    }
02305 
02306    function get_title()
02307    {
02308       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
02309       {
02310          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02311       }
02312       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
02313       {
02314          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02315       }
02316       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
02317       {
02318          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02319       }
02320       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
02321       {
02322          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02323       }
02324       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
02325       {
02326          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02327       }
02328       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
02329       {
02330          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02331       }
02332       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
02333       {
02334          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02335       }
02336       else
02337       {
02338          return null;
02339       }
02340    }
02341 
02342    function get_category($key = 0)
02343    {
02344       $categories = $this->get_categories();
02345       if (isset($categories[$key]))
02346       {
02347          return $categories[$key];
02348       }
02349       else
02350       {
02351          return null;
02352       }
02353    }
02354 
02355    function get_categories()
02356    {
02357       $categories = array();
02358 
02359       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
02360       {
02361          $term = null;
02362          $scheme = null;
02363          $label = null;
02364          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
02365          {
02366             $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02367          }
02368          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
02369          {
02370             $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02371          }
02372          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
02373          {
02374             $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02375          }
02376          $categories[] =& new $this->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
02377       }
02378       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
02379       {
02380          // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
02381          // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
02382          $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02383          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
02384          {
02385             $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02386          }
02387          else
02388          {
02389             $scheme = null;
02390          }
02391          $categories[] =& new $this->category_class($term, $scheme, null);
02392       }
02393       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
02394       {
02395          $categories[] =& new $this->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02396       }
02397       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
02398       {
02399          $categories[] =& new $this->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02400       }
02401 
02402       if (!empty($categories))
02403       {
02404          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories);
02405       }
02406       else
02407       {
02408          return null;
02409       }
02410    }
02411 
02412    function get_author($key = 0)
02413    {
02414       $authors = $this->get_authors();
02415       if (isset($authors[$key]))
02416       {
02417          return $authors[$key];
02418       }
02419       else
02420       {
02421          return null;
02422       }
02423    }
02424 
02425    function get_authors()
02426    {
02427       $authors = array();
02428       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
02429       {
02430          $name = null;
02431          $uri = null;
02432          $email = null;
02433          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
02434          {
02435             $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02436          }
02437          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
02438          {
02439             $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
02440          }
02441          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
02442          {
02443             $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02444          }
02445          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
02446          {
02447             $authors[] =& new $this->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
02448          }
02449       }
02450       if ($author = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
02451       {
02452          $name = null;
02453          $url = null;
02454          $email = null;
02455          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
02456          {
02457             $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02458          }
02459          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
02460          {
02461             $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
02462          }
02463          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
02464          {
