02465             $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02466          }
02467          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
02468          {
02469             $authors[] =& new $this->author_class($name, $url, $email);
02470          }
02471       }
02472       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
02473       {
02474          $authors[] =& new $this->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02475       }
02476       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
02477       {
02478          $authors[] =& new $this->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02479       }
02480       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
02481       {
02482          $authors[] =& new $this->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
02483       }
02484 
02485       if (!empty($authors))
02486       {
02487          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($authors);
02488       }
02489       else
02490       {
02491          return null;
02492       }
02493    }
02494 
02495    function get_contributor($key = 0)
02496    {
02497       $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
02498       if (isset($contributors[$key]))
02499       {
02500          return $contributors[$key];
02501       }
02502       else
02503       {
02504          return null;
02505       }
02506    }
02507 
02508    function get_contributors()
02509    {
02510       $contributors = array();
02511       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
02512       {
02513          $name = null;
02514          $uri = null;
02515          $email = null;
02516          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
02517          {
02518             $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02519          }
02520          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
02521          {
02522             $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
02523          }
02524          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
02525          {
02526             $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02527          }
02528          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
02529          {
02530             $contributors[] =& new $this->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
02531          }
02532       }
02533       foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
02534       {
02535          $name = null;
02536          $url = null;
02537          $email = null;
02538          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
02539          {
02540             $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02541          }
02542          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
02543          {
02544             $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
02545          }
02546          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
02547          {
02548             $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02549          }
02550          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
02551          {
02552             $contributors[] =& new $this->author_class($name, $url, $email);
02553          }
02554       }
02555 
02556       if (!empty($contributors))
02557       {
02558          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($contributors);
02559       }
02560       else
02561       {
02562          return null;
02563       }
02564    }
02565 
02566    function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
02567    {
02568       $links = $this->get_links($rel);
02569       if (isset($links[$key]))
02570       {
02571          return $links[$key];
02572       }
02573       else
02574       {
02575          return null;
02576       }
02577    }
02578 
02579    /**
02580     * Added for parity between the parent-level and the item/entry-level.
02581     */
02582    function get_permalink()
02583    {
02584       return $this->get_link(0);
02585    }
02586 
02587    function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
02588    {
02589       if (!isset($this->data['links']))
02590       {
02591          $this->data['links'] = array();
02592          if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link'))
02593          {
02594             foreach ($links as $link)
02595             {
02596                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
02597                {
02598                   $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
02599                   $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
02600                }
02601             }
02602          }
02603          if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link'))
02604          {
02605             foreach ($links as $link)
02606             {
02607                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
02608                {
02609                   $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
02610                   $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
02611 
02612                }
02613             }
02614          }
02615          if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
02616          {
02617             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
02618          }
02619          if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
02620          {
02621             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
02622          }
02623          if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
02624          {
02625             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
02626          }
02627 
02628          $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
02629          foreach ($keys as $key)
02630          {
02631             if (SimplePie_Misc::is_isegment_nz_nc($key))
02632             {
02633                if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
02634                {
02635                   $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
02636                   $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
02637                }
02638                else
02639                {
02640                   $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
02641                }
02642             }
02643             elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
02644             {
02645                $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
02646             }
02647             $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
02648          }
02649       }
02650 
02651       if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
02652       {
02653          return $this->data['links'][$rel];
02654       }
02655       else
02656       {
02657          return null;
02658       }
02659    }
02660 
02661    function get_all_discovered_feeds()
02662    {
02663       return $this->all_discovered_feeds;
02664    }
02665 
02666    function get_description()
02667    {
02668       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'subtitle'))
02669       {
02670          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02671       }
02672       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'tagline'))
02673       {
02674          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02675       }
02676       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
02677       {
02678          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02679       }
02680       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
02681       {
02682          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02683       }
02684       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
02685       {
02686          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02687       }
02688       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
02689       {
02690          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02691       }
02692       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
02693       {
02694          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02695       }
02696       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
02697       {
02698          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02699       }
02700       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
02701       {
02702          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02703       }
02704       else
02705       {
02706          return null;
02707       }
02708    }
02709 
02710    function get_copyright()
02711    {
02712       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
02713       {
02714          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02715       }
02716       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'copyright'))
02717       {
02718          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
02719       }
02720       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'copyright'))
02721       {
02722          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02723       }
02724       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
02725       {
02726          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02727       }
02728       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
02729       {
02730          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02731       }
02732       else
02733       {
02734          return null;
02735       }
02736    }
02737 
02738    function get_language()
02739    {
02740       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'language'))
02741       {
02742          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02743       }
02744       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'language'))
02745       {
02746          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02747       }
02748       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'language'))
02749       {
02750          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02751       }
02752       elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['xml_lang']))
02753       {
02754          return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02755       }
02756       elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['xml_lang']))
02757       {
02758          return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02759       }
02760       elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['xml_lang']))
02761       {
02762          return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02763       }
02764       elseif (isset($this->data['headers']['content-language']))
02765       {
02766          return $this->sanitize($this->data['headers']['content-language'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02767       }
02768       else
02769       {
02770          return null;
02771       }
02772    }
02773 
02774    function get_latitude()
02775    {
02776       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
02777       {
02778          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
02779       }
02780       elseif (($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', $return[0]['data'], $match))
02781       {
02782          return (float) $match[1];
02783       }
02784       else
02785       {
02786          return null;
02787       }
02788    }
02789 
02790    function get_longitude()
02791    {
02792       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
02793       {
02794          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
02795       }
02796       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
02797       {
02798          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
02799       }
02800       elseif (($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', $return[0]['data'], $match))
02801       {
02802          return (float) $match[2];
02803       }
02804       else
02805       {
02806          return null;
02807       }
02808    }
02809 
02810    function get_image_title()
02811    {
02812       if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
02813       {
02814          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02815       }
02816       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
02817       {
02818          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02819       }
02820       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
02821       {
02822          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02823       }
02824       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
02825       {
02826          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02827       }
02828       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
02829       {
02830          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
02831       }
02832       else
02833       {
02834          return null;
02835       }
02836    }
02837 
02838    function get_image_url()
02839    {
02840       if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'image'))
02841       {
02842          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
02843       }
02844       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'logo'))
02845       {
02846          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02847       }
02848       elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
02849       {
02850          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02851       }
02852       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'url'))
02853       {
02854          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02855       }
02856       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'url'))
02857       {
02858          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02859       }
02860       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
02861       {
02862          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02863       }
02864       else
02865       {
02866          return null;
02867       }
02868    }
02869 
02870    function get_image_link()
02871    {
02872       if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
02873       {
02874          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02875       }
02876       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
02877       {
02878          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02879       }
02880       elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
02881       {
02882          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
02883       }
02884       else
02885       {
02886          return null;
02887       }
02888    }
02889 
02890    function get_image_width()
02891    {
02892       if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'width'))
02893       {
02894          return round($return[0]['data']);
02895       }
02896       elseif ($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION && $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
02897       {
02898          return 88.0;
02899       }
02900       else
02901       {
02902          return null;
02903       }
02904    }
02905 
02906    function get_image_height()
02907    {
02908       if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'height'))
02909       {
02910          return round($return[0]['data']);
02911       }
02912       elseif ($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION && $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
02913       {
02914          return 31.0;
02915       }
02916       else
02917       {
02918          return null;
02919       }
02920    }
02921 
02922    function get_item_quantity($max = 0)
02923    {
02924       $max = (int) $max;
02925       $qty = count($this->get_items());
02926       if ($max === 0)
02927       {
02928          return $qty;
02929       }
02930       else
02931       {
02932          return ($qty > $max) ? $max : $qty;
02933       }
02934    }
02935 
02936    function get_item($key = 0)
02937    {
02938       $items = $this->get_items();
02939       if (isset($items[$key]))
02940       {
02941          return $items[$key];
02942       }
02943       else
02944       {
02945          return null;
02946       }
02947    }
02948 
02949    function get_items($start = 0, $end = 0)
02950    {
02951       if (!isset($this->data['items']))
02952       {
02953          if (!empty($this->multifeed_objects))
02954          {
02955             $this->data['items'] = SimplePie::merge_items($this->multifeed_objects, $start, $end, $this->item_limit);
02956          }
02957          else
02958          {
02959             $this->data['items'] = array();
02960             if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'entry'))
02961             {
02962                $keys = array_keys($items);
02963                foreach ($keys as $key)
02964                {
02965                   $this->data['items'][] =& new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02966                }
02967             }
02968             if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'entry'))
02969             {
02970                $keys = array_keys($items);
02971                foreach ($keys as $key)
02972                {
02973                   $this->data['items'][] =& new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02974                }
02975             }
02976             if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'item'))
02977             {
02978                $keys = array_keys($items);
02979                foreach ($keys as $key)
02980                {
02981                   $this->data['items'][] =& new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02982                }
02983             }
02984             if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'item'))
02985             {
02986                $keys = array_keys($items);
02987                foreach ($keys as $key)
02988                {
02989                   $this->data['items'][] =& new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02990                }
02991             }
02992             if ($items = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'item'))
02993             {
02994                $keys = array_keys($items);
02995                foreach ($keys as $key)
02996                {
02997                   $this->data['items'][] =& new $this->item_class($this, $items[$key]);
02998                }
02999             }
03000          }
03001       }
03002 
03003       if (!empty($this->data['items']))
03004       {
03005          // If we want to order it by date, check if all items have a date, and then sort it
03006          if ($this->order_by_date && empty($this->multifeed_objects))
03007          {
03008             if (!isset($this->data['ordered_items']))
03009             {
03010                $do_sort = true;
03011                foreach ($this->data['items'] as $item)
03012                {
03013                   if (!$item->get_date('U'))
03014                   {
03015                      $do_sort = false;
03016                      break;
03017                   }
03018                }
03019                $item = null;
03020                $this->data['ordered_items'] = $this->data['items'];
03021                if ($do_sort)
03022                {
03023                   usort($this->data['ordered_items'], array(&$this, 'sort_items'));
03024                }
03025             }
03026             $items = $this->data['ordered_items'];
03027          }
03028          else
03029          {
03030             $items = $this->data['items'];
03031          }
03032 
03033          // Slice the data as desired
03034          if ($end === 0)
03035          {
03036             return array_slice($items, $start);
03037          }
03038          else
03039          {
03040             return array_slice($items, $start, $end);
03041          }
03042       }
03043       else
03044       {
03045          return array();
03046       }
03047    }
03048 
03049    /**
03050     * @static
03051     */
03052    function sort_items($a, $b)
03053    {
03054       return $a->get_date('U') <= $b->get_date('U');
03055    }
03056 
03057    /**
03058     * @static
03059     */
03060    function merge_items($urls, $start = 0, $end = 0, $limit = 0)
03061    {
03062       if (is_array($urls) && sizeof($urls) > 0)
03063       {
03064          $items = array();
03065          foreach ($urls as $arg)
03066          {
03067             if (is_a($arg, 'SimplePie'))
03068             {
03069                $items = array_merge($items, $arg->get_items(0, $limit));
03070             }
03071             else
03072             {
03073                trigger_error('Arguments must be SimplePie objects', E_USER_WARNING);
03074             }
03075          }
03076 
03077          $do_sort = true;
03078          foreach ($items as $item)
03079          {
03080             if (!$item->get_date('U'))
03081             {
03082                $do_sort = false;
03083                break;
03084             }
03085          }
03086          $item = null;
03087          if ($do_sort)
03088          {
03089             usort($items, array('SimplePie', 'sort_items'));
03090          }
03091 
03092          if ($end === 0)
03093          {
03094             return array_slice($items, $start);
03095          }
03096          else
03097          {
03098             return array_slice($items, $start, $end);
03099          }
03100       }
03101       else
03102       {
03103          trigger_error('Cannot merge zero SimplePie objects', E_USER_WARNING);
03104          return array();
03105       }
03106    }
03107 }
03108 
03109 class SimplePie_Item
03110 {
03111    var $feed;
03112    var $data = array();
03113 
03114    function SimplePie_Item($feed, $data)
03115    {
03116       $this->feed = $feed;
03117       $this->data = $data;
03118    }
03119 
03120    function __toString()
03121    {
03122       return md5(serialize($this->data));
03123    }
03124 
03125    /**
03126     * Remove items that link back to this before destroying this object
03127     */
03128    function __destruct()
03129    {
03130       if ((version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.3', '<') || !gc_enabled()) && !ini_get('zend.ze1_compatibility_mode'))
03131       {
03132          unset($this->feed);
03133       }
03134    }
03135 
03136    function get_item_tags($namespace, $tag)
03137    {
03138       if (isset($this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
03139       {
03140          return $this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag];
03141       }
03142       else
03143       {
03144          return null;
03145       }
03146    }
03147 
03148    function get_base($element = array())
03149    {
03150       return $this->feed->get_base($element);
03151    }
03152 
03153    function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
03154    {
03155       return $this->feed->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
03156    }
03157 
03158    function get_feed()
03159    {
03160       return $this->feed;
03161    }
03162 
03163    function get_id($hash = false)
03164    {
03165       if (!$hash)
03166       {
03167          if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'id'))
03168          {
03169             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03170          }
03171          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'id'))
03172          {
03173             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03174          }
03175          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'guid'))
03176          {
03177             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03178          }
03179          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'identifier'))
03180          {
03181             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03182          }
03183          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'identifier'))
03184          {
03185             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03186          }
03187          elseif (($return = $this->get_permalink()) !== null)
03188          {
03189             return $return;
03190          }
03191          elseif (($return = $this->get_title()) !== null)
03192          {
03193             return $return;
03194          }
03195       }
03196       if ($this->get_permalink() !== null || $this->get_title() !== null)
03197       {
03198          return md5($this->get_permalink() . $this->get_title());
03199       }
03200       else
03201       {
03202          return md5(serialize($this->data));
03203       }
03204    }
03205 
03206    function get_title()
03207    {
03208       if (!isset($this->data['title']))
03209       {
03210          if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
03211          {
03212             $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03213          }
03214          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
03215          {
03216             $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03217          }
03218          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
03219          {
03220             $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03221          }
03222          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
03223          {
03224             $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03225          }
03226          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
03227          {
03228             $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03229          }
03230          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
03231          {
03232             $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03233          }
03234          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
03235          {
03236             $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03237          }
03238          else
03239          {
03240             $this->data['title'] = null;
03241          }
03242       }
03243       return $this->data['title'];
03244    }
03245 
03246    function get_description($description_only = false)
03247    {
03248       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'summary'))
03249       {
03250          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03251       }
03252       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'summary'))
03253       {
03254          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03255       }
03256       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
03257       {
03258          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03259       }
03260       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
03261       {
03262          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03263       }
03264       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
03265       {
03266          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03267       }
03268       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
03269       {
03270          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03271       }
03272       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
03273       {
03274          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03275       }
03276       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
03277       {
03278          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03279       }
03280       elseif (!$description_only)
03281       {
03282          return $this->get_content(true);
03283       }
03284       else
03285       {
03286          return null;
03287       }
03288    }
03289 
03290    function get_content($content_only = false)
03291    {
03292       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'content'))
03293       {
03294          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_content_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03295       }
03296       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'content'))
03297       {
03298          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03299       }
03300       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10_MODULES_CONTENT, 'encoded'))
03301       {
03302          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
03303       }
03304       elseif (!$content_only)
03305       {
03306          return $this->get_description(true);
03307       }
03308       else
03309       {
03310          return null;
03311       }
03312    }
03313 
03314    function get_category($key = 0)
03315    {
03316       $categories = $this->get_categories();
03317       if (isset($categories[$key]))
03318       {
03319          return $categories[$key];
03320       }
03321       else
03322       {
03323          return null;
03324       }
03325    }
03326 
03327    function get_categories()
03328    {
03329       $categories = array();
03330 
03331       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
03332       {
03333          $term = null;
03334          $scheme = null;
03335          $label = null;
03336          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
03337          {
03338             $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03339          }
03340          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
03341          {
03342             $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03343          }
03344          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
03345          {
03346             $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03347          }
03348          $categories[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03349       }
03350       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
03351       {
03352          // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
03353          // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
03354          $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03355          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
03356          {
03357             $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03358          }
03359          else
03360          {
03361             $scheme = null;
03362          }
03363          $categories[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, null);
03364       }
03365       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
03366       {
03367          $categories[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03368       }
03369       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
03370       {
03371          $categories[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03372       }
03373 
03374       if (!empty($categories))
03375       {
03376          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories);
03377       }
03378       else
03379       {
03380          return null;
03381       }
03382    }
03383 
03384    function get_author($key = 0)
03385    {
03386       $authors = $this->get_authors();
03387       if (isset($authors[$key]))
03388       {
03389          return $authors[$key];
03390       }
03391       else
03392       {
03393          return null;
03394       }
03395    }
03396 
03397    function get_contributor($key = 0)
03398    {
03399       $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
03400       if (isset($contributors[$key]))
03401       {
03402          return $contributors[$key];
03403       }
03404       else
03405       {
03406          return null;
03407       }
03408    }
03409 
03410    function get_contributors()
03411    {
03412       $contributors = array();
03413       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
03414       {
03415          $name = null;
03416          $uri = null;
03417          $email = null;
03418          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
03419          {
03420             $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03421          }
03422          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
03423          {
03424             $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
03425          }
03426          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
03427          {
03428             $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03429          }
03430          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
03431          {
03432             $contributors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
03433          }
03434       }
03435       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
03436       {
03437          $name = null;
03438          $url = null;
03439          $email = null;
03440          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
03441          {
03442             $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03443          }
03444          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
03445          {
03446             $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
03447          }
03448          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
03449          {
03450             $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03451          }
03452          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
03453          {
03454             $contributors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
03455          }
03456       }
03457 
03458       if (!empty($contributors))
03459       {
03460          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($contributors);
03461       }
03462       else
03463       {
03464          return null;
03465       }
03466    }
03467 
03468    function get_authors()
03469    {
03470       $authors = array();
03471       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
03472       {
03473          $name = null;
03474          $uri = null;
03475          $email = null;
03476          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
03477          {
03478             $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03479          }
03480          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
03481          {
03482             $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
03483          }
03484          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
03485          {
03486             $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03487          }
03488          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
03489          {
03490             $authors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
03491          }
03492       }
03493       if ($author = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
03494       {
03495          $name = null;
03496          $url = null;
03497          $email = null;
03498          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
03499          {
03500             $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03501          }
03502          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
03503          {
03504             $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
03505          }
03506          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
03507          {
03508             $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03509          }
03510          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
03511          {
03512             $authors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
03513          }
03514       }
03515       if ($author = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'author'))
03516       {
03517          $authors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class(null, null, $this->sanitize($author[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
03518       }
03519       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
03520       {
03521          $authors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03522       }
03523       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
03524       {
03525          $authors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03526       }
03527       foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
03528       {
03529          $authors[] =& new $this->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
03530       }
03531 
03532       if (!empty($authors))
03533       {
03534          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($authors);
03535       }
03536       elseif (($source = $this->get_source()) && ($authors = $source->get_authors()))
03537       {
03538          return $authors;
03539       }
03540       elseif ($authors = $this->feed->get_authors())
03541       {
03542          return $authors;
03543       }
03544       else
03545       {
03546          return null;
03547       }
03548    }
03549 
03550    function get_copyright()
03551    {
03552       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
03553       {
03554          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
03555       }
03556       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
03557       {
03558          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03559       }
03560       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
03561       {
03562          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03563       }
03564       else
03565       {
03566          return null;
03567       }
03568    }
03569 
03570    function get_date($date_format = 'j F Y, g:i a')
03571    {
03572       if (!isset($this->data['date']))
03573       {
03574          if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'published'))
03575          {
03576             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03577          }
03578          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'updated'))
03579          {
03580             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03581          }
03582          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'issued'))
03583          {
03584             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03585          }
03586          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'created'))
03587          {
03588             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03589          }
03590          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'modified'))
03591          {
03592             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03593          }
03594          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'pubDate'))
03595          {
03596             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03597          }
03598          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'date'))
03599          {
03600             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03601          }
03602          elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'date'))
03603          {
03604             $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
03605          }
03606 
03607          if (!empty($this->data['date']['raw']))
03608          {
03609             $parser = SimplePie_Parse_Date::get();
03610             $this->data['date']['parsed'] = $parser->parse($this->data['date']['raw']);
03611          }
03612          else
03613          {
03614             $this->data['date'] = null;
03615          }
03616       }
03617       if ($this->data['date'])
03618       {
03619          $date_format = (string) $date_format;
03620          switch ($date_format)
03621          {
03622             case '':
03623                return $this->sanitize($this->data['date']['raw'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03624 
03625             case 'U':
03626                return $this->data['date']['parsed'];
03627 
03628             default:
03629                return date($date_format, $this->data['date']['parsed']);
03630          }
03631       }
03632       else
03633       {
03634          return null;
03635       }
03636    }
03637 
03638    function get_local_date($date_format = '%c')
03639    {
03640       if (!$date_format)
03641       {
03642          return $this->sanitize($this->get_date(''), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03643       }
03644       elseif (($date = $this->get_date('U')) !== null)
03645       {
03646          return strftime($date_format, $date);
03647       }
03648       else
03649       {
03650          return null;
03651       }
03652    }
03653 
03654    function get_permalink()
03655    {
03656       $link = $this->get_link();
03657       $enclosure = $this->get_enclosure(0);
03658       if ($link !== null)
03659       {
03660          return $link;
03661       }
03662       elseif ($enclosure !== null)
03663       {
03664          return $enclosure->get_link();
03665       }
03666       else
03667       {
03668          return null;
03669       }
03670    }
03671 
03672    function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
03673    {
03674       $links = $this->get_links($rel);
03675       if ($links[$key] !== null)
03676       {
03677          return $links[$key];
03678       }
03679       else
03680       {
03681          return null;
03682       }
03683    }
03684 
03685    function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
03686    {
03687       if (!isset($this->data['links']))
03688       {
03689          $this->data['links'] = array();
03690          foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link') as $link)
03691          {
03692             if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
03693             {
03694                $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
03695                $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
03696 
03697             }
03698          }
03699          foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link') as $link)
03700          {
03701             if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
03702             {
03703                $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
03704                $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
03705             }
03706          }
03707          if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
03708          {
03709             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03710          }
03711          if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
03712          {
03713             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03714          }
03715          if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
03716          {
03717             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03718          }
03719          if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'guid'))
03720          {
03721             if (!isset($links[0]['attribs']['']['isPermaLink']) || strtolower(trim($links[0]['attribs']['']['isPermaLink'])) === 'true')
03722             {
03723                $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
03724             }
03725          }
03726 
03727          $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
03728          foreach ($keys as $key)
03729          {
03730             if (SimplePie_Misc::is_isegment_nz_nc($key))
03731             {
03732                if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
03733                {
03734                   $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
03735                   $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
03736                }
03737                else
03738                {
03739                   $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
03740                }
03741             }
03742             elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
03743             {
03744                $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
03745             }
03746             $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
03747          }
03748       }
03749       if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
03750       {
03751          return $this->data['links'][$rel];
03752       }
03753       else
03754       {
03755          return null;
03756       }
03757    }
03758 
03759    /**
03760     * @todo Add ability to prefer one type of content over another (in a media group).
03761     */
03762    function get_enclosure($key = 0, $prefer = null)
03763    {
03764       $enclosures = $this->get_enclosures();
03765       if (isset($enclosures[$key]))
03766       {
03767          return $enclosures[$key];
03768       }
03769       else
03770       {
03771          return null;
03772       }
03773    }
03774 
03775    /**
03776     * Grabs all available enclosures (podcasts, etc.)
03777     *
03778     * Supports the <enclosure> RSS tag, as well as Media RSS and iTunes RSS.
03779     *
03780     * At this point, we're pretty much assuming that all enclosures for an item are the same content.  Anything else is too complicated to properly support.
03781     *
03782     * @todo Add support for end-user defined sorting of enclosures by type/handler (so we can prefer the faster-loading FLV over MP4).
03783     * @todo If an element exists at a level, but it's value is empty, we should fall back to the value from the parent (if it exists).
03784     */
03785    function get_enclosures()
03786    {
03787       if (!isset($this->data['enclosures']))
03788       {
03789          $this->data['enclosures'] = array();
03790 
03791          // Elements
03792          $captions_parent = null;
03793          $categories_parent = null;
03794          $copyrights_parent = null;
03795          $credits_parent = null;
03796          $description_parent = null;
03797          $duration_parent = null;
03798          $hashes_parent = null;
03799          $keywords_parent = null;
03800          $player_parent = null;
03801          $ratings_parent = null;
03802          $restrictions_parent = null;
03803          $thumbnails_parent = null;
03804          $title_parent = null;
03805 
03806          // Let's do the channel and item-level ones first, and just re-use them if we need to.
03807          $parent = $this->get_feed();
03808 
03809          // CAPTIONS
03810          if ($captions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'text'))
03811          {
03812             foreach ($captions as $caption)
03813             {
03814                $caption_type = null;
03815                $caption_lang = null;
03816                $caption_startTime = null;
03817                $caption_endTime = null;
03818                $caption_text = null;
03819                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
03820                {
03821                   $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03822                }
03823                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
03824                {
03825                   $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03826                }
03827                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
03828                {
03829                   $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03830                }
03831                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
03832                {
03833                   $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03834                }
03835                if (isset($caption['data']))
03836                {
03837                   $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03838                }
03839                $captions_parent[] =& new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
03840             }
03841          }
03842          elseif ($captions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'text'))
03843          {
03844             foreach ($captions as $caption)
03845             {
03846                $caption_type = null;
03847                $caption_lang = null;
03848                $caption_startTime = null;
03849                $caption_endTime = null;
03850                $caption_text = null;
03851                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
03852                {
03853                   $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03854                }
03855                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
03856                {
03857                   $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03858                }
03859                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
03860                {
03861                   $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03862                }
03863                if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
03864                {
03865                   $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03866                }
03867                if (isset($caption['data']))
03868                {
03869                   $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03870                }
03871                $captions_parent[] =& new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
03872             }
03873          }
03874          if (is_array($captions_parent))
03875          {
03876             $captions_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions_parent));
03877          }
03878 
03879          // CATEGORIES
03880          foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'category') as $category)
03881          {
03882             $term = null;
03883             $scheme = null;
03884             $label = null;
03885             if (isset($category['data']))
03886             {
03887                $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03888             }
03889             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
03890             {
03891                $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03892             }
03893             else
03894             {
03895                $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
03896             }
03897             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
03898             {
03899                $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03900             }
03901             $categories_parent[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03902          }
03903          foreach ((array) $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'category') as $category)
03904          {
03905             $term = null;
03906             $scheme = null;
03907             $label = null;
03908             if (isset($category['data']))
03909             {
03910                $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03911             }
03912             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
03913             {
03914                $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03915             }
03916             else
03917             {
03918                $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
03919             }
03920             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
03921             {
03922                $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03923             }
03924             $categories_parent[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03925          }
03926          foreach ((array) $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'category') as $category)
03927          {
03928             $term = null;
03929             $scheme = 'http://www.itunes.com/dtds/podcast-1.0.dtd';
03930             $label = null;
03931             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['text']))
03932             {
03933                $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['text'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03934             }
03935             $categories_parent[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03936 
03937             if (isset($category['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES]['category']))
03938             {
03939                foreach ((array) $category['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES]['category'] as $subcategory)
03940                {
03941                   if (isset($subcategory['attribs']['']['text']))
03942                   {
03943                      $label = $this->sanitize($subcategory['attribs']['']['text'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03944                   }
03945                   $categories_parent[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
03946                }
03947             }
03948          }
03949          if (is_array($categories_parent))
03950          {
03951             $categories_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories_parent));
03952          }
03953 
03954          // COPYRIGHT
03955          if ($copyright = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'copyright'))
03956          {
03957             $copyright_url = null;
03958             $copyright_label = null;
03959             if (isset($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
03960             {
03961                $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03962             }
03963             if (isset($copyright[0]['data']))
03964             {
03965                $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03966             }
03967             $copyrights_parent =& new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
03968          }
03969          elseif ($copyright = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'copyright'))
03970          {
03971             $copyright_url = null;
03972             $copyright_label = null;
03973             if (isset($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
03974             {
03975                $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03976             }
03977             if (isset($copyright[0]['data']))
03978             {
03979                $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03980             }
03981             $copyrights_parent =& new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
03982          }
03983 
03984          // CREDITS
03985          if ($credits = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'credit'))
03986          {
03987             foreach ($credits as $credit)
03988             {
03989                $credit_role = null;
03990                $credit_scheme = null;
03991                $credit_name = null;
03992                if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
03993                {
03994                   $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03995                }
03996                if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
03997                {
03998                   $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
03999                }
04000                else
04001                {
04002                   $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04003                }
04004                if (isset($credit['data']))
04005                {
04006                   $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04007                }
04008                $credits_parent[] =& new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04009             }
04010          }
04011          elseif ($credits = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'credit'))
04012          {
04013             foreach ($credits as $credit)
04014             {
04015                $credit_role = null;
04016                $credit_scheme = null;
04017                $credit_name = null;
04018                if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
04019                {
04020                   $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04021                }
04022                if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04023                {
04024                   $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04025                }
04026                else
04027                {
04028                   $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04029                }
04030                if (isset($credit['data']))
04031                {
04032                   $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04033                }
04034                $credits_parent[] =& new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04035             }
04036          }
04037          if (is_array($credits_parent))
04038          {
04039             $credits_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits_parent));
04040          }
04041 
04042          // DESCRIPTION
04043          if ($description_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'description'))
04044          {
04045             if (isset($description_parent[0]['data']))
04046             {
04047                $description_parent = $this->sanitize($description_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04048             }
04049          }
04050          elseif ($description_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'description'))
04051          {
04052             if (isset($description_parent[0]['data']))
04053             {
04054                $description_parent = $this->sanitize($description_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04055             }
04056          }
04057 
04058          // DURATION
04059          if ($duration_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'duration'))
04060          {
04061             $seconds = null;
04062             $minutes = null;
04063             $hours = null;
04064             if (isset($duration_parent[0]['data']))
04065             {
04066                $temp = explode(':', $this->sanitize($duration_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04067                if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
04068                {
04069                   (int) $seconds = array_pop($temp);
04070                }
04071                if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
04072                {
04073                   (int) $minutes = array_pop($temp);
04074                   $seconds += $minutes * 60;
04075                }
04076                if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
04077                {
04078                   (int) $hours = array_pop($temp);
04079                   $seconds += $hours * 3600;
04080                }
04081                unset($temp);
04082                $duration_parent = $seconds;
04083             }
04084          }
04085 
04086          // HASHES
04087          if ($hashes_iterator = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'hash'))
04088          {
04089             foreach ($hashes_iterator as $hash)
04090             {
04091                $value = null;
04092                $algo = null;
04093                if (isset($hash['data']))
04094                {
04095                   $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04096                }
04097                if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04098                {
04099                   $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04100                }
04101                else
04102                {
04103                   $algo = 'md5';
04104                }
04105                $hashes_parent[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04106             }
04107          }
04108          elseif ($hashes_iterator = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'hash'))
04109          {
04110             foreach ($hashes_iterator as $hash)
04111             {
04112                $value = null;
04113                $algo = null;
04114                if (isset($hash['data']))
04115                {
04116                   $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04117                }
04118                if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04119                {
04120                   $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04121                }
04122                else
04123                {
04124                   $algo = 'md5';
04125                }
04126                $hashes_parent[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04127             }
04128          }
04129          if (is_array($hashes_parent))
04130          {
04131             $hashes_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes_parent));
04132          }
04133 
04134          // KEYWORDS
04135          if ($keywords = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'keywords'))
04136          {
04137             if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04138             {
04139                $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04140                foreach ($temp as $word)
04141                {
04142                   $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04143                }
04144             }
04145             unset($temp);
04146          }
04147          elseif ($keywords = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'keywords'))
04148          {
04149             if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04150             {
04151                $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04152                foreach ($temp as $word)
04153                {
04154                   $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04155                }
04156             }
04157             unset($temp);
04158          }
04159          elseif ($keywords = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'keywords'))
04160          {
04161             if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04162             {
04163                $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04164                foreach ($temp as $word)
04165                {
04166                   $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04167                }
04168             }
04169             unset($temp);
04170          }
04171          elseif ($keywords = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'keywords'))
04172          {
04173             if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
04174             {
04175                $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04176                foreach ($temp as $word)
04177                {
04178                   $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
04179                }
04180             }
04181             unset($temp);
04182          }
04183          if (is_array($keywords_parent))
04184          {
04185             $keywords_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords_parent));
04186          }
04187 
04188          // PLAYER
04189          if ($player_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'player'))
04190          {
04191             if (isset($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04192             {
04193                $player_parent = $this->sanitize($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04194             }
04195          }
04196          elseif ($player_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'player'))
04197          {
04198             if (isset($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04199             {
04200                $player_parent = $this->sanitize($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04201             }
04202          }
04203 
04204          // RATINGS
04205          if ($ratings = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'rating'))
04206          {
04207             foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04208             {
04209                $rating_scheme = null;
04210                $rating_value = null;
04211                if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04212                {
04213                   $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04214                }
04215                else
04216                {
04217                   $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04218                }
04219                if (isset($rating['data']))
04220                {
04221                   $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04222                }
04223                $ratings_parent[] =& new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04224             }
04225          }
04226          elseif ($ratings = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'explicit'))
04227          {
04228             foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04229             {
04230                $rating_scheme = 'urn:itunes';
04231                $rating_value = null;
04232                if (isset($rating['data']))
04233                {
04234                   $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04235                }
04236                $ratings_parent[] =& new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04237             }
04238          }
04239          elseif ($ratings = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'rating'))
04240          {
04241             foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04242             {
04243                $rating_scheme = null;
04244                $rating_value = null;
04245                if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04246                {
04247                   $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04248                }
04249                else
04250                {
04251                   $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04252                }
04253                if (isset($rating['data']))
04254                {
04255                   $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04256                }
04257                $ratings_parent[] =& new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04258             }
04259          }
04260          elseif ($ratings = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'explicit'))
04261          {
04262             foreach ($ratings as $rating)
04263             {
04264                $rating_scheme = 'urn:itunes';
04265                $rating_value = null;
04266                if (isset($rating['data']))
04267                {
04268                   $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04269                }
04270                $ratings_parent[] =& new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04271             }
04272          }
04273          if (is_array($ratings_parent))
04274          {
04275             $ratings_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings_parent));
04276          }
04277 
04278          // RESTRICTIONS
04279          if ($restrictions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'restriction'))
04280          {
04281             foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04282             {
04283                $restriction_relationship = null;
04284                $restriction_type = null;
04285                $restriction_value = null;
04286                if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04287                {
04288                   $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04289                }
04290                if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04291                {
04292                   $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04293                }
04294                if (isset($restriction['data']))
04295                {
04296                   $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04297                }
04298                $restrictions_parent[] =& new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04299             }
04300          }
04301          elseif ($restrictions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'block'))
04302          {
04303             foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04304             {
04305                $restriction_relationship = 'allow';
04306                $restriction_type = null;
04307                $restriction_value = 'itunes';
04308                if (isset($restriction['data']) && strtolower($restriction['data']) === 'yes')
04309                {
04310                   $restriction_relationship = 'deny';
04311                }
04312                $restrictions_parent[] =& new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04313             }
04314          }
04315          elseif ($restrictions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'restriction'))
04316          {
04317             foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04318             {
04319                $restriction_relationship = null;
04320                $restriction_type = null;
04321                $restriction_value = null;
04322                if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04323                {
04324                   $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04325                }
04326                if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04327                {
