04328                   $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04329                }
04330                if (isset($restriction['data']))
04331                {
04332                   $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04333                }
04334                $restrictions_parent[] =& new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04335             }
04336          }
04337          elseif ($restrictions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'block'))
04338          {
04339             foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
04340             {
04341                $restriction_relationship = 'allow';
04342                $restriction_type = null;
04343                $restriction_value = 'itunes';
04344                if (isset($restriction['data']) && strtolower($restriction['data']) === 'yes')
04345                {
04346                   $restriction_relationship = 'deny';
04347                }
04348                $restrictions_parent[] =& new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04349             }
04350          }
04351          if (is_array($restrictions_parent))
04352          {
04353             $restrictions_parent = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions_parent));
04354          }
04355 
04356          // THUMBNAILS
04357          if ($thumbnails = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'thumbnail'))
04358          {
04359             foreach ($thumbnails as $thumbnail)
04360             {
04361                if (isset($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url']))
04362                {
04363                   $thumbnails_parent[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04364                }
04365             }
04366          }
04367          elseif ($thumbnails = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'thumbnail'))
04368          {
04369             foreach ($thumbnails as $thumbnail)
04370             {
04371                if (isset($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url']))
04372                {
04373                   $thumbnails_parent[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04374                }
04375             }
04376          }
04377 
04378          // TITLES
04379          if ($title_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'title'))
04380          {
04381             if (isset($title_parent[0]['data']))
04382             {
04383                $title_parent = $this->sanitize($title_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04384             }
04385          }
04386          elseif ($title_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'title'))
04387          {
04388             if (isset($title_parent[0]['data']))
04389             {
04390                $title_parent = $this->sanitize($title_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04391             }
04392          }
04393 
04394          // Clear the memory
04395          unset($parent);
04396 
04397          // Attributes
04398          $bitrate = null;
04399          $channels = null;
04400          $duration = null;
04401          $expression = null;
04402          $framerate = null;
04403          $height = null;
04404          $javascript = null;
04405          $lang = null;
04406          $length = null;
04407          $medium = null;
04408          $samplingrate = null;
04409          $type = null;
04410          $url = null;
04411          $width = null;
04412 
04413          // Elements
04414          $captions = null;
04415          $categories = null;
04416          $copyrights = null;
04417          $credits = null;
04418          $description = null;
04419          $hashes = null;
04420          $keywords = null;
04421          $player = null;
04422          $ratings = null;
04423          $restrictions = null;
04424          $thumbnails = null;
04425          $title = null;
04426 
04427          // If we have media:group tags, loop through them.
04428          foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'group') as $group)
04429          {
04430             // If we have media:content tags, loop through them.
04431             foreach ((array) $group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content'] as $content)
04432             {
04433                if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']))
04434                {
04435                   // Attributes
04436                   $bitrate = null;
04437                   $channels = null;
04438                   $duration = null;
04439                   $expression = null;
04440                   $framerate = null;
04441                   $height = null;
04442                   $javascript = null;
04443                   $lang = null;
04444                   $length = null;
04445                   $medium = null;
04446                   $samplingrate = null;
04447                   $type = null;
04448                   $url = null;
04449                   $width = null;
04450 
04451                   // Elements
04452                   $captions = null;
04453                   $categories = null;
04454                   $copyrights = null;
04455                   $credits = null;
04456                   $description = null;
04457                   $hashes = null;
04458                   $keywords = null;
04459                   $player = null;
04460                   $ratings = null;
04461                   $restrictions = null;
04462                   $thumbnails = null;
04463                   $title = null;
04464 
04465                   // Start checking the attributes of media:content
04466                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['bitrate']))
04467                   {
04468                      $bitrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['bitrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04469                   }
04470                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['channels']))
04471                   {
04472                      $channels = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['channels'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04473                   }
04474                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['duration']))
04475                   {
04476                      $duration = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['duration'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04477                   }
04478                   else
04479                   {
04480                      $duration = $duration_parent;
04481                   }
04482                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['expression']))
04483                   {
04484                      $expression = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['expression'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04485                   }
04486                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['framerate']))
04487                   {
04488                      $framerate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['framerate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04489                   }
04490                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['height']))
04491                   {
04492                      $height = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['height'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04493                   }
04494                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['lang']))
04495                   {
04496                      $lang = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04497                   }
04498                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']))
04499                   {
04500                      $length = ceil($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']);
04501                   }
04502                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['medium']))
04503                   {
04504                      $medium = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['medium'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04505                   }
04506                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate']))
04507                   {
04508                      $samplingrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04509                   }
04510                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['type']))
04511                   {
04512                      $type = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04513                   }
04514                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['width']))
04515                   {
04516                      $width = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['width'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04517                   }
04518                   $url = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04519 
04520                   // Checking the other optional media: elements. Priority: media:content, media:group, item, channel
04521 
04522                   // CAPTIONS
04523                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
04524                   {
04525                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
04526                      {
04527                         $caption_type = null;
04528                         $caption_lang = null;
04529                         $caption_startTime = null;
04530                         $caption_endTime = null;
04531                         $caption_text = null;
04532                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
04533                         {
04534                            $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04535                         }
04536                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
04537                         {
04538                            $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04539                         }
04540                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
04541                         {
04542                            $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04543                         }
04544                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
04545                         {
04546                            $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04547                         }
04548                         if (isset($caption['data']))
04549                         {
04550                            $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04551                         }
04552                         $captions[] =& new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
04553                      }
04554                      if (is_array($captions))
04555                      {
04556                         $captions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions));
04557                      }
04558                   }
04559                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
04560                   {
04561                      foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
04562                      {
04563                         $caption_type = null;
04564                         $caption_lang = null;
04565                         $caption_startTime = null;
04566                         $caption_endTime = null;
04567                         $caption_text = null;
04568                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
04569                         {
04570                            $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04571                         }
04572                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
04573                         {
04574                            $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04575                         }
04576                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
04577                         {
04578                            $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04579                         }
04580                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
04581                         {
04582                            $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04583                         }
04584                         if (isset($caption['data']))
04585                         {
04586                            $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04587                         }
04588                         $captions[] =& new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
04589                      }
04590                      if (is_array($captions))
04591                      {
04592                         $captions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions));
04593                      }
04594                   }
04595                   else
04596                   {
04597                      $captions = $captions_parent;
04598                   }
04599 
04600                   // CATEGORIES
04601                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
04602                   {
04603                      foreach ((array) $content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
04604                      {
04605                         $term = null;
04606                         $scheme = null;
04607                         $label = null;
04608                         if (isset($category['data']))
04609                         {
04610                            $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04611                         }
04612                         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04613                         {
04614                            $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04615                         }
04616                         else
04617                         {
04618                            $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
04619                         }
04620                         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
04621                         {
04622                            $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04623                         }
04624                         $categories[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
04625                      }
04626                   }
04627                   if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
04628                   {
04629                      foreach ((array) $group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
04630                      {
04631                         $term = null;
04632                         $scheme = null;
04633                         $label = null;
04634                         if (isset($category['data']))
04635                         {
04636                            $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04637                         }
04638                         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04639                         {
04640                            $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04641                         }
04642                         else
04643                         {
04644                            $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
04645                         }
04646                         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
04647                         {
04648                            $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04649                         }
04650                         $categories[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
04651                      }
04652                   }
04653                   if (is_array($categories) && is_array($categories_parent))
04654                   {
04655                      $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique(array_merge($categories, $categories_parent)));
04656                   }
04657                   elseif (is_array($categories))
04658                   {
04659                      $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories));
04660                   }
04661                   elseif (is_array($categories_parent))
04662                   {
04663                      $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories_parent));
04664                   }
04665 
04666                   // COPYRIGHTS
04667                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
04668                   {
04669                      $copyright_url = null;
04670                      $copyright_label = null;
04671                      if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04672                      {
04673                         $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04674                      }
04675                      if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
04676                      {
04677                         $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04678                      }
04679                      $copyrights =& new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
04680                   }
04681                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
04682                   {
04683                      $copyright_url = null;
04684                      $copyright_label = null;
04685                      if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
04686                      {
04687                         $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04688                      }
04689                      if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
04690                      {
04691                         $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04692                      }
04693                      $copyrights =& new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
04694                   }
04695                   else
04696                   {
04697                      $copyrights = $copyrights_parent;
04698                   }
04699 
04700                   // CREDITS
04701                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
04702                   {
04703                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
04704                      {
04705                         $credit_role = null;
04706                         $credit_scheme = null;
04707                         $credit_name = null;
04708                         if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
04709                         {
04710                            $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04711                         }
04712                         if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04713                         {
04714                            $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04715                         }
04716                         else
04717                         {
04718                            $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04719                         }
04720                         if (isset($credit['data']))
04721                         {
04722                            $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04723                         }
04724                         $credits[] =& new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04725                      }
04726                      if (is_array($credits))
04727                      {
04728                         $credits = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits));
04729                      }
04730                   }
04731                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
04732                   {
04733                      foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
04734                      {
04735                         $credit_role = null;
04736                         $credit_scheme = null;
04737                         $credit_name = null;
04738                         if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
04739                         {
04740                            $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04741                         }
04742                         if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04743                         {
04744                            $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04745                         }
04746                         else
04747                         {
04748                            $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
04749                         }
04750                         if (isset($credit['data']))
04751                         {
04752                            $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04753                         }
04754                         $credits[] =& new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
04755                      }
04756                      if (is_array($credits))
04757                      {
04758                         $credits = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits));
04759                      }
04760                   }
04761                   else
04762                   {
04763                      $credits = $credits_parent;
04764                   }
04765 
04766                   // DESCRIPTION
04767                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
04768                   {
04769                      $description = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04770                   }
04771                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
04772                   {
04773                      $description = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04774                   }
04775                   else
04776                   {
04777                      $description = $description_parent;
04778                   }
04779 
04780                   // HASHES
04781                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
04782                   {
04783                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
04784                      {
04785                         $value = null;
04786                         $algo = null;
04787                         if (isset($hash['data']))
04788                         {
04789                            $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04790                         }
04791                         if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04792                         {
04793                            $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04794                         }
04795                         else
04796                         {
04797                            $algo = 'md5';
04798                         }
04799                         $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04800                      }
04801                      if (is_array($hashes))
04802                      {
04803                         $hashes = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes));
04804                      }
04805                   }
04806                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
04807                   {
04808                      foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
04809                      {
04810                         $value = null;
04811                         $algo = null;
04812                         if (isset($hash['data']))
04813                         {
04814                            $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04815                         }
04816                         if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
04817                         {
04818                            $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04819                         }
04820                         else
04821                         {
04822                            $algo = 'md5';
04823                         }
04824                         $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
04825                      }
04826                      if (is_array($hashes))
04827                      {
04828                         $hashes = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes));
04829                      }
04830                   }
04831                   else
04832                   {
04833                      $hashes = $hashes_parent;
04834                   }
04835 
04836                   // KEYWORDS
04837                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
04838                   {
04839                      if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
04840                      {
04841                         $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04842                         foreach ($temp as $word)
04843                         {
04844                            $keywords[] = trim($word);
04845                         }
04846                         unset($temp);
04847                      }
04848                      if (is_array($keywords))
04849                      {
04850                         $keywords = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords));
04851                      }
04852                   }
04853                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
04854                   {
04855                      if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
04856                      {
04857                         $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
04858                         foreach ($temp as $word)
04859                         {
04860                            $keywords[] = trim($word);
04861                         }
04862                         unset($temp);
04863                      }
04864                      if (is_array($keywords))
04865                      {
04866                         $keywords = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords));
04867                      }
04868                   }
04869                   else
04870                   {
04871                      $keywords = $keywords_parent;
04872                   }
04873 
04874                   // PLAYER
04875                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
04876                   {
04877                      $player = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04878                   }
04879                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
04880                   {
04881                      $player = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
04882                   }
04883                   else
04884                   {
04885                      $player = $player_parent;
04886                   }
04887 
04888                   // RATINGS
04889                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
04890                   {
04891                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
04892                      {
04893                         $rating_scheme = null;
04894                         $rating_value = null;
04895                         if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04896                         {
04897                            $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04898                         }
04899                         else
04900                         {
04901                            $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04902                         }
04903                         if (isset($rating['data']))
04904                         {
04905                            $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04906                         }
04907                         $ratings[] =& new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04908                      }
04909                      if (is_array($ratings))
04910                      {
04911                         $ratings = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings));
04912                      }
04913                   }
04914                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
04915                   {
04916                      foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
04917                      {
04918                         $rating_scheme = null;
04919                         $rating_value = null;
04920                         if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
04921                         {
04922                            $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04923                         }
04924                         else
04925                         {
04926                            $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
04927                         }
04928                         if (isset($rating['data']))
04929                         {
04930                            $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04931                         }
04932                         $ratings[] =& new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
04933                      }
04934                      if (is_array($ratings))
04935                      {
04936                         $ratings = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings));
04937                      }
04938                   }
04939                   else
04940                   {
04941                      $ratings = $ratings_parent;
04942                   }
04943 
04944                   // RESTRICTIONS
04945                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
04946                   {
04947                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
04948                      {
04949                         $restriction_relationship = null;
04950                         $restriction_type = null;
04951                         $restriction_value = null;
04952                         if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04953                         {
04954                            $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04955                         }
04956                         if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04957                         {
04958                            $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04959                         }
04960                         if (isset($restriction['data']))
04961                         {
04962                            $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04963                         }
04964                         $restrictions[] =& new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04965                      }
04966                      if (is_array($restrictions))
04967                      {
04968                         $restrictions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions));
04969                      }
04970                   }
04971                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
04972                   {
04973                      foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
04974                      {
04975                         $restriction_relationship = null;
04976                         $restriction_type = null;
04977                         $restriction_value = null;
04978                         if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
04979                         {
04980                            $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04981                         }
04982                         if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
04983                         {
04984                            $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04985                         }
04986                         if (isset($restriction['data']))
04987                         {
04988                            $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
04989                         }
04990                         $restrictions[] =& new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
04991                      }
04992                      if (is_array($restrictions))
04993                      {
04994                         $restrictions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions));
04995                      }
04996                   }
04997                   else
04998                   {
04999                      $restrictions = $restrictions_parent;
05000                   }
05001 
05002                   // THUMBNAILS
05003                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
05004                   {
05005                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
05006                      {
05007                         $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05008                      }
05009                      if (is_array($thumbnails))
05010                      {
05011                         $thumbnails = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($thumbnails));
05012                      }
05013                   }
05014                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
05015                   {
05016                      foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
05017                      {
05018                         $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05019                      }
05020                      if (is_array($thumbnails))
05021                      {
05022                         $thumbnails = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($thumbnails));
05023                      }
05024                   }
05025                   else
05026                   {
05027                      $thumbnails = $thumbnails_parent;
05028                   }
05029 
05030                   // TITLES
05031                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
05032                   {
05033                      $title = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05034                   }
05035                   elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
05036                   {
05037                      $title = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05038                   }
05039                   else
05040                   {
05041                      $title = $title_parent;
05042                   }
05043 
05044                   $this->data['enclosures'][] =& new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions, $categories, $channels, $copyrights, $credits, $description, $duration, $expression, $framerate, $hashes, $height, $keywords, $lang, $medium, $player, $ratings, $restrictions, $samplingrate, $thumbnails, $title, $width);
05045                }
05046             }
05047          }
05048 
05049          // If we have standalone media:content tags, loop through them.
05050          if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content']))
05051          {
05052             foreach ((array) $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content'] as $content)
05053             {
05054                if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']))
05055                {
05056                   // Attributes
05057                   $bitrate = null;
05058                   $channels = null;
05059                   $duration = null;
05060                   $expression = null;
05061                   $framerate = null;
05062                   $height = null;
05063                   $javascript = null;
05064                   $lang = null;
05065                   $length = null;
05066                   $medium = null;
05067                   $samplingrate = null;
05068                   $type = null;
05069                   $url = null;
05070                   $width = null;
05071 
05072                   // Elements
05073                   $captions = null;
05074                   $categories = null;
05075                   $copyrights = null;
05076                   $credits = null;
05077                   $description = null;
05078                   $hashes = null;
05079                   $keywords = null;
05080                   $player = null;
05081                   $ratings = null;
05082                   $restrictions = null;
05083                   $thumbnails = null;
05084                   $title = null;
05085 
05086                   // Start checking the attributes of media:content
05087                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['bitrate']))
05088                   {
05089                      $bitrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['bitrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05090                   }
05091                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['channels']))
05092                   {
05093                      $channels = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['channels'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05094                   }
05095                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['duration']))
05096                   {
05097                      $duration = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['duration'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05098                   }
05099                   else
05100                   {
05101                      $duration = $duration_parent;
05102                   }
05103                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['expression']))
05104                   {
05105                      $expression = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['expression'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05106                   }
05107                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['framerate']))
05108                   {
05109                      $framerate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['framerate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05110                   }
05111                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['height']))
05112                   {
05113                      $height = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['height'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05114                   }
05115                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['lang']))
05116                   {
05117                      $lang = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05118                   }
05119                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']))
05120                   {
05121                      $length = ceil($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']);
05122                   }
05123                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['medium']))
05124                   {
05125                      $medium = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['medium'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05126                   }
05127                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate']))
05128                   {
05129                      $samplingrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05130                   }
05131                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['type']))
05132                   {
05133                      $type = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05134                   }
05135                   if (isset($content['attribs']['']['width']))
05136                   {
05137                      $width = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['width'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05138                   }
05139                   $url = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05140 
05141                   // Checking the other optional media: elements. Priority: media:content, media:group, item, channel
05142 
05143                   // CAPTIONS
05144                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
05145                   {
05146                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
05147                      {
05148                         $caption_type = null;
05149                         $caption_lang = null;
05150                         $caption_startTime = null;
05151                         $caption_endTime = null;
05152                         $caption_text = null;
05153                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
05154                         {
05155                            $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05156                         }
05157                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
05158                         {
05159                            $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05160                         }
05161                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
05162                         {
05163                            $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05164                         }
05165                         if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
05166                         {
05167                            $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05168                         }
05169                         if (isset($caption['data']))
05170                         {
05171                            $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05172                         }
05173                         $captions[] =& new $this->feed->caption_class($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text);
05174                      }
05175                      if (is_array($captions))
05176                      {
05177                         $captions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($captions));
05178                      }
05179                   }
05180                   else
05181                   {
05182                      $captions = $captions_parent;
05183                   }
05184 
05185                   // CATEGORIES
05186                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
05187                   {
05188                      foreach ((array) $content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
05189                      {
05190                         $term = null;
05191                         $scheme = null;
05192                         $label = null;
05193                         if (isset($category['data']))
05194                         {
05195                            $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05196                         }
05197                         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05198                         {
05199                            $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05200                         }
05201                         else
05202                         {
05203                            $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
05204                         }
05205                         if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
05206                         {
05207                            $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05208                         }
05209                         $categories[] =& new $this->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
05210                      }
05211                   }
05212                   if (is_array($categories) && is_array($categories_parent))
05213                   {
05214                      $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique(array_merge($categories, $categories_parent)));
05215                   }
05216                   elseif (is_array($categories))
05217                   {
05218                      $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories));
05219                   }
05220                   elseif (is_array($categories_parent))
05221                   {
05222                      $categories = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories_parent));
05223                   }
05224                   else
05225                   {
05226                      $categories = null;
05227                   }
05228 
05229                   // COPYRIGHTS
05230                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
05231                   {
05232                      $copyright_url = null;
05233                      $copyright_label = null;
05234                      if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
05235                      {
05236                         $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05237                      }
05238                      if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
05239                      {
05240                         $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05241                      }
05242                      $copyrights =& new $this->feed->copyright_class($copyright_url, $copyright_label);
05243                   }
05244                   else
05245                   {
05246                      $copyrights = $copyrights_parent;
05247                   }
05248 
05249                   // CREDITS
05250                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
05251                   {
05252                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
05253                      {
05254                         $credit_role = null;
05255                         $credit_scheme = null;
05256                         $credit_name = null;
05257                         if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
05258                         {
05259                            $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05260                         }
05261                         if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05262                         {
05263                            $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05264                         }
05265                         else
05266                         {
05267                            $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
05268                         }
05269                         if (isset($credit['data']))
05270                         {
05271                            $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05272                         }
05273                         $credits[] =& new $this->feed->credit_class($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name);
05274                      }
05275                      if (is_array($credits))
05276                      {
05277                         $credits = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($credits));
05278                      }
05279                   }
05280                   else
05281                   {
05282                      $credits = $credits_parent;
05283                   }
05284 
05285                   // DESCRIPTION
05286                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
05287                   {
05288                      $description = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05289                   }
05290                   else
05291                   {
05292                      $description = $description_parent;
05293                   }
05294 
05295                   // HASHES
05296                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
05297                   {
05298                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
05299                      {
05300                         $value = null;
05301                         $algo = null;
05302                         if (isset($hash['data']))
05303                         {
05304                            $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05305                         }
05306                         if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
05307                         {
05308                            $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05309                         }
05310                         else
05311                         {
05312                            $algo = 'md5';
05313                         }
05314                         $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
05315                      }
05316                      if (is_array($hashes))
05317                      {
05318                         $hashes = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($hashes));
05319                      }
05320                   }
05321                   else
05322                   {
05323                      $hashes = $hashes_parent;
05324                   }
05325 
05326                   // KEYWORDS
05327                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
05328                   {
05329                      if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
05330                      {
05331                         $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
05332                         foreach ($temp as $word)
05333                         {
05334                            $keywords[] = trim($word);
05335                         }
05336                         unset($temp);
05337                      }
05338                      if (is_array($keywords))
05339                      {
05340                         $keywords = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($keywords));
05341                      }
05342                   }
05343                   else
05344                   {
05345                      $keywords = $keywords_parent;
05346                   }
05347 
05348                   // PLAYER
05349                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
05350                   {
05351                      $player = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05352                   }
05353                   else
05354                   {
05355                      $player = $player_parent;
05356                   }
05357 
05358                   // RATINGS
05359                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
05360                   {
05361                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
05362                      {
05363                         $rating_scheme = null;
05364                         $rating_value = null;
05365                         if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05366                         {
05367                            $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05368                         }
05369                         else
05370                         {
05371                            $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
05372                         }
05373                         if (isset($rating['data']))
05374                         {
05375                            $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05376                         }
05377                         $ratings[] =& new $this->feed->rating_class($rating_scheme, $rating_value);
05378                      }
05379                      if (is_array($ratings))
05380                      {
05381                         $ratings = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($ratings));
05382                      }
05383                   }
05384                   else
05385                   {
05386                      $ratings = $ratings_parent;
05387                   }
05388 
05389                   // RESTRICTIONS
05390                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
05391                   {
05392                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
05393                      {
05394                         $restriction_relationship = null;
05395                         $restriction_type = null;
05396                         $restriction_value = null;
05397                         if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
05398                         {
05399                            $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05400                         }
05401                         if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
05402                         {
05403                            $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05404                         }
05405                         if (isset($restriction['data']))
05406                         {
05407                            $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05408                         }
05409                         $restrictions[] =& new $this->feed->restriction_class($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value);
05410                      }
05411                      if (is_array($restrictions))
05412                      {
05413                         $restrictions = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($restrictions));
05414                      }
05415                   }
05416                   else
05417                   {
05418                      $restrictions = $restrictions_parent;
05419                   }
05420 
05421                   // THUMBNAILS
05422                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
05423                   {
05424                      foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
05425                      {
05426                         $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05427                      }
05428                      if (is_array($thumbnails))
05429                      {
05430                         $thumbnails = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($thumbnails));
05431                      }
05432                   }
05433                   else
05434                   {
05435                      $thumbnails = $thumbnails_parent;
05436                   }
05437 
05438                   // TITLES
05439                   if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
05440                   {
05441                      $title = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05442                   }
05443                   else
05444                   {
05445                      $title = $title_parent;
05446                   }
05447 
05448                   $this->data['enclosures'][] =& new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions, $categories, $channels, $copyrights, $credits, $description, $duration, $expression, $framerate, $hashes, $height, $keywords, $lang, $medium, $player, $ratings, $restrictions, $samplingrate, $thumbnails, $title, $width);
05449                }
05450             }
05451          }
05452 
05453          foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link') as $link)
05454          {
05455             if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']) && !empty($link['attribs']['']['rel']) && $link['attribs']['']['rel'] === 'enclosure')
05456             {
05457                // Attributes
05458                $bitrate = null;
05459                $channels = null;
05460                $duration = null;
05461                $expression = null;
05462                $framerate = null;
05463                $height = null;
05464                $javascript = null;
05465                $lang = null;
05466                $length = null;
05467                $medium = null;
05468                $samplingrate = null;
05469                $type = null;
05470                $url = null;
05471                $width = null;
05472 
05473                $url = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
05474                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['type']))
05475                {
05476                   $type = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05477                }
05478                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['length']))
05479                {
05480                   $length = ceil($link['attribs']['']['length']);
05481                }
05482 
05483                // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05484                $this->data['enclosures'][] =& new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05485             }
05486          }
05487 
05488          foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link') as $link)
05489          {
05490             if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']) && !empty($link['attribs']['']['rel']) && $link['attribs']['']['rel'] === 'enclosure')
05491             {
05492                // Attributes
05493                $bitrate = null;
05494                $channels = null;
05495                $duration = null;
05496                $expression = null;
05497                $framerate = null;
05498                $height = null;
05499                $javascript = null;
05500                $lang = null;
05501                $length = null;
05502                $medium = null;
05503                $samplingrate = null;
05504                $type = null;
05505                $url = null;
05506                $width = null;
05507 
05508                $url = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
05509                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['type']))
05510                {
05511                   $type = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05512                }
05513                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['length']))
05514                {
05515                   $length = ceil($link['attribs']['']['length']);
05516                }
05517 
05518                // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05519                $this->data['enclosures'][] =& new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05520             }
05521          }
05522 
05523          if ($enclosure = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'enclosure'))
05524          {
05525             if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
05526             {
05527                // Attributes
05528                $bitrate = null;
05529                $channels = null;
05530                $duration = null;
05531                $expression = null;
05532                $framerate = null;
05533                $height = null;
05534                $javascript = null;
05535                $lang = null;
05536                $length = null;
05537                $medium = null;
05538                $samplingrate = null;
05539                $type = null;
05540                $url = null;
05541                $width = null;
05542 
05543                $url = $this->sanitize($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($enclosure[0]));
05544                if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['type']))
05545                {
05546                   $type = $this->sanitize($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05547                }
05548                if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['length']))
05549                {
05550                   $length = ceil($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['length']);
05551                }
05552 
05553                // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05554                $this->data['enclosures'][] =& new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05555             }
05556          }
05557 
05558          if (sizeof($this->data['enclosures']) === 0 && ($url || $type || $length || $bitrate || $captions_parent || $categories_parent || $channels || $copyrights_parent || $credits_parent || $description_parent || $duration_parent || $expression || $framerate || $hashes_parent || $height || $keywords_parent || $lang || $medium || $player_parent || $ratings_parent || $restrictions_parent || $samplingrate || $thumbnails_parent || $title_parent || $width))
05559          {
05560             // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
05561             $this->data['enclosures'][] =& new $this->feed->enclosure_class($url, $type, $length, $this->feed->javascript, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width);
05562          }
05563 
05564          $this->data['enclosures'] = array_values(SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($this->data['enclosures']));
05565       }
05566       if (!empty($this->data['enclosures']))
05567       {
05568          return $this->data['enclosures'];
05569       }
05570       else
05571       {
05572          return null;
05573       }
05574    }
05575 
05576    function get_latitude()
05577    {
05578       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
05579       {
05580          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
05581       }
05582       elseif (($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', $return[0]['data'], $match))
05583       {
05584          return (float) $match[1];
05585       }
05586       else
05587       {
05588          return null;
05589       }
05590    }
05591 
05592    function get_longitude()
05593    {
05594       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
05595       {
05596          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
05597       }
05598       elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
05599       {
05600          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
05601       }
05602       elseif (($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', $return[0]['data'], $match))
05603       {
05604          return (float) $match[2];
05605       }
05606       else
05607       {
05608          return null;
05609       }
05610    }
05611 
05612    function get_source()
05613    {
05614       if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'source'))
05615       {
05616          return new $this->feed->source_class($this, $return[0]);
05617       }
05618       else
05619       {
05620          return null;
05621       }
05622    }
05623 
05624    /**
05625     * Creates the add_to_* methods' return data
05626     *
05627     * @access private
05628     * @param string $item_url String to prefix to the item permalink
05629     * @param string $title_url String to prefix to the item title
05630     * (and suffix to the item permalink)
05631     * @return mixed URL if feed exists, false otherwise
05632     */
05633    function add_to_service($item_url, $title_url = null, $summary_url = null)
05634    {
05635       if ($this->get_permalink() !== null)
05636       {
05637          $return = $item_url . rawurlencode($this->get_permalink());
05638          if ($title_url !== null && $this->get_title() !== null)
05639          {
05640             $return .= $title_url . rawurlencode($this->get_title());
05641          }
05642          if ($summary_url !== null && $this->get_description() !== null)
05643          {
05644             $return .= $summary_url . rawurlencode($this->get_description());
05645          }
05646          return $this->sanitize($return, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
05647       }
05648       else
05649       {
05650          return null;
05651       }
05652    }
05653 
05654    function add_to_blinklist()
05655    {
05656       return $this->add_to_service('http://www.blinklist.com/index.php?Action=Blink/addblink.php&Description=&Url=', '&Title=');
05657    }
05658 
05659    function add_to_blogmarks()
05660    {
05661       return $this->add_to_service('http://blogmarks.net/my/new.php?mini=1&simple=1&url=', '&title=');
05662    }
05663 
05664    function add_to_delicious()
05665    {
05666       return $this->add_to_service('http://del.icio.us/post/?v=4&url=', '&title=');
05667    }
05668 
05669    function add_to_digg()
05670    {
05671       return $this->add_to_service('http://digg.com/submit?url=', '&title=', '&bodytext=');
05672    }
05673 
05674    function add_to_furl()
05675    {
05676       return $this->add_to_service('http://www.furl.net/storeIt.jsp?u=', '&t=');
05677    }
05678 
05679    function add_to_magnolia()
05680    {
05681       return $this->add_to_service('http://ma.gnolia.com/bookmarklet/add?url=', '&title=');
05682    }
05683 
05684    function add_to_myweb20()
05685    {
05686       return $this->add_to_service('http://myweb2.search.yahoo.com/myresults/bookmarklet?u=', '&t=');
05687    }
05688 
05689    function add_to_newsvine()
05690    {
05691       return $this->add_to_service('http://www.newsvine.com/_wine/save?u=', '&h=');
05692    }
05693 
05694    function add_to_reddit()
05695    {
05696       return $this->add_to_service('http://reddit.com/submit?url=', '&title=');
05697    }
05698 
05699    function add_to_segnalo()
05700    {
05701       return $this->add_to_service('http://segnalo.com/post.html.php?url=', '&title=');
05702    }
05703 
05704    function add_to_simpy()
05705    {
05706       return $this->add_to_service('http://www.simpy.com/simpy/LinkAdd.do?href=', '&title=');
05707    }
05708 
05709    function add_to_spurl()
05710    {
05711       return $this->add_to_service('http://www.spurl.net/spurl.php?v=3&url=', '&title=');
05712    }
05713 
05714    function add_to_wists()
05715    {
05716       return $this->add_to_service('http://wists.com/r.php?c=&r=', '&title=');
05717    }
05718 
05719    function search_technorati()
05720    {
05721       return $this->add_to_service('http://www.technorati.com/search/');
05722    }
05723 }
05724 
05725 class SimplePie_Source
05726 {
05727    var $item;
05728    var $data = array();
05729 
05730    function SimplePie_Source($item, $data)
05731    {
05732       $this->item = $item;
05733       $this->data = $data;
05734    }
05735 
05736    function __toString()
05737    {
05738       return md5(serialize($this->data));
05739    }
05740 
05741    function get_source_tags($namespace, $tag)
05742    {
05743       if (isset($this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
05744       {
05745          return $this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag];
05746       }
05747       else
05748       {
05749          return null;
05750       }
05751    }
05752 
05753    function get_base($element = array())
05754    {
05755       return $this->item->get_base($element);
05756    }
05757 
05758    function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
05759    {
05760       return $this->item->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
05761    }
05762 
05763    function get_item()
05764    {
05765       return $this->item;
05766    }
05767 
05768    function get_title()
05769    {
05770       if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
05771       {
05772          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
05773       }
05774       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
05775       {
05776          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
05777       }
05778       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
05779       {
05780          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
05781       }
05782       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
05783       {
05784          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
05785       }
05786       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
05787       {
05788          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
05789       }
05790       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
05791       {
05792          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05793       }
05794       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
05795       {
05796          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05797       }
05798       else
05799       {
05800          return null;
05801       }
05802    }
05803 
05804    function get_category($key = 0)
05805    {
05806       $categories = $this->get_categories();
05807       if (isset($categories[$key]))
05808       {
05809          return $categories[$key];
05810       }
05811       else
05812       {
05813          return null;
05814       }
05815    }
05816 
05817    function get_categories()
05818    {
05819       $categories = array();
05820 
05821       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
05822       {
05823          $term = null;
05824          $scheme = null;
05825          $label = null;
05826          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
05827          {
05828             $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05829          }
05830          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
05831          {
05832             $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05833          }
05834          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
05835          {
05836             $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05837          }
05838          $categories[] =& new $this->item->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, $label);
05839       }
05840       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
05841       {
05842          // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
05843          // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
05844          $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05845          if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
05846          {
05847             $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05848          }
05849          else
05850          {
05851             $scheme = null;
05852          }
05853          $categories[] =& new $this->item->feed->category_class($term, $scheme, null);
05854       }
05855       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
05856       {
05857          $categories[] =& new $this->item->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05858       }
05859       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
05860       {
05861          $categories[] =& new $this->item->feed->category_class($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05862       }
05863 
05864       if (!empty($categories))
05865       {
05866          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($categories);
05867       }
05868       else
05869       {
05870          return null;
05871       }
05872    }
05873 
05874    function get_author($key = 0)
05875    {
05876       $authors = $this->get_authors();
05877       if (isset($authors[$key]))
05878       {
05879          return $authors[$key];
05880       }
05881       else
05882       {
05883          return null;
05884       }
05885    }
05886 
05887    function get_authors()
05888    {
05889       $authors = array();
05890       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
05891       {
05892          $name = null;
05893          $uri = null;
05894          $email = null;
05895          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
05896          {
05897             $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05898          }
05899          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
05900          {
05901             $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
05902          }
05903          if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
05904          {
