05905             $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05906          }
05907          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
05908          {
05909             $authors[] =& new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
05910          }
05911       }
05912       if ($author = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
05913       {
05914          $name = null;
05915          $url = null;
05916          $email = null;
05917          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
05918          {
05919             $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05920          }
05921          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
05922          {
05923             $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
05924          }
05925          if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
05926          {
05927             $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05928          }
05929          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
05930          {
05931             $authors[] =& new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
05932          }
05933       }
05934       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
05935       {
05936          $authors[] =& new $this->item->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05937       }
05938       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
05939       {
05940          $authors[] =& new $this->item->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05941       }
05942       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
05943       {
05944          $authors[] =& new $this->item->feed->author_class($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null);
05945       }
05946 
05947       if (!empty($authors))
05948       {
05949          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($authors);
05950       }
05951       else
05952       {
05953          return null;
05954       }
05955    }
05956 
05957    function get_contributor($key = 0)
05958    {
05959       $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
05960       if (isset($contributors[$key]))
05961       {
05962          return $contributors[$key];
05963       }
05964       else
05965       {
05966          return null;
05967       }
05968    }
05969 
05970    function get_contributors()
05971    {
05972       $contributors = array();
05973       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
05974       {
05975          $name = null;
05976          $uri = null;
05977          $email = null;
05978          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
05979          {
05980             $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05981          }
05982          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
05983          {
05984             $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
05985          }
05986          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
05987          {
05988             $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
05989          }
05990          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
05991          {
05992             $contributors[] =& new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $uri, $email);
05993          }
05994       }
05995       foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
05996       {
05997          $name = null;
05998          $url = null;
05999          $email = null;
06000          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
06001          {
06002             $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06003          }
06004          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
06005          {
06006             $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
06007          }
06008          if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
06009          {
06010             $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06011          }
06012          if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
06013          {
06014             $contributors[] =& new $this->item->feed->author_class($name, $url, $email);
06015          }
06016       }
06017 
06018       if (!empty($contributors))
06019       {
06020          return SimplePie_Misc::array_unique($contributors);
06021       }
06022       else
06023       {
06024          return null;
06025       }
06026    }
06027 
06028    function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
06029    {
06030       $links = $this->get_links($rel);
06031       if (isset($links[$key]))
06032       {
06033          return $links[$key];
06034       }
06035       else
06036       {
06037          return null;
06038       }
06039    }
06040 
06041    /**
06042     * Added for parity between the parent-level and the item/entry-level.
06043     */
06044    function get_permalink()
06045    {
06046       return $this->get_link(0);
06047    }
06048 
06049    function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
06050    {
06051       if (!isset($this->data['links']))
06052       {
06053          $this->data['links'] = array();
06054          if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link'))
06055          {
06056             foreach ($links as $link)
06057             {
06058                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
06059                {
06060                   $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
06061                   $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
06062                }
06063             }
06064          }
06065          if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link'))
06066          {
06067             foreach ($links as $link)
06068             {
06069                if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
06070                {
06071                   $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
06072                   $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
06073 
06074                }
06075             }
06076          }
06077          if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
06078          {
06079             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
06080          }
06081          if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
06082          {
06083             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
06084          }
06085          if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
06086          {
06087             $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
06088          }
06089 
06090          $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
06091          foreach ($keys as $key)
06092          {
06093             if (SimplePie_Misc::is_isegment_nz_nc($key))
06094             {
06095                if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
06096                {
06097                   $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
06098                   $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
06099                }
06100                else
06101                {
06102                   $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
06103                }
06104             }
06105             elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
06106             {
06107                $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
06108             }
06109             $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
06110          }
06111       }
06112 
06113       if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
06114       {
06115          return $this->data['links'][$rel];
06116       }
06117       else
06118       {
06119          return null;
06120       }
06121    }
06122 
06123    function get_description()
06124    {
06125       if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'subtitle'))
06126       {
06127          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06128       }
06129       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'tagline'))
06130       {
06131          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06132       }
06133       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
06134       {
06135          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06136       }
06137       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
06138       {
06139          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06140       }
06141       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
06142       {
06143          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06144       }
06145       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
06146       {
06147          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06148       }
06149       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
06150       {
06151          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06152       }
06153       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
06154       {
06155          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06156       }
06157       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
06158       {
06159          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06160       }
06161       else
06162       {
06163          return null;
06164       }
06165    }
06166 
06167    function get_copyright()
06168    {
06169       if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
06170       {
06171          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_10_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06172       }
06173       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'copyright'))
06174       {
06175          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SimplePie_Misc::atom_03_construct_type($return[0]['attribs']), $this->get_base($return[0]));
06176       }
06177       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'copyright'))
06178       {
06179          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06180       }
06181       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
06182       {
06183          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06184       }
06185       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
06186       {
06187          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06188       }
06189       else
06190       {
06191          return null;
06192       }
06193    }
06194 
06195    function get_language()
06196    {
06197       if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'language'))
06198       {
06199          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06200       }
06201       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'language'))
06202       {
06203          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06204       }
06205       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'language'))
06206       {
06207          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06208       }
06209       elseif (isset($this->data['xml_lang']))
06210       {
06211          return $this->sanitize($this->data['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
06212       }
06213       else
06214       {
06215          return null;
06216       }
06217    }
06218 
06219    function get_latitude()
06220    {
06221       if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
06222       {
06223          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
06224       }
06225       elseif (($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', $return[0]['data'], $match))
06226       {
06227          return (float) $match[1];
06228       }
06229       else
06230       {
06231          return null;
06232       }
06233    }
06234 
06235    function get_longitude()
06236    {
06237       if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
06238       {
06239          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
06240       }
06241       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
06242       {
06243          return (float) $return[0]['data'];
06244       }
06245       elseif (($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', $return[0]['data'], $match))
06246       {
06247          return (float) $match[2];
06248       }
06249       else
06250       {
06251          return null;
06252       }
06253    }
06254 
06255    function get_image_url()
06256    {
06257       if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'image'))
06258       {
06259          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
06260       }
06261       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'logo'))
06262       {
06263          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06264       }
06265       elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
06266       {
06267          return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
06268       }
06269       else
06270       {
06271          return null;
06272       }
06273    }
06274 }
06275 
06276 class SimplePie_Author
06277 {
06278    var $name;
06279    var $link;
06280    var $email;
06281 
06282    // Constructor, used to input the data
06283    function SimplePie_Author($name = null, $link = null, $email = null)
06284    {
06285       $this->name = $name;
06286       $this->link = $link;
06287       $this->email = $email;
06288    }
06289 
06290    function __toString()
06291    {
06292       // There is no $this->data here
06293       return md5(serialize($this));
06294    }
06295 
06296    function get_name()
06297    {
06298       if ($this->name !== null)
06299       {
06300          return $this->name;
06301       }
06302       else
06303       {
06304          return null;
06305       }
06306    }
06307 
06308    function get_link()
06309    {
06310       if ($this->link !== null)
06311       {
06312          return $this->link;
06313       }
06314       else
06315       {
06316          return null;
06317       }
06318    }
06319 
06320    function get_email()
06321    {
06322       if ($this->email !== null)
06323       {
06324          return $this->email;
06325       }
06326       else
06327       {
06328          return null;
06329       }
06330    }
06331 }
06332 
06333 class SimplePie_Category
06334 {
06335    var $term;
06336    var $scheme;
06337    var $label;
06338 
06339    // Constructor, used to input the data
06340    function SimplePie_Category($term = null, $scheme = null, $label = null)
06341    {
06342       $this->term = $term;
06343       $this->scheme = $scheme;
06344       $this->label = $label;
06345    }
06346 
06347    function __toString()
06348    {
06349       // There is no $this->data here
06350       return md5(serialize($this));
06351    }
06352 
06353    function get_term()
06354    {
06355       if ($this->term !== null)
06356       {
06357          return $this->term;
06358       }
06359       else
06360       {
06361          return null;
06362       }
06363    }
06364 
06365    function get_scheme()
06366    {
06367       if ($this->scheme !== null)
06368       {
06369          return $this->scheme;
06370       }
06371       else
06372       {
06373          return null;
06374       }
06375    }
06376 
06377    function get_label()
06378    {
06379       if ($this->label !== null)
06380       {
06381          return $this->label;
06382       }
06383       else
06384       {
06385          return $this->get_term();
06386       }
06387    }
06388 }
06389 
06390 class SimplePie_Enclosure
06391 {
06392    var $bitrate;
06393    var $captions;
06394    var $categories;
06395    var $channels;
06396    var $copyright;
06397    var $credits;
06398    var $description;
06399    var $duration;
06400    var $expression;
06401    var $framerate;
06402    var $handler;
06403    var $hashes;
06404    var $height;
06405    var $javascript;
06406    var $keywords;
06407    var $lang;
06408    var $length;
06409    var $link;
06410    var $medium;
06411    var $player;
06412    var $ratings;
06413    var $restrictions;
06414    var $samplingrate;
06415    var $thumbnails;
06416    var $title;
06417    var $type;
06418    var $width;
06419 
06420    // Constructor, used to input the data
06421    function SimplePie_Enclosure($link = null, $type = null, $length = null, $javascript = null, $bitrate = null, $captions = null, $categories = null, $channels = null, $copyright = null, $credits = null, $description = null, $duration = null, $expression = null, $framerate = null, $hashes = null, $height = null, $keywords = null, $lang = null, $medium = null, $player = null, $ratings = null, $restrictions = null, $samplingrate = null, $thumbnails = null, $title = null, $width = null)
06422    {
06423       $this->bitrate = $bitrate;
06424       $this->captions = $captions;
06425       $this->categories = $categories;
06426       $this->channels = $channels;
06427       $this->copyright = $copyright;
06428       $this->credits = $credits;
06429       $this->description = $description;
06430       $this->duration = $duration;
06431       $this->expression = $expression;
06432       $this->framerate = $framerate;
06433       $this->hashes = $hashes;
06434       $this->height = $height;
06435       $this->javascript = $javascript;
06436       $this->keywords = $keywords;
06437       $this->lang = $lang;
06438       $this->length = $length;
06439       $this->link = $link;
06440       $this->medium = $medium;
06441       $this->player = $player;
06442       $this->ratings = $ratings;
06443       $this->restrictions = $restrictions;
06444       $this->samplingrate = $samplingrate;
06445       $this->thumbnails = $thumbnails;
06446       $this->title = $title;
06447       $this->type = $type;
06448       $this->width = $width;
06449       if (class_exists('idna_convert'))
06450       {
06451          $idn =& new idna_convert;
06452          $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($link);
06453          $this->link = SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url($parsed['scheme'], $idn->encode($parsed['authority']), $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']);
06454       }
06455       $this->handler = $this->get_handler(); // Needs to load last
06456    }
06457 
06458    function __toString()
06459    {
06460       // There is no $this->data here
06461       return md5(serialize($this));
06462    }
06463 
06464    function get_bitrate()
06465    {
06466       if ($this->bitrate !== null)
06467       {
06468          return $this->bitrate;
06469       }
06470       else
06471       {
06472          return null;
06473       }
06474    }
06475 
06476    function get_caption($key = 0)
06477    {
06478       $captions = $this->get_captions();
06479       if (isset($captions[$key]))
06480       {
06481          return $captions[$key];
06482       }
06483       else
06484       {
06485          return null;
06486       }
06487    }
06488 
06489    function get_captions()
06490    {
06491       if ($this->captions !== null)
06492       {
06493          return $this->captions;
06494       }
06495       else
06496       {
06497          return null;
06498       }
06499    }
06500 
06501    function get_category($key = 0)
06502    {
06503       $categories = $this->get_categories();
06504       if (isset($categories[$key]))
06505       {
06506          return $categories[$key];
06507       }
06508       else
06509       {
06510          return null;
06511       }
06512    }
06513 
06514    function get_categories()
06515    {
06516       if ($this->categories !== null)
06517       {
06518          return $this->categories;
06519       }
06520       else
06521       {
06522          return null;
06523       }
06524    }
06525 
06526    function get_channels()
06527    {
06528       if ($this->channels !== null)
06529       {
06530          return $this->channels;
06531       }
06532       else
06533       {
06534          return null;
06535       }
06536    }
06537 
06538    function get_copyright()
06539    {
06540       if ($this->copyright !== null)
06541       {
06542          return $this->copyright;
06543       }
06544       else
06545       {
06546          return null;
06547       }
06548    }
06549 
06550    function get_credit($key = 0)
06551    {
06552       $credits = $this->get_credits();
06553       if (isset($credits[$key]))
06554       {
06555          return $credits[$key];
06556       }
06557       else
06558       {
06559          return null;
06560       }
06561    }
06562 
06563    function get_credits()
06564    {
06565       if ($this->credits !== null)
06566       {
06567          return $this->credits;
06568       }
06569       else
06570       {
06571          return null;
06572       }
06573    }
06574 
06575    function get_description()
06576    {
06577       if ($this->description !== null)
06578       {
06579          return $this->description;
06580       }
06581       else
06582       {
06583          return null;
06584       }
06585    }
06586 
06587    function get_duration($convert = false)
06588    {
06589       if ($this->duration !== null)
06590       {
06591          if ($convert)
06592          {
06593             $time = SimplePie_Misc::time_hms($this->duration);
06594             return $time;
06595          }
06596          else
06597          {
06598             return $this->duration;
06599          }
06600       }
06601       else
06602       {
06603          return null;
06604       }
06605    }
06606 
06607    function get_expression()
06608    {
06609       if ($this->expression !== null)
06610       {
06611          return $this->expression;
06612       }
06613       else
06614       {
06615          return 'full';
06616       }
06617    }
06618 
06619    function get_extension()
06620    {
06621       if ($this->link !== null)
06622       {
06623          $url = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($this->link);
06624          if ($url['path'] !== '')
06625          {
06626             return pathinfo($url['path'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION);
06627          }
06628       }
06629       return null;
06630    }
06631 
06632    function get_framerate()
06633    {
06634       if ($this->framerate !== null)
06635       {
06636          return $this->framerate;
06637       }
06638       else
06639       {
06640          return null;
06641       }
06642    }
06643 
06644    function get_handler()
06645    {
06646       return $this->get_real_type(true);
06647    }
06648 
06649    function get_hash($key = 0)
06650    {
06651       $hashes = $this->get_hashes();
06652       if (isset($hashes[$key]))
06653       {
06654          return $hashes[$key];
06655       }
06656       else
06657       {
06658          return null;
06659       }
06660    }
06661 
06662    function get_hashes()
06663    {
06664       if ($this->hashes !== null)
06665       {
06666          return $this->hashes;
06667       }
06668       else
06669       {
06670          return null;
06671       }
06672    }
06673

06676       if ($this->height !== null)

06679       }
06680       else
06681       {
06682          return null;
06683       }
06684    }

06694          return null;
06695       }
06696    }
06697

06704       }
06705       else
06706       {
06707          return null;
06708       }
06709    }

06716       }
06717       else
06718       {
06719          return null;
06720       }

06728       }
06729       else
06730       {
06731          return null;
06732       }
06733    }
06734 
06735    function get_link()
06736    {
06737       if ($this->link !== null)
06738       {
06739          return urldecode($this->link);
06740       }
06741       else
06742       {
06743          return null;
06744       }
06745    }
06746

06748    {
06749       if ($this->medium !== null)
06750       {
06751          return $this->medium;
06752       }
06753       else
06754       {
06755          return null;
06756       }
06757    }

06761       if ($this->player !== null)

06764       }
06765       else

06767          return null;
06768       }
06769    }
06770 
06771    function get_rating($key = 0)
06772    {
06773       $ratings = $this->get_ratings();
06774       if (isset($ratings[$key]))

06776          return $ratings[$key];
06777       }
06778       else

06780          return null;

06789       }
06790       else
06791       {
06792          return null;
06793       }
06794    }
06795

06797    {

06800       {
06801          return $restrictions[$key];
06802       }
06803       else
06804       {
06805          return null;
06806       }
06807    }

06814       }
06815       else
06816       {
06817          return null;

06819    }

06822    {
06823       if ($this->samplingrate !== null)
06824       {
06825          return $this->samplingrate;
06826       }
06827       else
06828       {
06829          return null;
06830       }
06831    }
06832 
06833    function get_size()
06834    {
06835       $length = $this->get_length();
06836       if ($length !== null)
06837       {
06838          return round($length/1048576, 2);
06839       }
06840       else
06841       {
06842          return null;
06843       }
06844    }
06845 
06846    function get_thumbnail($key = 0)
06847    {
06848       $thumbnails = $this->get_thumbnails();
06849       if (isset($thumbnails[$key]))
06850       {
06851          return $thumbnails[$key];
06852       }
06853       else
06854       {
06855          return null;
06856       }
06857    }
06858 
06859    function get_thumbnails()
06860    {
06861       if ($this->thumbnails !== null)
06862       {
06863          return $this->thumbnails;
06864       }
06865       else
06866       {
06867          return null;
06868       }
06869    }
06870 
06871    function get_title()
06872    {
06873       if ($this->title !== null)

06876       }
06877       else
06878       {
06879          return null;
06880       }
06881    }
06882

06885       if ($this->type !== null)

06888       }
06889       else
06890       {
06891          return null;
06892       }
06893    }
06894 
06895    function get_width()
06896    {
06897       if ($this->width !== null)
06898       {
06899          return $this->width;
06900       }
06901       else
06902       {
06903          return null;
06904       }
06905    }
06906 
06907    function native_embed($options='')
06908    {
06909       return $this->embed($options, true);
06910    }
06911 
06912    /**
06913     * @todo If the dimensions for media:content are defined, use them when width/height are set to 'auto'.
06914     */
06915    function embed($options = '', $native = false)
06916    {
06917       // Set up defaults
06918       $audio = '';
06919       $video = '';
06920       $alt = '';
06921       $altclass = '';
06922       $loop = 'false';
06923       $width = 'auto';
06924       $height = 'auto';
06925       $bgcolor = '#ffffff';
06926       $mediaplayer = '';
06927       $widescreen = false;
06928       $handler = $this->get_handler();
06929       $type = $this->get_real_type();
06930 
06931       // Process options and reassign values as necessary
06932       if (is_array($options))
06933       {
06934          extract($options);
06935       }
06936       else
06937       {
06938          $options = explode(',', $options);
06939          foreach($options as $option)
06940          {
06941             $opt = explode(':', $option, 2);
06942             if (isset($opt[0], $opt[1]))
06943             {
06944                $opt[0] = trim($opt[0]);
06945                $opt[1] = trim($opt[1]);
06946                switch ($opt[0])
06947                {
06948                   case 'audio':
06949                      $audio = $opt[1];
06950                      break;
06951 
06952                   case 'video':
06953                      $video = $opt[1];
06954                      break;
06955 
06956                   case 'alt':
06957                      $alt = $opt[1];
06958                      break;
06959 
06960                   case 'altclass':
06961                      $altclass = $opt[1];
06962                      break;
06963 
06964                   case 'loop':
06965                      $loop = $opt[1];
06966                      break;
06967 
06968                   case 'width':
06969                      $width = $opt[1];
06970                      break;
06971 
06972                   case 'height':
06973                      $height = $opt[1];
06974                      break;
06975 
06976                   case 'bgcolor':
06977                      $bgcolor = $opt[1];
06978                      break;
06979 
06980                   case 'mediaplayer':
06981                      $mediaplayer = $opt[1];
06982                      break;
06983 
06984                   case 'widescreen':
06985                      $widescreen = $opt[1];
06986                      break;
06987                }
06988             }
06989          }
06990       }
06991 
06992       $mime = explode('/', $type, 2);
06993       $mime = $mime[0];
06994 
06995       // Process values for 'auto'
06996       if ($width === 'auto')
06997       {
06998          if ($mime === 'video')
06999          {
07000             if ($height === 'auto')
07001             {
07002                $width = 480;
07003             }
07004             elseif ($widescreen)
07005             {
07006                $width = round((intval($height)/9)*16);
07007             }
07008             else
07009             {
07010                $width = round((intval($height)/3)*4);
07011             }
07012          }
07013          else
07014          {
07015             $width = '100%';
07016          }
07017       }
07018 
07019       if ($height === 'auto')
07020       {
07021          if ($mime === 'audio')
07022          {
07023             $height = 0;
07024          }
07025          elseif ($mime === 'video')
07026          {
07027             if ($width === 'auto')
07028             {
07029                if ($widescreen)
07030                {
07031                   $height = 270;
07032                }
07033                else
07034                {
07035                   $height = 360;
07036                }
07037             }
07038             elseif ($widescreen)
07039             {
07040                $height = round((intval($width)/16)*9);
07041             }
07042             else
07043             {
07044                $height = round((intval($width)/4)*3);
07045             }
07046          }
07047          else
07048          {
07049             $height = 376;
07050          }
07051       }
07052       elseif ($mime === 'audio')
07053       {
07054          $height = 0;
07055       }
07056 
07057       // Set proper placeholder value
07058       if ($mime === 'audio')
07059       {
07060          $placeholder = $audio;
07061       }
07062       elseif ($mime === 'video')
07063       {
07064          $placeholder = $video;
07065       }
07066 
07067       $embed = '';
07068 
07069       // Make sure the JS library is included
07070       if (!$native)
07071       {
07072          static $javascript_outputted = null;
07073          if (!$javascript_outputted && $this->javascript)
07074          {
07075             $embed .= '<script type="text/javascript" src="?' . htmlspecialchars($this->javascript) . '"></script>';
07076             $javascript_outputted = true;
07077          }
07078       }
07079 
07080       // Odeo Feed MP3's
07081       if ($handler === 'odeo')
07082       {
07083          if ($native)
07084          {
07085             $embed .= '<embed src="http://odeo.com/flash/audio_player_fullsize.swf" pluginspage="http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" quality="high" width="440" height="80" wmode="transparent" allowScriptAccess="any" flashvars="valid_sample_rate=true&external_url=' . $this->get_link() . '"></embed>';
07086          }
07087          else
07088          {
07089             $embed .= '<script type="text/javascript">embed_odeo("' . $this->get_link() . '");</script>';
07090          }
07091       }
07092 
07093       // Flash
07094       elseif ($handler === 'flash')
07095       {
07096          if ($native)
07097          {
07098             $embed .= "<embed src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" pluginspage=\"http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer\" type=\"$type\" quality=\"high\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" loop=\"$loop\"></embed>";
07099          }
07100          else
07101          {
07102             $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_flash('$bgcolor', '$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "', '$loop', '$type');</script>";
07103          }
07104       }
07105 
07106       // Flash Media Player file types.
07107       // Preferred handler for MP3 file types.
07108       elseif ($handler === 'fmedia' || ($handler === 'mp3' && $mediaplayer !== ''))
07109       {
07110          $height += 20;
07111          if ($native)
07112          {
07113             $embed .= "<embed src=\"$mediaplayer\" pluginspage=\"http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" quality=\"high\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" wmode=\"transparent\" flashvars=\"file=" . rawurlencode($this->get_link().'?file_extension=.'.$this->get_extension()) . "&autostart=false&repeat=$loop&showdigits=true&showfsbutton=false\"></embed>";
07114          }
07115          else
07116          {
07117             $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_flv('$width', '$height', '" . rawurlencode($this->get_link().'?file_extension=.'.$this->get_extension()) . "', '$placeholder', '$loop', '$mediaplayer');</script>";
07118          }
07119       }
07120 
07121       // QuickTime 7 file types.  Need to test with QuickTime 6.
07122       // Only handle MP3's if the Flash Media Player is not present.
07123       elseif ($handler === 'quicktime' || ($handler === 'mp3' && $mediaplayer === ''))
07124       {
07125          $height += 16;
07126          if ($native)
07127          {
07128             if ($placeholder !== '')
07129             {
07130                $embed .= "<embed type=\"$type\" style=\"cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;\" href=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" src=\"$placeholder\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" autoplay=\"false\" target=\"myself\" controller=\"false\" loop=\"$loop\" scale=\"aspect\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" pluginspage=\"http://apple.com/quicktime/download/\"></embed>";
07131             }
07132             else
07133             {
07134                $embed .= "<embed type=\"$type\" style=\"cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;\" src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" autoplay=\"false\" target=\"myself\" controller=\"true\" loop=\"$loop\" scale=\"aspect\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" pluginspage=\"http://apple.com/quicktime/download/\"></embed>";
07135             }
07136          }
07137          else
07138          {
07139             $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_quicktime('$type', '$bgcolor', '$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "', '$placeholder', '$loop');</script>";
07140          }
07141       }
07142 
07143       // Windows Media
07144       elseif ($handler === 'wmedia')
07145       {
07146          $height += 45;
07147          if ($native)
07148          {
07149             $embed .= "<embed type=\"application/x-mplayer2\" src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" autosize=\"1\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" showcontrols=\"1\" showstatusbar=\"0\" showdisplay=\"0\" autostart=\"0\"></embed>";
07150          }
07151          else
07152          {
07153             $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_wmedia('$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "');</script>";
07154          }
07155       }
07156 
07157       // Everything else
07158       else $embed .= '<a href="' . $this->get_link() . '" class="' . $altclass . '">' . $alt . '</a>';
07159 
07160       return $embed;
07161    }
07162 
07163    function get_real_type($find_handler = false)
07164    {
07165       // If it's Odeo, let's get it out of the way.
07166       if (substr(strtolower($this->get_link()), 0, 15) === 'http://odeo.com')
07167       {
07168          return 'odeo';
07169       }
07170 
07171       // Mime-types by handler.
07172       $types_flash = array('application/x-shockwave-flash', 'application/futuresplash'); // Flash
07173       $types_fmedia = array('video/flv', 'video/x-flv','flv-application/octet-stream'); // Flash Media Player
07174       $types_quicktime = array('audio/3gpp', 'audio/3gpp2', 'audio/aac', 'audio/x-aac', 'audio/aiff', 'audio/x-aiff', 'audio/mid', 'audio/midi', 'audio/x-midi', 'audio/mp4', 'audio/m4a', 'audio/x-m4a', 'audio/wav', 'audio/x-wav', 'video/3gpp', 'video/3gpp2', 'video/m4v', 'video/x-m4v', 'video/mp4', 'video/mpeg', 'video/x-mpeg', 'video/quicktime', 'video/sd-video'); // QuickTime
07175       $types_wmedia = array('application/asx', 'application/x-mplayer2', 'audio/x-ms-wma', 'audio/x-ms-wax', 'video/x-ms-asf-plugin', 'video/x-ms-asf', 'video/x-ms-wm', 'video/x-ms-wmv', 'video/x-ms-wvx'); // Windows Media
07176       $types_mp3 = array('audio/mp3', 'audio/x-mp3', 'audio/mpeg', 'audio/x-mpeg'); // MP3
07177 
07178       if ($this->get_type() !== null)
07179       {
07180          $type = strtolower($this->type);
07181       }
07182       else
07183       {
07184          $type = null;
07185       }
07186 
07187       // If we encounter an unsupported mime-type, check the file extension and guess intelligently.
07188       if (!in_array($type, array_merge($types_flash, $types_fmedia, $types_quicktime, $types_wmedia, $types_mp3)))
07189       {
07190          switch (strtolower($this->get_extension()))
07191          {
07192             // Audio mime-types
07193             case 'aac':
07194             case 'adts':
07195                $type = 'audio/acc';
07196                break;
07197 
07198             case 'aif':
07199             case 'aifc':
07200             case 'aiff':
07201             case 'cdda':
07202                $type = 'audio/aiff';
07203                break;
07204 
07205             case 'bwf':
07206                $type = 'audio/wav';
07207                break;
07208 
07209             case 'kar':
07210             case 'mid':
07211             case 'midi':
07212             case 'smf':
07213                $type = 'audio/midi';
07214                break;
07215 
07216             case 'm4a':
07217                $type = 'audio/x-m4a';
07218                break;
07219 
07220             case 'mp3':
07221             case 'swa':
07222                $type = 'audio/mp3';
07223                break;
07224 
07225             case 'wav':
07226                $type = 'audio/wav';
07227                break;
07228 
07229             case 'wax':
07230                $type = 'audio/x-ms-wax';
07231                break;
07232 
07233             case 'wma':
07234                $type = 'audio/x-ms-wma';
07235                break;
07236 
07237             // Video mime-types
07238             case '3gp':
07239             case '3gpp':
07240                $type = 'video/3gpp';
07241                break;
07242 
07243             case '3g2':
07244             case '3gp2':
07245                $type = 'video/3gpp2';
07246                break;
07247 
07248             case 'asf':
07249                $type = 'video/x-ms-asf';
07250                break;
07251 
07252             case 'flv':
07253                $type = 'video/x-flv';
07254                break;
07255 
07256             case 'm1a':
07257             case 'm1s':
07258             case 'm1v':
07259             case 'm15':
07260             case 'm75':
07261             case 'mp2':
07262             case 'mpa':
07263             case 'mpeg':
07264             case 'mpg':
07265             case 'mpm':
07266             case 'mpv':
07267                $type = 'video/mpeg';
07268                break;
07269 
07270             case 'm4v':
07271                $type = 'video/x-m4v';
07272                break;
07273 
07274             case 'mov':
07275             case 'qt':
07276                $type = 'video/quicktime';
07277                break;
07278 
07279             case 'mp4':
07280             case 'mpg4':
07281                $type = 'video/mp4';
07282                break;
07283 
07284             case 'sdv':
07285                $type = 'video/sd-video';
07286                break;
07287 
07288             case 'wm':
07289                $type = 'video/x-ms-wm';
07290                break;
07291 
07292             case 'wmv':
07293                $type = 'video/x-ms-wmv';
07294                break;
07295 
07296             case 'wvx':
07297                $type = 'video/x-ms-wvx';
07298                break;
07299 
07300             // Flash mime-types
07301             case 'spl':
07302                $type = 'application/futuresplash';
07303                break;
07304 
07305             case 'swf':
07306                $type = 'application/x-shockwave-flash';
07307                break;
07308          }
07309       }
07310 
07311       if ($find_handler)
07312       {
07313          if (in_array($type, $types_flash))
07314          {
07315             return 'flash';
07316          }
07317          elseif (in_array($type, $types_fmedia))
07318          {
07319             return 'fmedia';
07320          }
07321          elseif (in_array($type, $types_quicktime))
07322          {
07323             return 'quicktime';
07324          }
07325          elseif (in_array($type, $types_wmedia))
07326          {
07327             return 'wmedia';
07328          }
07329          elseif (in_array($type, $types_mp3))
07330          {
07331             return 'mp3';
07332          }
07333          else
07334          {
07335             return null;
07336          }
07337       }
07338       else
07339       {
07340          return $type;
07341       }
07342    }
07343 }
07344 
07345 class SimplePie_Caption
07346 {
07347    var $type;
07348    var $lang;
07349    var $startTime;
07350    var $endTime;
07351    var $text;
07352 
07353    // Constructor, used to input the data
07354    function SimplePie_Caption($type = null, $lang = null, $startTime = null, $endTime = null, $text = null)
07355    {
07356       $this->type = $type;
07357       $this->lang = $lang;
07358       $this->startTime = $startTime;
07359       $this->endTime = $endTime;
07360       $this->text = $text;
07361    }
07362 
07363    function __toString()
07364    {
07365       // There is no $this->data here
07366       return md5(serialize($this));
07367    }
07368 
07369    function get_endtime()
07370    {
07371       if ($this->endTime !== null)
07372       {
07373          return $this->endTime;
07374       }
07375       else
07376       {
07377          return null;
07378       }
07379    }
07380 
07381    function get_language()
07382    {
07383       if ($this->lang !== null)
07384       {
07385          return $this->lang;
07386       }
07387       else
07388       {
07389          return null;
07390       }
07391    }
07392 
07393    function get_starttime()
07394    {
07395       if ($this->startTime !== null)
07396       {
07397          return $this->startTime;
07398       }
07399       else
07400       {
07401          return null;
07402       }
07403    }
07404 
07405    function get_text()
07406    {
07407       if ($this->text !== null)
07408       {
07409          return $this->text;
07410       }
07411       else
07412       {
07413          return null;
07414       }
07415    }
07416 
07417    function get_type()
07418    {
07419       if ($this->type !== null)
07420       {
07421          return $this->type;
07422       }
07423       else
07424       {
07425          return null;
07426       }
07427    }
07428 }
07429

07591    }
