07629 
07630 /**
07631  * @todo Move to properly supporting RFC2616 (HTTP/1.1)
07632  */
07633 class SimplePie_File
07634 {
07635    var $url;
07636    var $useragent;
07637    var $success = true;
07638    var $headers = array();
07639    var $body;
07640    var $status_code;
07641    var $redirects = 0;
07642    var $error;
07643    var $method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_NONE;
07644 
07645    function SimplePie_File($url, $timeout = 10, $redirects = 5, $headers = null, $useragent = null, $force_fsockopen = false)
07646    {
07647       if (class_exists('idna_convert'))
07648       {
07649          $idn =& new idna_convert;
07650          $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($url);
07651          $url = SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url($parsed['scheme'], $idn->encode($parsed['authority']), $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']);
07652       }
07653       $this->url = $url;
07654       $this->useragent = $useragent;
07655       if (preg_match('/^http(s)?:\/\//i', $url))
07656       {
07657          if ($useragent === null)
07658          {
07659             $useragent = ini_get('user_agent');
07660             $this->useragent = $useragent;
07661          }
07662          if (!is_array($headers))
07663          {
07664             $headers = array();
07665          }
07666          if (!$force_fsockopen && function_exists('curl_exec'))
07667          {
07668             $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_CURL;
07669             $fp = curl_init();
07670             $headers2 = array();
07671             foreach ($headers as $key => $value)
07672             {
07673                $headers2[] = "$key: $value";
07674             }
07675             if (version_compare(SimplePie_Misc::get_curl_version(), '7.10.5', '>='))
07676             {
07677                curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
07678             }
07679             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
07680             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_HEADER, 1);
07681             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
07682             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
07683             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $timeout);
07684             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_REFERER, $url);
07685             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $useragent);
07686             curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers2);
07687             if (!ini_get('open_basedir') && !ini_get('safe_mode') && version_compare(SimplePie_Misc::get_curl_version(), '7.15.2', '>='))
07688             {
07689                curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
07690                curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, $redirects);
07691             }
07692 
07693             $this->headers = curl_exec($fp);
07694             if (curl_errno($fp) === 23 || curl_errno($fp) === 61)
07695             {
07696                curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_ENCODING, 'none');
07697                $this->headers = curl_exec($fp);
07698             }
07699             if (curl_errno($fp))
07700             {
07701                $this->error = 'cURL error ' . curl_errno($fp) . ': ' . curl_error($fp);
07702                $this->success = false;
07703             }
07704             else
07705             {
07706                $info = curl_getinfo($fp);
07707                curl_close($fp);
07708                $this->headers = explode("\r\n\r\n", $this->headers, $info['redirect_count'] + 1);
07709                $this->headers = array_pop($this->headers);
07710                $parser =& new SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($this->headers);
07711                if ($parser->parse())
07712                {
07713                   $this->headers = $parser->headers;
07714                   $this->body = $parser->body;
07715                   $this->status_code = $parser->status_code;
07716                   if ((in_array($this->status_code, array(300, 301, 302, 303, 307)) || $this->status_code > 307 && $this->status_code < 400) && isset($this->headers['location']) && $this->redirects < $redirects)
07717                   {
07718                      $this->redirects++;
07719                      $location = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url($this->headers['location'], $url);
07720                      return $this->SimplePie_File($location, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $useragent, $force_fsockopen);
07721                   }
07722                }
07723             }
07724          }
07725          else
07726          {
07727             $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FSOCKOPEN;
07728             $url_parts = parse_url($url);
07729             if (isset($url_parts['scheme']) && strtolower($url_parts['scheme']) === 'https')
07730             {
07731                $url_parts['host'] = "ssl://$url_parts[host]";
07732                $url_parts['port'] = 443;
07733             }
07734             if (!isset($url_parts['port']))
07735             {
07736                $url_parts['port'] = 80;
07737             }
07738             $fp = @fsockopen($url_parts['host'], $url_parts['port'], $errno, $errstr, $timeout);
07739             if (!$fp)
07740             {
07741                $this->error = 'fsockopen error: ' . $errstr;
07742                $this->success = false;
07743             }
07744             else
07745             {
07746                stream_set_timeout($fp, $timeout);
07747                if (isset($url_parts['path']))
07748                {
07749                   if (isset($url_parts['query']))
07750                   {
07751                      $get = "$url_parts[path]?$url_parts[query]";
07752                   }
07753                   else
07754                   {
07755                      $get = $url_parts['path'];
07756                   }
07757                }
07758                else
07759                {
07760                   $get = '/';
07761                }
07762                $out = "GET $get HTTP/1.0\r\n";
07763                $out .= "Host: $url_parts[host]\r\n";
07764                $out .= "User-Agent: $useragent\r\n";
07765                if (extension_loaded('zlib'))
07766                {
07767                   $out .= "Accept-Encoding: x-gzip,gzip,deflate\r\n";
07768                }
07769 
07770                if (isset($url_parts['user']) && isset($url_parts['pass']))
07771                {
07772                   $out .= "Authorization: Basic " . base64_encode("$url_parts[user]:$url_parts[pass]") . "\r\n";
07773                }
07774                foreach ($headers as $key => $value)
07775                {
07776                   $out .= "$key: $value\r\n";
07777                }
07778                $out .= "Connection: Close\r\n\r\n";
07779                fwrite($fp, $out);
07780 
07781                $info = stream_get_meta_data($fp);
07782 
07783                $this->headers = '';
07784                while (!$info['eof'] && !$info['timed_out'])
07785                {
07786                   $this->headers .= fread($fp, 1160);
07787                   $info = stream_get_meta_data($fp);
07788                }
07789                if (!$info['timed_out'])
07790                {
07791                   $parser =& new SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($this->headers);
07792                   if ($parser->parse())
07793                   {
07794                      $this->headers = $parser->headers;
07795                      $this->body = $parser->body;
07796                      $this->status_code = $parser->status_code;
07797                      if ((in_array($this->status_code, array(300, 301, 302, 303, 307)) || $this->status_code > 307 && $this->status_code < 400) && isset($this->headers['location']) && $this->redirects < $redirects)
07798                      {
07799                         $this->redirects++;
07800                         $location = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url($this->headers['location'], $url);
07801                         return $this->SimplePie_File($location, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $useragent, $force_fsockopen);
07802                      }
07803                      if (isset($this->headers['content-encoding']))
07804                      {
07805                         // Hey, we act dumb elsewhere, so let's do that here too
07806                         switch (strtolower(trim($this->headers['content-encoding'], "\x09\x0A\x0D\x20")))
07807                         {
07808                            case 'gzip':
07809                            case 'x-gzip':
07810                               $decoder =& new SimplePie_gzdecode($this->body);
07811                               if (!$decoder->parse())
07812                               {
07813                                  $this->error = 'Unable to decode HTTP "gzip" stream';
07814                                  $this->success = false;
07815                               }
07816                               else
07817                               {
07818                                  $this->body = $decoder->data;
07819                               }
07820                               break;
07821 
07822                            case 'deflate':
07823                               if (($body = gzuncompress($this->body)) === false)
07824                               {
07825                                  if (($body = gzinflate($this->body)) === false)
07826                                  {
07827                                     $this->error = 'Unable to decode HTTP "deflate" stream';
07828                                     $this->success = false;
07829                                  }
07830                               }
07831                               $this->body = $body;
07832                               break;
07833 
07834                            default:
07835                               $this->error = 'Unknown content coding';
07836                               $this->success = false;
07837                         }
07838                      }
07839                   }
07840                }
07841                else
07842                {
07843                   $this->error = 'fsocket timed out';
07844                   $this->success = false;
07845                }
07846                fclose($fp);
07847             }
07848          }
07849       }
07850       else
07851       {
07852          $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_LOCAL | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FILE_GET_CONTENTS;
07853 
07854          if (!$this->body = file_get_contents($url))
07855          {
07856             $this->error = 'file_get_contents could not read the file';
07857             $this->success = false;
07858          }
07859       }
07860    }
07861 }
07862 
07863 /**
07864  * HTTP Response Parser
07865  *
07866  * @package SimplePie
07867  */
07868 class SimplePie_HTTP_Parser
07869 {
07870    /**
07871     * HTTP Version
07872     *
07873     * @access public
07874     * @var float
07875     */
07876    var $http_version = 0.0;
07877 
07878    /**
07879     * Status code
07880     *
07881     * @access public
07882     * @var int
07883     */
07884    var $status_code = 0;
07885 
07886    /**
07887     * Reason phrase
07888     *
07889     * @access public
07890     * @var string
07891     */
07892    var $reason = '';
07893 
07894    /**
07895     * Key/value pairs of the headers
07896     *
07897     * @access public
07898     * @var array
07899     */
07900    var $headers = array();
07901 
07902    /**
07903     * Body of the response
07904     *
07905     * @access public
07906     * @var string
07907     */
07908    var $body = '';
07909 
07910    /**
07911     * Current state of the state machine
07912     *
07913     * @access private
07914     * @var string
07915     */
07916    var $state = 'http_version';
07917 
07918    /**
07919     * Input data
07920     *
07921     * @access private
07922     * @var string
07923     */
07924    var $data = '';
07925 
07926    /**
07927     * Input data length (to avoid calling strlen() everytime this is needed)
07928     *
07929     * @access private
07930     * @var int
07931     */
07932    var $data_length = 0;
07933 
07934    /**
07935     * Current position of the pointer
07936     *
07937     * @var int
07938     * @access private
07939     */
07940    var $position = 0;
07941 
07942    /**
07943     * Name of the hedaer currently being parsed
07944     *
07945     * @access private
07946     * @var string
07947     */
07948    var $name = '';
07949 
07950    /**
07951     * Value of the hedaer currently being parsed
07952     *
07953     * @access private
07954     * @var string
07955     */
07956    var $value = '';
07957 
07958    /**
07959     * Create an instance of the class with the input data
07960     *
07961     * @access public
07962     * @param string $data Input data
07963     */
07964    function SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($data)
07965    {
07966       $this->data = $data;
07967       $this->data_length = strlen($this->data);
07968    }
07969 
07970    /**
07971     * Parse the input data
07972     *
07973     * @access public
07974     * @return bool true on success, false on failure
07975     */
07976    function parse()
07977    {
07978       while ($this->state && $this->state !== 'emit' && $this->has_data())
07979       {
07980          $state = $this->state;
07981          $this->$state();
07982       }
07983       $this->data = '';
07984       if ($this->state === 'emit' || $this->state === 'body')
07985       {
07986          return true;
07987       }
07988       else
07989       {
07990          $this->http_version = '';
07991          $this->status_code = '';
07992          $this->reason = '';
07993          $this->headers = array();
07994          $this->body = '';
07995          return false;
07996       }
07997    }
07998 
07999    /**
08000     * Check whether there is data beyond the pointer
08001     *
08002     * @access private
08003     * @return bool true if there is further data, false if not
08004     */
08005    function has_data()
08006    {
08007       return (bool) ($this->position < $this->data_length);
08008    }
08009 
08010    /**
08011     * See if the next character is LWS
08012     *
08013     * @access private
08014     * @return bool true if the next character is LWS, false if not
08015     */
08016    function is_linear_whitespace()
08017    {
08018       return (bool) ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x09"
08019          || $this->data[$this->position] === "\x20"
08020          || ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A"
08021             && isset($this->data[$this->position + 1])
08022             && ($this->data[$this->position + 1] === "\x09" || $this->data[$this->position + 1] === "\x20")));
08023    }
08024 
08025    /**
08026     * Parse the HTTP version
08027     *
08028     * @access private
08029     */
08030    function http_version()
08031    {
08032       if (strpos($this->data, "\x0A") !== false && strtoupper(substr($this->data, 0, 5)) === 'HTTP/')
08033       {
08034          $len = strspn($this->data, '0123456789.', 5);
08035          $this->http_version = substr($this->data, 5, $len);
08036          $this->position += 5 + $len;
08037          if (substr_count($this->http_version, '.') <= 1)
08038          {
08039             $this->http_version = (float) $this->http_version;
08040             $this->position += strspn($this->data, "\x09\x20", $this->position);
08041             $this->state = 'status';
08042          }
08043          else
08044          {
08045             $this->state = false;
08046          }
08047       }
08048       else
08049       {
08050          $this->state = false;
08051       }
08052    }
08053 
08054    /**
08055     * Parse the status code
08056     *
08057     * @access private
08058     */
08059    function status()
08060    {
08061       if ($len = strspn($this->data, '0123456789', $this->position))
08062       {
08063          $this->status_code = (int) substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08064          $this->position += $len;
08065          $this->state = 'reason';
08066       }
08067       else
08068       {
08069          $this->state = false;
08070       }
08071    }
08072 
08073    /**
08074     * Parse the reason phrase
08075     *
08076     * @access private
08077     */
08078    function reason()
08079    {
08080       $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x0A", $this->position);
08081       $this->reason = trim(substr($this->data, $this->position, $len), "\x09\x0D\x20");
08082       $this->position += $len + 1;
08083       $this->state = 'new_line';
08084    }
08085 
08086    /**
08087     * Deal with a new line, shifting data around as needed
08088     *
08089     * @access private
08090     */
08091    function new_line()
08092    {
08093       $this->value = trim($this->value, "\x0D\x20");
08094       if ($this->name !== '' && $this->value !== '')
08095       {
08096          $this->name = strtolower($this->name);
08097          if (isset($this->headers[$this->name]))
08098          {
08099             $this->headers[$this->name] .= ', ' . $this->value;
08100          }
08101          else
08102          {
08103             $this->headers[$this->name] = $this->value;
08104          }
08105       }
08106       $this->name = '';
08107       $this->value = '';
08108       if (substr($this->data[$this->position], 0, 2) === "\x0D\x0A")
08109       {
08110          $this->position += 2;
08111          $this->state = 'body';
08112       }
08113       elseif ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A")
08114       {
08115          $this->position++;
08116          $this->state = 'body';
08117       }
08118       else
08119       {
08120          $this->state = 'name';
08121       }
08122    }
08123 
08124    /**
08125     * Parse a header name
08126     *
08127     * @access private
08128     */
08129    function name()
08130    {
08131       $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x0A:", $this->position);
08132       if (isset($this->data[$this->position + $len]))
08133       {
08134          if ($this->data[$this->position + $len] === "\x0A")
08135          {
08136             $this->position += $len;
08137             $this->state = 'new_line';
08138          }
08139          else
08140          {
08141             $this->name = substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08142             $this->position += $len + 1;
08143             $this->state = 'value';
08144          }
08145       }
08146       else
08147       {
08148          $this->state = false;
08149       }
08150    }
08151 
08152    /**
08153     * Parse LWS, replacing consecutive LWS characters with a single space
08154     *
08155     * @access private
08156     */
08157    function linear_whitespace()
08158    {
08159       do
08160       {
08161          if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 2) === "\x0D\x0A")
08162          {
08163             $this->position += 2;
08164          }
08165          elseif ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A")
08166          {
08167             $this->position++;
08168          }
08169          $this->position += strspn($this->data, "\x09\x20", $this->position);
08170       } while ($this->has_data() && $this->is_linear_whitespace());
08171       $this->value .= "\x20";
08172    }
08173 
08174    /**
08175     * See what state to move to while within non-quoted header values
08176     *
08177     * @access private
08178     */
08179    function value()
08180    {
08181       if ($this->is_linear_whitespace())
08182       {
08183          $this->linear_whitespace();
08184       }
08185       else
08186       {
08187          switch ($this->data[$this->position])
08188          {
08189             case '"':
08190                $this->position++;
08191                $this->state = 'quote';
08192                break;
08193 
08194             case "\x0A":
08195                $this->position++;
08196                $this->state = 'new_line';
08197                break;
08198 
08199             default:
08200                $this->state = 'value_char';
08201                break;
08202          }
08203       }
08204    }
08205 
08206    /**
08207     * Parse a header value while outside quotes
08208     *
08209     * @access private
08210     */
08211    function value_char()
08212    {
08213       $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x09\x20\x0A\"", $this->position);
08214       $this->value .= substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08215       $this->position += $len;
08216       $this->state = 'value';
08217    }
08218 
08219    /**
08220     * See what state to move to while within quoted header values
08221     *
08222     * @access private
08223     */
08224    function quote()
08225    {
08226       if ($this->is_linear_whitespace())
08227       {
08228          $this->linear_whitespace();
08229       }
08230       else
08231       {
08232          switch ($this->data[$this->position])
08233          {
08234             case '"':
08235                $this->position++;
08236                $this->state = 'value';
08237                break;
08238 
08239             case "\x0A":
08240                $this->position++;
08241                $this->state = 'new_line';
08242                break;
08243 
08244             case '\\':
08245                $this->position++;
08246                $this->state = 'quote_escaped';
08247                break;
08248 
08249             default:
08250                $this->state = 'quote_char';
08251                break;
08252          }
08253       }
08254    }
08255 
08256    /**
08257     * Parse a header value while within quotes
08258     *
08259     * @access private
08260     */
08261    function quote_char()
08262    {
08263       $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x09\x20\x0A\"\\", $this->position);
08264       $this->value .= substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
08265       $this->position += $len;
08266       $this->state = 'value';
08267    }
08268 
08269    /**
08270     * Parse an escaped character within quotes
08271     *
08272     * @access private
08273     */
08274    function quote_escaped()
08275    {
08276       $this->value .= $this->data[$this->position];
08277       $this->position++;
08278       $this->state = 'quote';
08279    }
08280 
08281    /**
08282     * Parse the body
08283     *
08284     * @access private
08285     */
08286    function body()
08287    {
08288       $this->body = substr($this->data, $this->position);
08289       $this->state = 'emit';
08290    }
08291 }
08292 
08293 /**
08294  * gzdecode
08295  *
08296  * @package SimplePie
08297  */
08298 class SimplePie_gzdecode
08299 {
08300    /**
08301     * Compressed data
08302     *
08303     * @access private
08304     * @see gzdecode::$data
08305     */
08306    var $compressed_data;
08307 
08308    /**
08309     * Size of compressed data
08310     *
08311     * @access private
08312     */
08313    var $compressed_size;
08314 
08315    /**
08316     * Minimum size of a valid gzip string
08317     *
08318     * @access private
08319     */
08320    var $min_compressed_size = 18;
08321 
08322    /**
08323     * Current position of pointer
08324     *
08325     * @access private
08326     */
08327    var $position = 0;
08328 
08329    /**
08330     * Flags (FLG)
08331     *
08332     * @access private
08333     */
08334    var $flags;
08335 
08336    /**
08337     * Uncompressed data
08338     *
08339     * @access public
08340     * @see gzdecode::$compressed_data
08341     */
08342    var $data;
08343 
08344    /**
08345     * Modified time
08346     *
08347     * @access public
08348     */
08349    var $MTIME;
08350 
08351    /**
08352     * Extra Flags
08353     *
08354     * @access public
08355     */
08356    var $XFL;
08357 
08358    /**
08359     * Operating System
08360     *
08361     * @access public
08362     */
08363    var $OS;
08364 
08365    /**
08366     * Subfield ID 1
08367     *
08368     * @access public
08369     * @see gzdecode::$extra_field
08370     * @see gzdecode::$SI2
08371     */
08372    var $SI1;
08373 
08374    /**
08375     * Subfield ID 2
08376     *
08377     * @access public
08378     * @see gzdecode::$extra_field
08379     * @see gzdecode::$SI1
08380     */
08381    var $SI2;
08382 
08383    /**
08384     * Extra field content
08385     *
08386     * @access public
08387     * @see gzdecode::$SI1
08388     * @see gzdecode::$SI2
08389     */
08390    var $extra_field;
08391 
08392    /**
08393     * Original filename
08394     *
08395     * @access public
08396     */
08397    var $filename;
08398 
08399    /**
08400     * Human readable comment
08401     *
08402     * @access public
08403     */
08404    var $comment;
08405 
08406    /**
08407     * Don't allow anything to be set
08408     *
08409     * @access public
08410     */
08411    function __set($name, $value)
08412    {
08413       trigger_error("Cannot write property $name", E_USER_ERROR);
08414    }
08415 
08416    /**
08417     * Set the compressed string and related properties
08418     *
08419     * @access public
08420     */
08421    function SimplePie_gzdecode($data)
08422    {
08423       $this->compressed_data = $data;
08424       $this->compressed_size = strlen($data);
08425    }
08426 
08427    /**
08428     * Decode the GZIP stream
08429     *
08430     * @access public
08431     */
08432    function parse()
08433    {
08434       if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08435       {
08436          // Check ID1, ID2, and CM
08437          if (substr($this->compressed_data, 0, 3) !== "\x1F\x8B\x08")
08438          {
08439             return false;
08440          }
08441 
08442          // Get the FLG (FLaGs)
08443          $this->flags = ord($this->compressed_data[3]);
08444 
08445          // FLG bits above (1 << 4) are reserved
08446          if ($this->flags > 0x1F)
08447          {
08448             return false;
08449          }
08450 
08451          // Advance the pointer after the above
08452          $this->position += 4;
08453 
08454          // MTIME
08455          $mtime = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4);
08456          // Reverse the string if we're on a big-endian arch because l is the only signed long and is machine endianness
08457          if (current(unpack('S', "\x00\x01")) === 1)
08458          {
08459             $mtime = strrev($mtime);
08460          }
08461          $this->MTIME = current(unpack('l', $mtime));
08462          $this->position += 4;
08463 
08464          // Get the XFL (eXtra FLags)
08465          $this->XFL = ord($this->compressed_data[$this->position++]);
08466 
08467          // Get the OS (Operating System)
08468          $this->OS = ord($this->compressed_data[$this->position++]);
08469 
08470          // Parse the FEXTRA
08471          if ($this->flags & 4)
08472          {
08473             // Read subfield IDs
08474             $this->SI1 = $this->compressed_data[$this->position++];
08475             $this->SI2 = $this->compressed_data[$this->position++];
08476 
08477             // SI2 set to zero is reserved for future use
08478             if ($this->SI2 === "\x00")
08479             {
08480                return false;
08481             }
08482 
08483             // Get the length of the extra field
08484             $len = current(unpack('v', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 2)));
08485             $position += 2;
08486 
08487             // Check the length of the string is still valid
08488             $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 4;
08489             if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08490             {
08491                // Set the extra field to the given data
08492                $this->extra_field = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
08493                $this->position += $len;
08494             }
08495             else
08496             {
08497                return false;
08498             }
08499          }
08500 
08501          // Parse the FNAME
08502          if ($this->flags & 8)
08503          {
08504             // Get the length of the filename
08505             $len = strcspn($this->compressed_data, "\x00", $this->position);
08506 
08507             // Check the length of the string is still valid
08508             $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 1;
08509             if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08510             {
08511                // Set the original filename to the given string
08512                $this->filename = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
08513                $this->position += $len + 1;
08514             }
08515             else
08516             {
08517                return false;
08518             }
08519          }
08520 
08521          // Parse the FCOMMENT
08522          if ($this->flags & 16)
08523          {
08524             // Get the length of the comment
08525             $len = strcspn($this->compressed_data, "\x00", $this->position);
08526 
08527             // Check the length of the string is still valid
08528             $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 1;
08529             if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08530             {
08531                // Set the original comment to the given string
08532                $this->comment = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
08533                $this->position += $len + 1;
08534             }
08535             else
08536             {
08537                return false;
08538             }
08539          }
08540 
08541          // Parse the FHCRC
08542          if ($this->flags & 2)
08543          {
08544             // Check the length of the string is still valid
08545             $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 2;
08546             if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
08547             {
08548                // Read the CRC
08549                $crc = current(unpack('v', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 2)));
08550 
08551                // Check the CRC matches
08552                if ((crc32(substr($this->compressed_data, 0, $this->position)) & 0xFFFF) === $crc)
08553                {
08554                   $this->position += 2;
08555                }
08556                else
08557                {
08558                   return false;
08559                }
08560             }
08561             else
08562             {
08563                return false;
08564             }
08565          }
08566 
08567          // Decompress the actual data
08568          if (($this->data = gzinflate(substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, -8))) === false)
08569          {
08570             return false;
08571          }
08572          else
08573          {
08574             $this->position = $this->compressed_size - 8;
08575          }
08576 
08577          // Check CRC of data
08578          $crc = current(unpack('V', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4)));
08579          $this->position += 4;
08580          /*if (extension_loaded('hash') && sprintf('%u', current(unpack('V', hash('crc32b', $this->data)))) !== sprintf('%u', $crc))
08581          {
08582             return false;
08583          }*/
08584 
08585          // Check ISIZE of data
08586          $isize = current(unpack('V', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4)));
08587          $this->position += 4;
08588          if (sprintf('%u', strlen($this->data) & 0xFFFFFFFF) !== sprintf('%u', $isize))
08589          {
08590             return false;
08591          }
08592 
08593          // Wow, against all odds, we've actually got a valid gzip string
08594          return true;
08595       }
08596       else
08597       {
08598          return false;
08599       }
08600    }
08601 }
08602 
08603 class SimplePie_Cache
08604 {
08605    /**
08606     * Don't call the constructor. Please.
08607     *
08608     * @access private
08609     */
08610    function SimplePie_Cache()
08611    {
08612       trigger_error('Please call SimplePie_Cache::create() instead of the constructor', E_USER_ERROR);
08613    }
08614 
08615    /**
08616     * Create a new SimplePie_Cache object
08617     *
08618     * @static
08619     * @access public
08620     */
08621    function create($location, $filename, $extension)
08622    {
08623       $location_iri =& new SimplePie_IRI($location);
08624       switch ($location_iri->get_scheme())
08625       {
08626          case 'mysql':
08627             if (extension_loaded('mysql'))
08628             {
08629                return new SimplePie_Cache_MySQL($location_iri, $filename, $extension);
08630             }
08631             break;
08632 
08633          default:
08634             return new SimplePie_Cache_File($location, $filename, $extension);
08635       }
08636    }
08637 }
08638 
08639 class SimplePie_Cache_File
08640 {
08641    var $location;
08642    var $filename;
08643    var $extension;
08644    var $name;
08645 
08646    function SimplePie_Cache_File($location, $filename, $extension)
08647    {
08648       $this->location = $location;
08649       $this->filename = $filename;
08650       $this->extension = $extension;
08651       $this->name = "$this->location/$this->filename.$this->extension";
08652    }
08653 
08654    function save($data)
08655    {
08656       if (file_exists($this->name) && is_writeable($this->name) || file_exists($this->location) && is_writeable($this->location))
08657       {
08658          if (is_a($data, 'SimplePie'))
08659          {
08660             $data = $data->data;
08661          }
08662 
08663          $data = serialize($data);
08664 
08665          if (function_exists('file_put_contents'))
08666          {
08667             return (bool) file_put_contents($this->name, $data);
08668          }
08669          else
08670          {
08671             $fp = fopen($this->name, 'wb');
08672             if ($fp)
08673             {
08674                fwrite($fp, $data);
08675                fclose($fp);
08676                return true;
08677             }
08678          }
08679       }
08680       return false;
08681    }
08682 
08683    function load()
08684    {
08685       if (file_exists($this->name) && is_readable($this->name))
08686       {
08687          return unserialize(file_get_contents($this->name));
08688       }
08689       return false;
08690    }
08691 
08692    function mtime()
08693    {
08694       if (file_exists($this->name))
08695       {
08696          return filemtime($this->name);
08697       }
08698       return false;
08699    }
08700 
08701    function touch()
08702    {
08703       if (file_exists($this->name))
08704       {
08705          return touch($this->name);
08706       }
08707       return false;
08708    }
08709 
08710    function unlink()
08711    {
08712       if (file_exists($this->name))
08713       {
08714          return unlink($this->name);
08715       }
08716       return false;
08717    }
08718 }
08719 
08720 class SimplePie_Cache_DB
08721 {
08722    function prepare_simplepie_object_for_cache($data)
08723    {
08724       $items = $data->get_items();
08725       $items_by_id = array();
08726 
08727       if (!empty($items))
08728       {
08729          foreach ($items as $item)
08730          {
08731             $items_by_id[$item->get_id()] = $item;
08732          }
08733 
08734          if (count($items_by_id) !== count($items))
08735          {
08736             $items_by_id = array();
08737             foreach ($items as $item)
08738             {
08739                $items_by_id[$item->get_id(true)] = $item;
08740             }
08741          }
08742 
08743          if (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]))
08744          {
08745             $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0];
08746          }
08747          elseif (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]))
08748          {
08749             $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0];
08750          }
08751          elseif (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]))
08752          {
08753             $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0];
08754          }
08755          elseif (isset($data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['channel'][0]))
08756          {
08757             $channel =& $data->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['channel'][0];
08758          }
08759          else
08760          {
08761             $channel = null;
08762          }
08763 
08764          if ($channel !== null)
08765          {
08766             if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['entry']))
08767             {
08768                unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['entry']);
08769             }
08770             if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['entry']))
08771             {
08772                unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['entry']);
08773             }
08774             if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['item']))
08775             {
08776                unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['item']);
08777             }
08778             if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['item']))
08779             {
08780                unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['item']);
08781             }
08782             if (isset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['item']))
08783             {
08784                unset($channel['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['item']);
08785             }
08786          }
08787          if (isset($data->data['items']))
08788          {
08789             unset($data->data['items']);
08790          }
08791          if (isset($data->data['ordered_items']))
08792          {
08793             unset($data->data['ordered_items']);
08794          }
08795       }
08796       return array(serialize($data->data), $items_by_id);
08797    }
08798 }
08799 
08800 class SimplePie_Cache_MySQL extends SimplePie_Cache_DB
08801 {
08802    var $mysql;
08803    var $options;
08804    var $id;
08805 
08806    function SimplePie_Cache_MySQL($mysql_location, $name, $extension)
08807    {
08808       $host = $mysql_location->get_host();
08809       if (SimplePie_Misc::stripos($host, 'unix(') === 0 && substr($host, -1) === ')')
08810       {
08811          $server = ':' . substr($host, 5, -1);
08812       }
08813       else
08814       {
08815          $server = $host;
08816          if ($mysql_location->get_port() !== null)
08817          {
08818             $server .= ':' . $mysql_location->get_port();
08819          }
08820       }
08821 
08822       if (strpos($mysql_location->get_userinfo(), ':') !== false)
08823       {
08824          list($username, $password) = explode(':', $mysql_location->get_userinfo(), 2);
08825       }
08826       else
08827       {
08828          $username = $mysql_location->get_userinfo();
08829          $password = null;
08830       }
08831 
08832       if ($this->mysql = mysql_connect($server, $username, $password))
08833       {
08834          $this->id = $name . $extension;
08835          $this->options = SimplePie_Misc::parse_str($mysql_location->get_query());
08836          if (!isset($this->options['prefix'][0]))
08837          {
08838             $this->options['prefix'][0] = '';
08839          }
08840 
08841          if (mysql_select_db(ltrim($mysql_location->get_path(), '/'))
08842             && mysql_query('SET NAMES utf8')
08843             && ($query = mysql_unbuffered_query('SHOW TABLES')))
08844          {
08845             $db = array();
08846             while ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query))
08847             {
08848                $db[] = $row[0];
08849             }
08850 
08851             if (!in_array($this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data', $db))
08852             {
08853                if (!mysql_query('CREATE TABLE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` (`id` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `items` SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `data` BLOB NOT NULL, `mtime` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, UNIQUE (`id`(125)))'))
08854                {
08855                   $this->mysql = null;
08856                }
08857             }
08858 
08859             if (!in_array($this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items', $db))
08860             {
08861                if (!mysql_query('CREATE TABLE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` (`feed_id` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `id` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `data` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `posted` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, INDEX `feed_id` (`feed_id`(125)))'))
08862                {
08863                   $this->mysql = null;
08864                }
08865             }
08866          }
08867          else
08868          {
08869             $this->mysql = null;
08870          }
08871       }
08872    }
08873 
08874    function save($data)
08875    {
08876       if ($this->mysql)
08877       {
08878          $feed_id = "'" . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'";
08879 
08880          if (is_a($data, 'SimplePie'))
08881          {
08882             if (SIMPLEPIE_PHP5)
08883             {
08884                // This keyword needs to defy coding standards for PHP4 compatibility
08885                $data = clone($data);
08886             }
08887 
08888             $prepared = $this->prepare_simplepie_object_for_cache($data);
08889 
08890             if ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `id` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08891             {
08892                if (mysql_num_rows($query))
08893                {
08894                   $items = count($prepared[1]);
08895                   if ($items)
08896                   {
08897                      $sql = 'UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `items` = ' . $items . ', `data` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($prepared[0]) . '\', `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id;
08898                   }
08899                   else
08900                   {
08901                      $sql = 'UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `data` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($prepared[0]) . '\', `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id;
08902                   }
08903 
08904                   if (!mysql_query($sql, $this->mysql))
08905                   {
08906                      return false;
08907                   }
08908                }
08909                elseif (!mysql_query('INSERT INTO `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` (`id`, `items`, `data`, `mtime`) VALUES(' . $feed_id . ', ' . count($prepared[1]) . ', \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($prepared[0]) . '\', ' . time() . ')', $this->mysql))
08910                {
08911                   return false;
08912                }
08913 
08914                $ids = array_keys($prepared[1]);
08915                if (!empty($ids))
08916                {
08917                   foreach ($ids as $id)
08918                   {
08919                      $database_ids[] = mysql_real_escape_string($id);
08920                   }
08921 
08922                   if ($query = mysql_unbuffered_query('SELECT `id` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` WHERE `id` = \'' . implode('\' OR `id` = \'', $database_ids) . '\' AND `feed_id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08923                   {
08924                      $existing_ids = array();
08925                      while ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query))
08926                      {
08927                         $existing_ids[] = $row[0];
08928                      }
08929 
08930                      $new_ids = array_diff($ids, $existing_ids);
08931 
08932                      foreach ($new_ids as $new_id)
08933                      {
08934                         if (!($date = $prepared[1][$new_id]->get_date('U')))
08935                         {
08936                            $date = time();
08937                         }
08938 
08939                         if (!mysql_query('INSERT INTO `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` (`feed_id`, `id`, `data`, `posted`) VALUES(' . $feed_id . ', \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($new_id) . '\', \'' . mysql_real_escape_string(serialize($prepared[1][$new_id]->data)) . '\', ' . $date . ')', $this->mysql))
08940                         {
08941                            return false;
08942                         }
08943                      }
08944                      return true;
08945                   }
08946                }
08947                else
08948                {
08949                   return true;
08950                }
08951             }
08952          }
08953          elseif ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `id` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08954          {
08955             if (mysql_num_rows($query))
08956             {
08957                if (mysql_query('UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `items` = 0, `data` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string(serialize($data)) . '\', `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = ' . $feed_id, $this->mysql))
08958                {
08959                   return true;
08960                }
08961             }
08962             elseif (mysql_query('INSERT INTO `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` (`id`, `items`, `data`, `mtime`) VALUES(\'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . '\', 0, \'' . mysql_real_escape_string(serialize($data)) . '\', ' . time() . ')', $this->mysql))
08963             {
08964                return true;
08965             }
08966          }
08967       }
08968       return false;
08969    }
08970 
08971    function load()
08972    {
08973       if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `items`, `data` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query)))
08974       {
08975          $data = unserialize($row[1]);
08976 
08977          if (isset($this->options['items'][0]))
08978          {
08979             $items = (int) $this->options['items'][0];
08980          }
08981          else
08982          {
08983             $items = (int) $row[0];
08984          }
08985 
08986          if ($items !== 0)
08987          {
08988             if (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]))
08989             {
08990                $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0];
08991             }
08992             elseif (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]))
08993             {
08994                $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0];
08995             }
08996             elseif (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]))
08997             {
08998                $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0];
08999             }
09000             elseif (isset($data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]))
09001             {
09002                $feed =& $data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0];
09003             }
09004             else
09005             {
09006                $feed = null;
09007             }
09008 
09009             if ($feed !== null)
09010             {
09011                $sql = 'SELECT `data` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` WHERE `feed_id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . '\' ORDER BY `posted` DESC';
09012                if ($items > 0)
09013                {
09014                   $sql .= ' LIMIT ' . $items;
09015                }
09016 
09017                if ($query = mysql_unbuffered_query($sql, $this->mysql))
09018                {
09019                   while ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query))
09020                   {
09021                      $feed['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['entry'][] = unserialize($row[0]);
09022                   }
09023                }
09024                else
09025                {
09026                   return false;
09027                }
09028             }
09029          }
09030          return $data;
09031       }
09032       return false;
09033    }
09034 
09035    function mtime()
09036    {
09037       if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('SELECT `mtime` FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && ($row = mysql_fetch_row($query)))
09038       {
09039          return $row[0];
09040       }
09041       else
09042       {
09043          return false;
09044       }
09045    }
09046 
09047    function touch()
09048    {
09049       if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('UPDATE `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` SET `mtime` = ' . time() . ' WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && mysql_affected_rows($this->mysql))
09050       {
09051          return true;
09052       }
09053       else
09054       {
09055          return false;
09056       }
09057    }
09058 
09059    function unlink()
09060    {
09061       if ($this->mysql && ($query = mysql_query('DELETE FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'cache_data` WHERE `id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)) && ($query2 = mysql_query('DELETE FROM `' . $this->options['prefix'][0] . 'items` WHERE `feed_id` = \'' . mysql_real_escape_string($this->id) . "'", $this->mysql)))
09062       {
09063          return true;
09064       }
09065       else
09066       {
09067          return false;
09068       }
09069    }
09070 }
09071 
09072 class SimplePie_Misc
09073 {
09074    function time_hms($seconds)
09075    {
09076       $time = '';
09077 
09078       $hours = floor($seconds / 3600);
09079       $remainder = $seconds % 3600;
09080       if ($hours > 0)
09081       {
09082          $time .= $hours.':';
09083       }
09084 
09085       $minutes = floor($remainder / 60);
09086       $seconds = $remainder % 60;
09087       if ($minutes < 10 && $hours > 0)
09088       {
09089          $minutes = '0' . $minutes;
09090       }
09091       if ($seconds < 10)
09092       {
09093          $seconds = '0' . $seconds;
09094       }
09095 
09096       $time .= $minutes.':';
09097       $time .= $seconds;
09098 
09099       return $time;
09100    }
09101 
09102    function absolutize_url($relative, $base)
09103    {
09104       $iri = SimplePie_IRI::absolutize(new SimplePie_IRI($base), $relative);
09105       return $iri->get_iri();
09106    }
09107 
09108    function remove_dot_segments($input)
09109    {
09110       $output = '';
09111       while (strpos($input, './') !== false || strpos($input, '/.') !== false || $input === '.' || $input === '..')
09112       {
09113          // A: If the input buffer begins with a prefix of "../" or "./", then remove that prefix from the input buffer; otherwise,
09114          if (strpos($input, '../') === 0)
09115          {
09116             $input = substr($input, 3);
09117          }
09118          elseif (strpos($input, './') === 0)
09119          {
09120             $input = substr($input, 2);
09121          }
09122          // B: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/./" or "/.", where "." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer; otherwise,
09123          elseif (strpos($input, '/./') === 0)
09124          {
09125             $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 3);
09126          }
09127          elseif ($input === '/.')
09128          {
09129             $input = '/';
09130          }
09131          // C: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/../" or "/..", where ".." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer and remove the last segment and its preceding "/" (if any) from the output buffer; otherwise,
09132          elseif (strpos($input, '/../') === 0)
09133          {
09134             $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 4);
09135             $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
09136          }
09137          elseif ($input === '/..')
09138          {
09139             $input = '/';
09140             $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
09141          }
09142          // D: if the input buffer consists only of "." or "..", then remove that from the input buffer; otherwise,
09143          elseif ($input === '.' || $input === '..')
09144          {
09145             $input = '';
09146          }
09147          // E: move the first path segment in the input buffer to the end of the output buffer, including the initial "/" character (if any) and any subsequent characters up to, but not including, the next "/" character or the end of the input buffer
09148          elseif (($pos = strpos($input, '/', 1)) !== false)
09149          {
09150             $output .= substr($input, 0, $pos);
09151             $input = substr_replace($input, '', 0, $pos);
09152          }
09153          else
09154          {
09155             $output .= $input;
09156             $input = '';
09157          }
09158       }
09159       return $output . $input;
09160    }
09161 
09162    function get_element($realname, $string)
09163    {
09164       $return = array();
09165       $name = preg_quote($realname, '/');
09166       if (preg_match_all("/<($name)" . SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_HTML_ATTRIBUTE . "(>(.*)<\/$name>|(\/)?>)/siU", $string, $matches, PREG_SET_ORDER | PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE))
09167       {
09168          for ($i = 0, $total_matches = count($matches); $i < $total_matches; $i++)
09169          {
09170             $return[$i]['tag'] = $realname;
09171             $return[$i]['full'] = $matches[$i][0][0];
09172             $return[$i]['offset'] = $matches[$i][0][1];
09173             if (strlen($matches[$i][3][0]) <= 2)
09174             {
09175                $return[$i]['self_closing'] = true;
09176             }
09177             else
09178             {
09179                $return[$i]['self_closing'] = false;
09180                $return[$i]['content'] = $matches[$i][4][0];
09181             }
09182             $return[$i]['attribs'] = array();
09183             if (isset($matches[$i][2][0]) && preg_match_all('/[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]+([^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3D\x3E]*)(?:[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*=[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*(?:"([^"]*)"|\'([^\']*)\'|([^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x22\x27\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x3E]*)?))?/', ' ' . $matches[$i][2][0] . ' ', $attribs, PREG_SET_ORDER))
09184             {
09185                for ($j = 0, $total_attribs = count($attribs); $j < $total_attribs; $j++)
09186                {
09187                   if (count($attribs[$j]) === 2)
09188                   {
09189                      $attribs[$j][2] = $attribs[$j][1];
09190                   }
09191                   $return[$i]['attribs'][strtolower($attribs[$j][1])]['data'] = SimplePie_Misc::entities_decode(end($attribs[$j]), 'UTF-8');
09192                }
09193             }
09194          }
09195       }
09196       return $return;
09197    }
09198 
09199    function element_implode($element)
09200    {
09201       $full = "<$element[tag]";
09202       foreach ($element['attribs'] as $key => $value)
09203       {
09204          $key = strtolower($key);
09205          $full .= " $key=\"" . htmlspecialchars($value['data']) . '"';
09206       }
09207       if ($element['self_closing'])
09208       {
09209          $full .= ' />';
09210       }
09211       else
09212       {
09213          $full .= ">$element[content]</$element[tag]>";
09214       }
09215       return $full;
09216    }
09217 
09218    function error($message, $level, $file, $line)
09219    {
09220       if ((ini_get('error_reporting') & $level) > 0)
09221       {
09222          switch ($level)
09223          {
09224             case E_USER_ERROR:
09225                $note = 'PHP Error';
09226                break;
09227             case E_USER_WARNING:
09228                $note = 'PHP Warning';
09229                break;
09230             case E_USER_NOTICE:
09231                $note = 'PHP Notice';
09232                break;
09233             default:
09234                $note = 'Unknown Error';
09235                break;
09236          }
09237          error_log("$note: $message in $file on line $line", 0);
09238       }
09239       return $message;
09240    }
09241 
09242    /**
09243     * If a file has been cached, retrieve and display it.
09244     *
09245     * This is most useful for caching images (get_favicon(), etc.),
09246     * however it works for all cached files.  This WILL NOT display ANY
09247     * file/image/page/whatever, but rather only display what has already
09248     * been cached by SimplePie.
09249     *
09250     * @access public
09251     * @see SimplePie::get_favicon()
09252     * @param str $identifier_url URL that is used to identify the content.
09253     * This may or may not be the actual URL of the live content.
09254     * @param str $cache_location Location of SimplePie's cache.  Defaults
09255     * to './cache'.
09256     * @param str $cache_extension The file extension that the file was
09257     * cached with.  Defaults to 'spc'.
09258     * @param str $cache_class Name of the cache-handling class being used
09259     * in SimplePie.  Defaults to 'SimplePie_Cache', and should be left
09260     * as-is unless you've overloaded the class.
09261     * @param str $cache_name_function Obsolete. Exists for backwards
09262     * compatibility reasons only.
09263     */
09264    function display_cached_file($identifier_url, $cache_location = './cache', $cache_extension = 'spc', $cache_class = 'SimplePie_Cache', $cache_name_function = 'md5')
09265    {
09266       $cache = call_user_func(array($cache_class, 'create'), $cache_location, $identifier_url, $cache_extension);
09267 
09268       if ($file = $cache->load())
09269       {
09270          if (isset($file['headers']['content-type']))
09271          {
09272             header('Content-type:' . $file['headers']['content-type']);
09273          }
09274          else
09275          {
09276             header('Content-type: application/octet-stream');
09277          }
09278          header('Expires: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', time() + 604800) . ' GMT'); // 7 days
09279          echo $file['body'];
09280          exit;
09281       }
09282 
09283       die('Cached file for ' . $identifier_url . ' cannot be found.');
09284    }
09285 
09286    function fix_protocol($url, $http = 1)
09287    {
09288       $url = SimplePie_Misc::normalize_url($url);
09289       $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($url);
09290       if ($parsed['scheme'] !== '' && $parsed['scheme'] !== 'http' && $parsed['scheme'] !== 'https')
09291       {
09292          return SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol(SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url('http', $parsed['authority'], $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']), $http);
09293       }
09294 
09295       if ($parsed['scheme'] === '' && $parsed['authority'] === '' && !file_exists($url))
09296       {
09297          return SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol(SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url('http', $parsed['path'], '', $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']), $http);
09298       }
09299 
09300       if ($http === 2 && $parsed['scheme'] !== '')
09301       {
09302          return "feed:$url";
09303       }
09304       elseif ($http === 3 && strtolower($parsed['scheme']) === 'http')
09305       {
09306          return substr_replace($url, 'podcast', 0, 4);
09307       }
09308       elseif ($http === 4 && strtolower($parsed['scheme']) === 'http')
09309       {
09310          return substr_replace($url, 'itpc', 0, 4);
09311       }
09312       else
09313       {
09314          return $url;
09315       }
09316    }
09317 
09318    function parse_url($url)
09319    {
09320       $iri =& new SimplePie_IRI($url);
09321       return array(
09322          'scheme' => (string) $iri->get_scheme(),
09323          'authority' => (string) $iri->get_authority(),
09324          'path' => (string) $iri->get_path(),
09325          'query' => (string) $iri->get_query(),
09326          'fragment' => (string) $iri->get_fragment()
09327       );
09328    }
09329 
09330    function compress_parse_url($scheme = '', $authority = '', $path = '', $query = '', $fragment = '')
09331    {
09332       $iri =& new SimplePie_IRI('');
09333       $iri->set_scheme($scheme);
09334       $iri->set_authority($authority);
09335       $iri->set_path($path);
09336       $iri->set_query($query);
09337       $iri->set_fragment($fragment);
09338       return $iri->get_iri();
09339    }
09340 
09341    function normalize_url($url)
09342    {
09343       $iri =& new SimplePie_IRI($url);
09344       return $iri->get_iri();
09345    }
09346 
09347    function percent_encoding_normalization($match)
09348    {
09349       $integer = hexdec($match[1]);
09350       if ($integer >= 0x41 && $integer <= 0x5A || $integer >= 0x61 && $integer <= 0x7A || $integer >= 0x30 && $integer <= 0x39 || $integer === 0x2D || $integer === 0x2E || $integer === 0x5F || $integer === 0x7E)
09351       {
09352          return chr($integer);
09353       }
09354       else
09355       {
09356          return strtoupper($match[0]);
09357       }
09358    }
09359 
09360    /**
09361     * Remove bad UTF-8 bytes
09362     *
09363     * PCRE Pattern to locate bad bytes in a UTF-8 string comes from W3C
09364     * FAQ: Multilingual Forms (modified to include full ASCII range)
09365     *
09366     * @author Geoffrey Sneddon
09367     * @see http://www.w3.org/International/questions/qa-forms-utf-8
09368     * @param string $str String to remove bad UTF-8 bytes from
09369     * @return string UTF-8 string
09370     */
09371    function utf8_bad_replace($str)
09372    {
09373       if (function_exists('iconv') && ($return = @iconv('UTF-8', 'UTF-8//IGNORE', $str)))
09374       {
09375          return $return;
09376       }
09377       elseif (function_exists('mb_convert_encoding') && ($return = @mb_convert_encoding($str, 'UTF-8', 'UTF-8')))
09378       {
09379          return $return;
09380       }
09381       elseif (preg_match_all('/(?:[\x00-\x7F]|[\xC2-\xDF][\x80-\xBF]|\xE0[\xA0-\xBF][\x80-\xBF]|[\xE1-\xEC\xEE\xEF][\x80-\xBF]{2}|\xED[\x80-\x9F][\x80-\xBF]|\xF0[\x90-\xBF][\x80-\xBF]{2}|[\xF1-\xF3][\x80-\xBF]{3}|\xF4[\x80-\x8F][\x80-\xBF]{2})+/', $str, $matches))
09382       {
09383          return implode("\xEF\xBF\xBD", $matches[0]);
09384       }
09385       elseif ($str !== '')
09386       {
09387          return "\xEF\xBF\xBD";
09388       }
09389       else
09390       {
09391          return '';
09392       }
09393    }
09394 
09395    /**
09396     * Converts a Windows-1252 encoded string to a UTF-8 encoded string
09397     *
09398     * @static
09399     * @access public
09400     * @param string $string Windows-1252 encoded string
09401     * @return string UTF-8 encoded string
09402     */
09403    function windows_1252_to_utf8($string)
09404    {
09405       static $convert_table = array("\x80" => "\xE2\x82\xAC", "\x81" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x82" => "\xE2\x80\x9A", "\x83" => "\xC6\x92", "\x84" => "\xE2\x80\x9E", "\x85" => "\xE2\x80\xA6", "\x86" => "\xE2\x80\xA0", "\x87" => "\xE2\x80\xA1", "\x88" => "\xCB\x86", "\x89" => "\xE2\x80\xB0", "\x8A" => "\xC5\xA0", "\x8B" => "\xE2\x80\xB9", "\x8C" => "\xC5\x92", "\x8D" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x8E" => "\xC5\xBD", "\x8F" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x90" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x91" => "\xE2\x80\x98", "\x92" => "\xE2\x80\x99", "\x93" => "\xE2\x80\x9C", "\x94" => "\xE2\x80\x9D", "\x95" => "\xE2\x80\xA2", "\x96" => "\xE2\x80\x93", "\x97" => "\xE2\x80\x94", "\x98" => "\xCB\x9C", "\x99" => "\xE2\x84\xA2", "\x9A" => "\xC5\xA1", "\x9B" => "\xE2\x80\xBA", "\x9C" => "\xC5\x93", "\x9D" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x9E" => "\xC5\xBE", "\x9F" => "\xC5\xB8", "\xA0" => "\xC2\xA0", "\xA1" => "\xC2\xA1", "\xA2" => "\xC2\xA2", "\xA3" => "\xC2\xA3", "\xA4" => "\xC2\xA4", "\xA5" => "\xC2\xA5", "\xA6" => "\xC2\xA6", "\xA7" => "\xC2\xA7", "\xA8" => "\xC2\xA8", "\xA9" => "\xC2\xA9", "\xAA" => "\xC2\xAA", "\xAB" => "\xC2\xAB", "\xAC" => "\xC2\xAC", "\xAD" => "\xC2\xAD", "\xAE" => "\xC2\xAE", "\xAF" => "\xC2\xAF", "\xB0" => "\xC2\xB0", "\xB1" => "\xC2\xB1", "\xB2" => "\xC2\xB2", "\xB3" => "\xC2\xB3", "\xB4" => "\xC2\xB4", "\xB5" => "\xC2\xB5", "\xB6" => "\xC2\xB6", "\xB7" => "\xC2\xB7", "\xB8" => "\xC2\xB8", "\xB9" => "\xC2\xB9", "\xBA" => "\xC2\xBA", "\xBB" => "\xC2\xBB", "\xBC" => "\xC2\xBC", "\xBD" => "\xC2\xBD", "\xBE" => "\xC2\xBE", "\xBF" => "\xC2\xBF", "\xC0" => "\xC3\x80", "\xC1" => "\xC3\x81", "\xC2" => "\xC3\x82", "\xC3" => "\xC3\x83", "\xC4" => "\xC3\x84", "\xC5" => "\xC3\x85", "\xC6" => "\xC3\x86", "\xC7" => "\xC3\x87", "\xC8" => "\xC3\x88", "\xC9" => "\xC3\x89", "\xCA" => "\xC3\x8A", "\xCB" => "\xC3\x8B", "\xCC" => "\xC3\x8C", "\xCD" => "\xC3\x8D", "\xCE" => "\xC3\x8E", "\xCF" => "\xC3\x8F", "\xD0" => "\xC3\x90", "\xD1" => "\xC3\x91", "\xD2" => "\xC3\x92", "\xD3" => "\xC3\x93", "\xD4" => "\xC3\x94", "\xD5" => "\xC3\x95", "\xD6" => "\xC3\x96", "\xD7" => "\xC3\x97", "\xD8" => "\xC3\x98", "\xD9" => "\xC3\x99", "\xDA" => "\xC3\x9A", "\xDB" => "\xC3\x9B", "\xDC" => "\xC3\x9C", "\xDD" => "\xC3\x9D", "\xDE" => "\xC3\x9E", "\xDF" => "\xC3\x9F", "\xE0" => "\xC3\xA0", "\xE1" => "\xC3\xA1", "\xE2" => "\xC3\xA2", "\xE3" => "\xC3\xA3", "\xE4" => "\xC3\xA4", "\xE5" => "\xC3\xA5", "\xE6" => "\xC3\xA6", "\xE7" => "\xC3\xA7", "\xE8" => "\xC3\xA8", "\xE9" => "\xC3\xA9", "\xEA" => "\xC3\xAA", "\xEB" => "\xC3\xAB", "\xEC" => "\xC3\xAC", "\xED" => "\xC3\xAD", "\xEE" => "\xC3\xAE", "\xEF" => "\xC3\xAF", "\xF0" => "\xC3\xB0", "\xF1" => "\xC3\xB1", "\xF2" => "\xC3\xB2", "\xF3" => "\xC3\xB3", "\xF4" => "\xC3\xB4", "\xF5" => "\xC3\xB5", "\xF6" => "\xC3\xB6", "\xF7" => "\xC3\xB7", "\xF8" => "\xC3\xB8", "\xF9" => "\xC3\xB9", "\xFA" => "\xC3\xBA", "\xFB" => "\xC3\xBB", "\xFC" => "\xC3\xBC", "\xFD" => "\xC3\xBD", "\xFE" => "\xC3\xBE", "\xFF" => "\xC3\xBF");
09406 
09407       return strtr($string, $convert_table);
09408    }
09409 
09410    function change_encoding($data, $input, $output)
09411    {
09412       $input = SimplePie_Misc::encoding($input);
09413       $output = SimplePie_Misc::encoding($output);
09414 
09415       // We fail to fail on non US-ASCII bytes
09416       if ($input === 'US-ASCII')
09417       {
09418          static $non_ascii_octects = '';
09419          if (!$non_ascii_octects)
09420          {
09421             for ($i = 0x80; $i <= 0xFF; $i++)
09422             {
09423                $non_ascii_octects .= chr($i);
09424             }
09425          }
09426          $data = substr($data, 0, strcspn($data, $non_ascii_octects));
09427       }
09428 
09429       // This is first, as behaviour of this is completely predictable
09430       if ($input === 'Windows-1252' && $output === 'UTF-8')
09431       {
09432          return SimplePie_Misc::windows_1252_to_utf8($data);
09433       }
09434       // This is second, as behaviour of this varies only with PHP version (the middle part of this expression checks the encoding is supported).
09435       elseif (function_exists('mb_convert_encoding') && @mb_convert_encoding("\x80", 'UTF-16BE', $input) !== "\x00\x80" && ($return = @mb_convert_encoding($data, $output, $input)))
09436       {
09437          return $return;
09438       }
09439       // This is last, as behaviour of this varies with OS userland and PHP version
09440       elseif (function_exists('iconv') && ($return = @iconv($input, $output, $data)))
09441       {
09442          return $return;
09443       }
09444       // If we can't do anything, just fail
09445       else
09446       {
09447          return false;
09448       }
09449    }
09450 
09451    function encoding($charset)
09452    {
09453       // Normalization from UTS #22
09454       switch (strtolower(preg_replace('/(?:[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|([^0-9])0+)/', '\1', $charset)))
09455       {
09456          case 'adobestandardencoding':
09457          case 'csadobestandardencoding':
09458             return 'Adobe-Standard-Encoding';
09459 
09460          case 'adobesymbolencoding':
09461          case 'cshppsmath':
09462             return 'Adobe-Symbol-Encoding';
09463 
09464          case 'ami1251':
09465          case 'amiga1251':
09466             return 'Amiga-1251';
09467 
09468          case 'ansix31101983':
09469          case 'csat5001983':
09470          case 'csiso99naplps':
09471          case 'isoir99':
09472          case 'naplps':
09473             return 'ANSI_X3.110-1983';
09474 
09475          case 'arabic7':
09476          case 'asmo449':
09477          case 'csiso89asmo449':
09478          case 'iso9036':
09479          case 'isoir89':
09480             return 'ASMO_449';
09481 
09482          case 'big5':
09483          case 'csbig5':
09484          case 'xxbig5':
09485             return 'Big5';
09486 
09487          case 'big5hkscs':
09488             return 'Big5-HKSCS';
09489 
09490          case 'bocu1':
09491          case 'csbocu1':
09492             return 'BOCU-1';
09493 
09494          case 'brf':
09495          case 'csbrf':
09496             return 'BRF';
09497 
09498          case 'bs4730':
09499          case 'csiso4unitedkingdom':
09500          case 'gb':
09501          case 'iso646gb':
09502          case 'isoir4':
09503          case 'uk':
09504             return 'BS_4730';
09505 
09506          case 'bsviewdata':
09507          case 'csiso47bsviewdata':
09508          case 'isoir47':
09509             return 'BS_viewdata';
09510 
09511          case 'cesu8':
09512          case 'cscesu8':
09513             return 'CESU-8';
09514 
09515          case 'ca':
09516          case 'csa71':
09517          case 'csaz243419851':
09518          case 'csiso121canadian1':
09519          case 'iso646ca':
09520          case 'isoir121':
09521             return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-1';
09522 
09523          case 'csa72':
09524          case 'csaz243419852':
09525          case 'csiso122canadian2':
09526          case 'iso646ca2':
09527          case 'isoir122':
09528             return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-2';
09529 
09530          case 'csaz24341985gr':
09531          case 'csiso123csaz24341985gr':
09532          case 'isoir123':
09533             return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-gr';
09534 
09535          case 'csiso139csn369103':
09536          case 'csn369103':
09537          case 'isoir139':
09538             return 'CSN_369103';
09539 
09540          case 'csdecmcs':
09541          case 'dec':
09542          case 'decmcs':
09543             return 'DEC-MCS';
09544 
09545          case 'csiso21german':
09546          case 'de':
09547          case 'din66003':
09548          case 'iso646de':
09549          case 'isoir21':
09550             return 'DIN_66003';
09551

09554             return 'dk-us';
09555

09561

09564             return 'EBCDIC-AT-DE';
09565 
09566          case 'csebcdicatdea':
09567          case 'ebcdicatdea':
09568             return 'EBCDIC-AT-DE-A';
09569 
09570          case 'csebcdiccafr':
09571          case 'ebcdiccafr':
09572             return 'EBCDIC-CA-FR';
09573 
09574          case 'csebcdicdkno':
09575          case 'ebcdicdkno':
09576             return 'EBCDIC-DK-NO';
09577 
09578          case 'csebcdicdknoa':
09579          case 'ebcdicdknoa':
09580             return 'EBCDIC-DK-NO-A';

09583          case 'ebcdices':
09584             return 'EBCDIC-ES';
09585

09933             return 'IBM852';
09934

09937          case 'csibm855':
09938          case 'ibm855':
09939             return 'IBM855';
09940 
09941          case '857':
09942          case 'cp857':
09943          case 'csibm857':
09944          case 'ibm857':
09945             return 'IBM857';
09946 
09947          case '860':
